sourceString: Preliminary Estimates of the Prevalence of Selected Underlying Health Conditions Among Patients with Coronavirus Disease 2019 — United States, February 12–March 28, 2020
targetString: Tilmaama Duraa Tatamsa'ina Haalota Fayyaa Biroo Dhukkubsattoota Dhukkuba Vaayirasii Koroonaa 2019 Qabanii—Yuunaayitid Isteetsi, Gurraandhala 12—Bitootessa 28, 2020

sourceString: On March 11, 2020, the World Health Organization declared Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) a pandemic.
targetString: Bitootessa 11, 2020, Dhaabbatni Fayyaa Addunyaa Dhukkubi Vaayirasii Koroonaa 2019 (COVID-19) weerara dhibee daddarbaa ta'uu isaa labse.

sourceString: As of March 28, 2020, a total of 571,678 confirmed COVID-19 cases and 26,494 deaths have been reported worldwide.
targetString: Bitootessa 28, 2020 asitti, lakkoofsa waliigalaa namoota COVID-19 dhaan qabamuun isaanii mirkanaa'e 571, 678 fi kan du'an 26,494 tu addunyaa guutummaatti gabaafamee jira.

sourceString: Reports from China and Italy suggest that risk factors for severe disease include older age and the presence of at least one of several underlying health conditions.
targetString: Gabaasawwan Chaayinaa fi Xaaliyaanii irraa argaman sababoonni dhukkuba ammaataadhaaf nama saaxilan dullumaa fi rakkoolee fayyaa dhokatoo keessaa yoo xinnaate tokko jiraachuudha yaada jedhu dhiyeessu .

sourceString: U.S. older adults, including those aged ≥65 years and particularly those aged ≥85 years, also appear to be at higher risk for severe COVID-19–associated outcomes; however, data describing underlying health conditions among U.S. COVID-19 patients have not yet been reported.
targetString: Ga'eessotni buleeyyiin U.S, warren umuriin isaanii ≥65 fi keessattuu warri waggaa ≥85 ta'anis, dhibee COVID-19 mudateen warra sadarkaa olaanaan hubamuu malaniidha; haa ta'u malee, haalli odeeffannoo qindataa U.S. keessaa akka ibsutti dhukkubsattootni COVI-19 ammallee hin gabaafamne.

sourceString: As of March 28, 2020, U.S. states and territories have reported 122,653 U.S. COVID-19 cases to CDC, including 7,162 (5.8%) for whom data on underlying health conditions and other known risk factors for severe outcomes from respiratory infections were reported.
targetString: Bitootessa 28, 2020 asitti, mootummaawwan naannolee Yuunaayitid Isteetsii fi biyyoonni isii jala jiran namoota 7,162 (5.8%), kanneen ragaan rakkoolee fayyaa biroo irrattii fi fidumsa hamaadhaaf sababoota balaa geessisan beekamoo biroo dhukkuboota hafuuraan darbanii irraa ka'an gabaafameef dabalatee, namoonni COVID-19 qabaman 122,653 jiraachuu isaanii Giddugala To'annaa Dhibee (CDC)tti gabaasaniiru.

sourceString: Among these 7,162 cases, 2,692 (37.6%) patients had one or more underlying health condition or risk factor, and 4,470 (62.4%) had none of these conditions reported.
targetString: Namoota 7,162 keessaa, dhukkubsattoonni 2,692 (37.6%) rakkoo fayyaa biraa yookaan sababa balaa tokko yookaan isaa ol qabu, 4,470 (62.4%) immoo haalota kanniin tokko illee akka hinqabne gabaafame.

sourceString: The percentage of COVID-19 patients with at least one underlying health condition or risk factor was higher among those requiring intensive care unit (ICU) admission (358 of 457, 78%) and those requiring hospitalization without ICU admission (732 of 1,037, 71%) than that among those who were not hospitalized (1,388 of 5,143, 27%).
targetString: Dhibbeentaan dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 namoota wal'aansaaf hospitaala hinseenin (5,143 keessaa 1,388, 27%) caalaatti kanneen rakkoo fayyaa biraa yookaan sababa balaa yoo xiqqaate tokko qabaatanii kutaa kunuunsa fayyaa cimaa (ICU) seenan (457 keessaa 358, 78%) fi kanneen wal'aansa mana yaalaa barbaadan garuu immoo kutaa kunuunsa fayyaa cimaa hin barbaadne (1,037 keessaa 732, 71%) gidduutti ol ka'aadha.

sourceString: The most commonly reported conditions were diabetes mellitus, chronic lung disease, and cardiovascular disease.
targetString: Warreen irra jireessaan gabaafaman haalota dhibee sukkaaraa, dhibee sombaa rakkisaa fi dibeewwan onnee waliin wal qabatan turan.

sourceString: These preliminary findings suggest that in the United States, persons with underlying health conditions or other recognized risk factors for severe outcomes from respiratory infections appear to be at a higher risk for severe disease from COVID-19 than are persons without these conditions.
targetString: Argannoowwan jalqabaa kunniin akka yaada dhiyeessanitti Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keessatti, namoonni rakkoolee fayyaa biroo qaban  yookaan sababoota balaa hubataman biroo dhiibbaa dhibee ujummoo qilleensaa badduu baasan qaban namoota haalota kanniin hinqabne caalaa COVID-19 irraa dhukkubi cimaan isaan qabuu danda'a.

sourceString: Data from laboratory-confirmed COVID-19 cases reported to CDC from 50 states, four U.S. territories and affiliated islands, the District of Columbia, and New York City with February 12–March 28, 2020 onset dates were analyzed.
targetString: Ragaan dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 qorannoo laabiraatooriitiin mirkaneeffame irraa, kanneen mootummoota 50, kutaawwan bulchiinsaa afur U.S. keessaa fi biyyoota bishaan gidduu hidhata U.S. qaban, Kutaa Biyyaa Kolombiyaa fi Magaalaa Niiwu Yoorki irraa Giddugala To'annaa Dhibee (CDC) tti gabaafaman, kanneen guyyoonni jalqabbii isaanii Gurraandhala 12 –Bitootessa 28, 2020 ta'e qaacceffamanii jiru.

sourceString: Cases among persons repatriated to the United States from Wuhan, China, and the Diamond Princess cruise ship were excluded.
targetString: Namoota Wuhaan, Chaayinaa irraa gara Yuunaayitid Isteetsitti deebi'anii fi hojjettoota doonii guddaa “Daayaamandi Piriinsas” keessa dhukkubsattooti jiran keessaa hambifaman.

sourceString: For cases with missing onset dates, date of onset was estimated by subtracting 4 days (median interval from symptom onset to specimen collection date among cases with known dates in these data) from the earliest specimen collection.
targetString: Dhibeewwan jalqabni guyyaa hubaatii isaanio hin beekamneef, fakkeenyota dursanii qindatan irraa guyyaa jalqabbii guyyoota4 hi'isuun (tuuta giddu galeessaa qindeeffama odeeffannoo jalqabbii mallattoo gara guyyaa dhibichib itti beekamee)

sourceString: Public health departments reported cases to CDC using a standardized case report form that captures information (yes, no, or unknown) on the following conditions and potential risk factors: chronic lung disease (inclusive of asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease [COPD], and emphysema); diabetes mellitus; cardiovascular disease; chronic renal disease; chronic liver disease; immunocompromised condition; neurologic disorder, neurodevelopmental, or intellectual disability; pregnancy; current smoking status; former smoking status; or other chronic disease.
targetString: Muummeewwan fayyaa uummataa namoota qabaman unkaa gabaasaa beekamaa namoota qabamanii, isa odeeffannoo (eeyyee, lakkii, yookaan hinbeekamne) haalota armaan gadiifi sababoota balaa ta'uu danda'anii qabachuu danda'u fayyadamuudhaan gara Giddugala To'annaa Dhibee (CDC) tti gabaasan. Odeeffannowwaniifi sababoonni balaa ta'uu malanis dhukkuba sombaa yeroo dheeraaf turu (asmii, dhibee nama ukkaamsu kan namarraa hindeemnee [COPD] fi emfiiseemaa); dhukkuba shukkaaraa; dhukkuba onnee; haala dandeettii dhukkuba ittisuu namaarra darbu; nerviin toora gadhiisuu, ‘niyuuroodivelooppimentaalii' yookaan dandeettiin yaaduu namaa miidhamuu; ulfa ta'uu; tamboo xuuxaa jiraachuu/dhiisuu; kanaan dura tamboo xuuxaa turuu/xuuxuu dhiisuu; yookaan dhukkuba yeroo dheeraaf namarra turefaadha.

sourceString: Data reported to CDC are preliminary and can be updated by health departments over time; critical data elements might be missing at the time of initial report; thus, this analysis is descriptive, and no statistical comparisons could be made.
targetString: Daataan CDC'tti dabaafame odeeffannoo jalqabaan dhaabbattoota fayyaan yeroo dabalataatti haara'uu danda'a, sa'atii gabaasa duraatti gosootni xiinxala daataa dhabamuu malu; haala kanaan xiinxalli kun hubachiisaadha, walbira qabiinsi lakkoofsotaa dhufuu hin danda'u.

sourceString: The percentages of patients of all ages with underlying health conditions who were not hospitalized, hospitalized without ICU admission, and hospitalized with ICU admission were calculated.
targetString: Dhibbantaan haala dhukkubsattoota umurii hundaa jela jiranii kanneen gara hospitaalaatti hin geeffamnee, ayyama ICU malee hospitaala geeffamanii fi ayyama ICU'tiin hospitaala geeffamanii herregameera.

sourceString: Percentages of hospitalizations with and without ICU admission were estimated for persons aged ≥19 years with and without underlying health conditions.
targetString: Dhibbeentaan namoota hospitaalatti yaalamaa jirankeessaa ayyama ICU argatanii warreen umuriin isaanii ≥19 ta'eef haala fayyaa salphaatti yaalamuu danda'uu fi hin dandeenyeef timaamame.

sourceString: This part of the analysis was limited to persons aged ≥19 years because of the small sample size of cases in children with reported underlying health conditions (N = 32).
targetString: Xiinxalli qaama kanaa namoota umuriin isaanii waggoota ≥19 ta'eef daangeffamaadha. Sababni isaa, iddattoo xiqqoon xibeewwanii daa'imoota rakkoo fayyaa qabanii gabaafame (N=32)'dhna.

sourceString: To account for missing data among these preliminary reports, ranges were estimated with a lower bound including cases with both known and unknown status for hospitalization with and without ICU admission as the denominator and an upper bound using only cases with known outcome status as the denominator.
targetString: Gabaasawwan jalqabaa kanniin keessaa ragaa hir'ate guutuuf, daangaa isa gajjallaa irraa ka'uudhaan hangi wal irraa fageenyaa tilmaame. Daangaan inni gajjallaa namoota haalli mana yaalaa seenuu isaanii beekamee fi hin beekamne, akka isa jala ooluu fi daangaa irra keessaatti kutaa kunuunsa cimaa seenuufi dhiisuu, haala bu'aa beekamaa warra qaban qofa akka isa jala ooluutti fayyadamuudhaan dabalatee jechuudha.

sourceString: Because of small sample size and missing data on underlying health conditions among COVID-19 patients who died, case-fatality rates for persons with and without underlying conditions were not estimated.
targetString: Sababa naannawaa danaa xiqqoo haaloota ka'umsa fayyaa fi dhukkubsattoota COVID-19n du'an irratti odeeffannoo qindataan waan dhibeef, hammamtaan du'uu namootaa warra haalicha jela jiraniifis ta'e hin jirreef hammaataa ta'uu mala.

sourceString: As of March 28, 2020, a total of 122,653 laboratory-confirmed COVID-19 cases (Figure) and 2,112 deaths were reported to CDC.
targetString: Bitootessa 28, 2020 asitti namoota COVID-19 qabamuu isaanii laabiraatooriidhaan mirkanaa'e 122,653 (Fakkii) fi kan du'an 2,112 tu Giddugala To'annaa Dhibee (CDC) tti gabaafame.

sourceString: Case report forms were submitted to CDC for 74,439 (60.7%) cases.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoota 74,439 (60.7%) f uunkaan gabaasa namoota qabamanii Giddugla To'annaa Dhibee (CDC)tti galfameera.

sourceString: Data on presence or absence of underlying health conditions and other recognized risk factors for severe outcomes from respiratory infections (i.e., smoking and pregnancy) were available for 7,162 (5.8%) patients (Table 1).
targetString: Daataa dhibee baramaa qabaachuu ykn dhabuu fi balaa gurguddaa sirna hargansuu irratti fidu (jechuun xuuxuu fi ulfa ta'uu)'n dhukkubsattoota 7,162 (5.8%)'f argamuu danda'a (gabatee 1).

sourceString: Approximately one third of these patients (2,692, 37.6%), had at least one underlying condition or risk factor.
targetString: Tilmaamaan dhukkubsattoota kanniin harka sadii keessaa harki tokko (2,692, 37.6%), dhukkuboota biroo yookaan sababoota balaa keessaa yoo xiqqaate tokko qabu turan.

sourceString: Diabetes mellitus (784, 10.9%), chronic lung disease (656, 9.2%), and cardiovascular disease (647, 9.0%) were the most frequently reported conditions among all cases.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoota hunda keessatti, dhukkubi shukkaaraa (784, 10.9%), dhukkubi sombaa hamaan (656, 9.2%), akkasumas dhukkubi onneetiifi hidda dhiigaa (647,9.0%) haalota hunda caalaa kanneen irra deddeebiidhaan gabaafaman turan.

sourceString: Among 457 ICU admissions and 1,037 non-ICU hospitalizations, 358 (78%) and 732 (71%), respectively occurred among persons with one or more reported underlying health condition.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoota 457 yaalii kutaa ariifachiisaa (ICU) seenanii fi dhukkubsattoota kutaa yalii ariifachiisaa hin seeenne 1,037 hospitaala ciisan, 358(78%) fi 732 (71%) kanneen keessaa waa'een dhibee isaanii kan beeksifame tokkoo fi isaa oli.

sourceString: In contrast, 1,388 of 5,143 (27%) COVID-19 patients who were not hospitalized were reported to have at least one underlying health condition.
targetString: Faallaa kanaa, dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 5,143 keessaa 1,388 (27%), kanneen mana yaalaa hin seenin yoo xiqqaate dhibee fayyaa biraa tokko qabaachuun isaanii gabaafamee ture.

sourceString: Among patients aged ≥19 years, the percentage of non-ICU hospitalizations was higher among those with underlying health conditions (27.3%–29.8%) than among those without underlying health conditions (7.2%–7.8%); the percentage of cases that resulted in an ICU admission was also higher for those with underlying health conditions (13.3%–14.5%) than those without these conditions (2.2%–2.4%) (Table 2).
targetString: Dhukkubsattoota umuriin isaanii ≥19 keessaa, dhibbeentaan namoota kunuunsa fayyaa cimaadhaaf (ICU) mana yaalaa seenanii kanneen rakkoolee fayyaa biroo qabanii (27.3%–29.8%) kanneen rakkoolee fayyaa biroo hinqabne (7.2%–7.8%) caalaa ol ka'aa ture; dhibbeentaan dhukkubsattootaa akka isaan kutaa kunuunsa fayyaa cimaa seenan isaan taasise kan warra rakkoolee fayyaa biroo qabanii (13.3%–14.5%) kan warra rakkoolee fayyaa biroo hinqabnee (2.2%–2.4%) olidha (Gabatee 2).

sourceString: Small numbers of COVID-19 patients aged < 19 years were reported to be hospitalized (48) or admitted to an ICU (eight).
targetString: Dhukkubsattoonni COVID-19 umurii isaanii 19 muraasni mana yaalaa seenuun isaanii (48) gabaafamee ture  yookaan kutaa kunuunsa cimaa seenanii turan (saddeet).

sourceString: In contrast, 335 patients aged < 19 years were not hospitalized and 1,342 had missing data on hospitalization.
targetString: Faallaa kanaa ammoo, dhukkubsattoonni 335 umuriin isaanii &It fi 19 hospitaala hin deemne, akkasumas 1,342 ammoo mana yaalaa seenuurratti ragaan isaanii badee jira.

sourceString: Among all COVID-19 patients with complete information on underlying conditions or risk factors, 184 deaths occurred (all among patients aged ≥19 years); 173 deaths (94%) were reported among patients with at least one underlying condition.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 warra dhukkuboota biroo yookaan sababoota balaaf saaxilamuu guutuu qaban hunda keessaa, namoota 184 tu du'e (hundi isaanii umuriin isaanii 19 fi isaa olidha); warra dhukkuba biraa yoo xiqqaate tokko qaban keessaaa immoo 173 (94%) du'uutu gabaafame.

sourceString: Among 122,653 U.S. COVID-19 cases reported to CDC as of March 28, 2020, 7,162 (5.8%) patients had data available pertaining to underlying health conditions or potential risk factors; among these patients, higher percentages of patients with underlying conditions were admitted to the hospital and to an ICU than patients without reported underlying conditions.
targetString: Namoota Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keessatti COVID-19 dhaan qabamuun Giddugala To'annaa Dhibee (CDC)tti gabaafame 122,653 keessaa Bitootessa 28, 2020 irraa eegalee dhukkubsattoonni 7,162 (5.8%) rakkoolee fayyaa biroo yookaan sababoota balaa mudachuu malanii qabaachuu isaanii ragaa agarsiisu qabu; dhukkubsattoota kanniin keessaa kanneen rakkoo fayyaa biraa qaban dhibbeentaa guddaan isaanii dhukkubsattoota dhukkuboota biroo qabaachuun isaanii hin gabaafamne caalaa mana yaalaa yookaan bakkee kunuunsa fayyaa cimaa (ICU) seenanii turan.

sourceString: These results are consistent with findings from China and Italy, which suggest that patients with underlying health conditions and risk factors, including, but not limited to, diabetes mellitus, hypertension, COPD, coronary artery disease, cerebrovascular disease, chronic renal disease, and smoking, might be at higher risk for severe disease or death from COVID-19.
targetString: Bu'aawwan kunniin argannoowwan biyya Chaayinaa fi Xaaliyaanii waliin walsimu. Akka bu'aawwan kunniin agarsiisanitti dhukkubsattoonni rakkoolee fayyaa biroo fi sababoota balaaf saaxilan, kanneen akka dhibee shukkaaraa, dhiibbaa dhiigaa, Dhibee Nama Ukkaamsu Kan Namarraa Hindeemnee (COPD), dhukkuba onnee, dhukkuba sammuufi hidda isaa, dhukkuba kalee qabaniifi tamboo xuuxan dabalatee, garuu isaan kana qofaan utuu hin daangeffamin, dhukkuba hamaadhaan qabamuudhaaf yookaan COVID-19 dhaan du'uudhaaf carraan isaanii guddaadha.

sourceString: This analysis was limited by small numbers and missing data because of the burden placed on reporting health departments with rapidly rising case counts, and these findings might change as additional data become available.
targetString: Sababa dirqami muummeewwan lakkoofsa namoota baay'inaan qabamaa jiranii gabaasuun itti kennamee jiruuf, qaaccessi kun lakkoofsa xiqqoofi ragaa hir'uu irraa kan ka'e daangeffamaa ture, argannoowwan kunniin immoo akka ragaan dabalataa argamaa deemeen jijijjiiramuu danda'u.

sourceString: It is not yet known whether the severity or level of control of underlying health conditions affects the risk for severe disease associated with COVID-19.
targetString: Ciminni dhukkubichaa yookaan sadarkaan to'annaa dhukkuboota biroo dhukkuba hamaa COVID-19 waliin walqabate irraan dhiibbaa ga'uun isaa hanga ammaatti hin beekamne.

sourceString: Many of these underlying health conditions are common in the United States: based on self-reported 2018 data, the prevalence of diagnosed diabetes among U.S. adults was 10.1%, and the U.S. age-adjusted prevalence of all types of heart disease (excluding hypertension without other heart disease) was 10.6% in 2017.
targetString: Baay'een isaanii warri dhibee fayyaa qaban kunneen United States'ttis akkasuma, akka odeeffannoo of-gabaasuu 2018'tti faffaca'iimsi dhibee sukkaaraa U.S. keessaa 10.1% ture, akka qinddeessa umurii U.S.tti immoo faffaca'iinsi dhibee onnee hundaa (dhiibbaa dhiigaa dhibee onnee biroo hin qabne osoo hin dabalatiin) 10.6% ture 2017ti.

sourceString: The age-adjusted prevalence of COPD among U.S. adults is 5.9%, and in 2018, the U.S. estimated prevalence of current asthma among persons of all ages was 7.9%.
targetString: Tatamsa'inni Dhibee Nama Ukkaamsu Kan Namarraa Hindeemnee (COPD) umuriidhaan qoqqoodamee kan ga'eessota Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keessaa 5.9% dha, 2018 keessa immoo, babal'ina asmii yeroo ammaa Yuunaayitid Isteetsiin tilmaamame kan namoota umurii hunda keessa jiranii 7.9% dha.

sourceString: CDC continues to develop and update resources for persons with underlying health conditions to reduce the risk of acquiring COVID-19.
targetString: CDC'n namoota rakkina fayyaa beekamoo qabaniif akka COVID-19'n hin qabamneef qabeenyaan gargaaruu itti fufeera.

sourceString: The estimated higher prevalence of these conditions among those in this early group of U.S. COVID-19 patients and the potentially higher risk for more severe disease from COVID-19 associated with the presence of underlying conditions highlight the importance of COVID-19 prevention in persons with underlying conditions.
targetString: Tatamsa'inni ol aanaan haalota kanniinii inni dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 garee jalqabaa Yuunaayitid Isteetsi kana gidduu jira jedhamee tilmaamamee fi COVID-19 balaa guddaa dhukkuba hamaa namatti fiduu danda'a jedhamee yaadame inni dhukkubi biraan jiraachuu waliin walitti hidhamee jiru, namoonni dhukkuboota biroo qaban COVID-19 ittisuun isaanii barbaachisaa akka ta'e agarsiisa.

sourceString: The findings in this report are subject to at least six limitations.
targetString: Argannoowwan gabaasa kana keessaa yoo xiqqaate qoqqobbiiwwan jahaaf saaxilamoodha.

sourceString: First, these data are preliminary, and the analysis was limited by missing data related to the health department reporting burden associated with rapidly rising case counts and delays in completion of information requiring medical chart review; these findings might change as additional data become available.
targetString: Jalqabarratti odeeffannoowwan qindatoon kunneen, akkasumas madaallichi odeeffannoo qindataan dhaabbata fayyaa olka'uu lakkoofsa dhibee sanii fi goolabbii gamaggamni yaala fayyaa gabatee barbaachisuu waliin wal qabatu dhibamuu isaatiin daangeffame; firiin yaalii kunneenii odeeffannoo qindataan dabalataa akka argamuu danda'u jijjiiruu malu.

sourceString: Information on underlying conditions was only available for 7,162 (5.8%) of 122,653 cases reported to CDC.
targetString: Odeeffannoon haalichaas dhibeewwan CDCtti gabaafaman 122,653 keessaa 7,162(5.8%) qofaaf argamuu danda'a ture.

sourceString: It cannot be assumed that those with missing information are similar to those with data on either hospitalizations or underlying health conditions.
targetString: Kanneen odeeffannoo hir'uu qaban, kanneen ragaa mana yaalaa seenuu irratti yookaan dhibeewwan biroo qaban waliin walfakkaatu jedhanii tilmaamuun hin danda'amu.

sourceString: Second, these data are subject to bias in outcome ascertainment because of short follow-up time.
targetString: Lammaffaa, ragaaleen kunniin sababa gabaabina yeroo hordoffii irraa kan ka'e mirkaneessa bu'aa keessatti loogiidhaaf saaxilamoodha.

sourceString: Some outcomes might be underestimated, and long-term outcomes cannot be assessed in this analysis.
targetString: Firiiwwan muraasi haga tilmaamameen gadi ta'uu malu, akkasumas xiinxala kana keessatti firiin yeroo dheeraa timaamamuu hin danda'u.

sourceString: Third, because of the limited availability of testing in many jurisdictions during this period, this analysis is likely biased toward more severe cases, and findings might change as testing becomes more widespread.
targetString: Sadaffaa, yeroo ammaa kanatti bakkeewwan hedduu keessatti sababa qorannoon muraasa ta'eef, qaaccessi kun harka caaluwarra dhukkuba daran hamaa ta'e qaban irratti xiyyeeffata, argannoon isaa ammoo qorannoon akka babal'ateen jijijjiiramuu danda'a.

sourceString: Fourth, because of the descriptive nature of these data, attack rates among persons with and without underlying health conditions could not be compared, and thus the risk difference of severe disease with COVID-19 between these groups could not be estimated.
targetString: Arfaffaa, sababa amala ibsa ragaalee kanniiniitiif hammi haleellaa namoota rakkoolee fayyaa biroo qabanii fi hinqabne gidduu jiru waliin madaalamuu hin dandeenye; kanaaf, garaagarummaan balaa dhukkuba hamaa COVID-19 wajjinii kan gareewwan kanniin gidduu jiru tilmaamamuu hin dandeenye.

sourceString: Fifth, no conclusions could be drawn about underlying conditions that were not included in the case report form or about different conditions that were reported in a single, umbrella category.
targetString: Shanaffaa, waa'ee rakkoolee fayyaa biroo, kanneen uunkaa gabaasaa keessatti hin hammatamin yookaan waa'ee haalota garaagaraa kanneen akka garee tokkicha wantoota hedduu of keessatti hammatuutti gabaafaman ilaalchisee yaada waliigalaarra ga'uun hin danda'amu.

sourceString: For example, asthma and COPD were included in a chronic lung disease category.
targetString: Fakkeenyaaf, asmii fi COPD akaakuu dhibee sombaa rakkisaa keessatti hammataman.

sourceString: Finally, for some underlying health conditions and risk factors, including neurologic disorders, chronic liver disease, being a current smoker, and pregnancy, few severe outcomes were reported; therefore, conclusions cannot be drawn about the risk for severe COVID-19 among persons in these groups.
targetString: Dhumarratti, rakkoowwan fayyaa dabalataa tokko tokkoo fi wantoota balaa fidaniif, toora gadhiisuu narvii, dhibee tiruu yeroo dheeraaf turu, yeroo ammaa tamboo xuuxaa jiraachuu, fi ulfa dabalatee fidumsa hamaa muraasa qofatu gabaafame; waan kana ta'eef, namoota gareewwan kanniin keessa jiraniif waa'ee balaa hamaa COVID-19 ilaalchisee yaada waliigalaa irra ga'uun hin danda'amu.

sourceString: Persons in the United States with underlying health conditions appear to be at higher risk for more severe COVID-19, consistent with findings from other countries.
targetString: Namoonni Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keessaa kanneen rakkoolee fayyaa biroo qaban carraan dhibee COVID-19 hamaa ta'eef saaxilamuu isaanii guddaa fakkaata, kun immoo argannoowwan biyyoota biroo waliin walirra bu'eera.

sourceString: Persons with underlying health conditions who have symptoms of COVID-19, including fever, cough, or shortness of breath, should immediately contact their health care provider.
targetString: Ho'ina qaamaa, qufaa, ciccituu hafuuraa dabalatee namootni haala fayyaasaanii keessatti mallattoo COVID-19 qabaachaa jiran, ogeessa fayyaa isaanii ariitiidhaan quunnamuu qabu.

sourceString: These persons should take steps to protect themselves from COVID-19, through washing their hands; cleaning and disinfecting high-touch surfaces; and social distancing, including staying at home, avoiding crowds, gatherings, and travel, and avoiding contact with persons who are ill.
targetString: Namoonni kun COVID-19 irraa of eeguuf tarkaanfii mataa isaanii fudhachuu qabu; harkasaanii dhiqachuu,qulqulleessituu (sanitizer) fayyadan=muu, iddoo namootaa irraa of eeguu, mana turuu, iddoo namni itti baay'atu deemuu dhiisuu fi namoota dhukkubsatan waliin tuttuqqaa dhiisuu.

sourceString: Maintaining at least a 30-day supply of medication, a 2-week supply of food and other necessities, and knowledge of COVID-19 symptoms are recommended for those with underlying health conditions.
targetString: Namooti dhibee fayyaa biroo qaban yoo xiqqaate dhiyeessii qorichaa guyyaa 30, dhiyeessii nyaataa fi wantoota barbaachisoo biroon torbanitti aal 2 akka argatan taasisuunii fimallattoolee COVID-19 beekuun ni gorfama.

sourceString: All persons should take steps to protect themselves from COVID-19 and to protect others.
targetString: Namoonni hundinuu COVID-19 irraa ofii isaanii fi warren biros eeguuf tarkanfiwwan fudhachu qabu.

sourceString: All persons who are ill should stay home, except to get medical care; should not go to work; and should stay away from others.
targetString: Yoo kunuunsa fayyaa isaan barbaachiseen alatti namoonni dhukkubsatan hundi mana keessa turuu qabu, hojii deemuu hinqaban, warra kaan irraas fagaachuu qabu.

sourceString: This is especially important for those who work with persons with underlying conditions or who otherwise are at high risk for severe outcomes from COVID-19.
targetString: Kun keessumaa warren namoota waliin haaluma jiru keessatti hojjetaniif baay'ee murteessaadha. Gama biroon warra COVID-19'n balaa guddaa irraan ga'uu danda'u.

sourceString: Community mitigation strategies, which aim to slow the spread of COVID-19, are important to protect all persons from COVID-19, especially persons with underlying health conditions and other persons at risk for severe COVID-19–associated disease (https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/downloads/community-mitigation-strategy.pdf).
targetString: Tarsiimoowwan hawaasarraa salphisuu, kanneen tatamsa'ina COVID-19 xiqqeessuu kaayyeeffatan, namoota hunda COVID-19 irraa eeguuf barbaachisoodha, keessumaa immoo namoota dhukkuboota biroo qabanii fi namoota biroo kanneen dhukkuba hamaa COVID-19 waliin walqabateen qabamuuf carraa guddaa qabaniif (https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/downloads/community-mitigation-strategy.pdf).

sourceString: What is already known about this topic?
targetString: Waa'ee mataduree kanaa hanga ammaatti maaltu beekame?

sourceString: Published reports from China and Italy suggest that risk factors for severe COVID-19 disease include underlying health conditions, but data describing underlying health conditions among U.S. COVID-19 patients have not yet been reported.
targetString: Gabaasonni maxxanfaman, kanneen Chaayinaafi Xaaliyaanii irraa akka yaada dhiyeessanitti dhukkuba hamaa COVID-19 tiif sababoonni balaa ta'an rakkoolee fayyaa biroo of keessatti qabatu, ragaan dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keesssaa, kanneen rakkoolee fayyaa biroo ibsan, hanga ammaatti hin gabaafamne.

sourceString: What is added by this report?
targetString: Gabaasa kanaan maaltu dabalame?

sourceString: Based on preliminary U.S. data, persons with underlying health conditions such as diabetes mellitus, chronic lung disease, and cardiovascular disease, appear to be at higher risk for severe COVID-19–associated disease than persons without these conditions.
targetString: Ragaa Yuunaayitid Isteetsi jalqabaa irratti hundaa'uudhaan, namoonni dhukkuboota biroo kanneen akka dhibee shukkaaraa, dhukkuba sombaa yeroo dheeraa, akkasumas dhukkuba onnee qaban warra dhukkuboota dabalataa kanniin hinqabne caalaa dhukkuba cimaa COVID-19 waliin walqabateef saaxilamuudhaaf carraa guddaa qabu.

sourceString: What are the implications for public health practice?
targetString: Agarsiistuun fayyaa addunyaa maalfaadha?

sourceString: Strategies to protect all persons and especially those with underlying health conditions, including social distancing and handwashing, should be implemented by all communities and all persons to help slow the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: Tarsiimoon nama hundumaan, keessumaa warra rakkoo dhibee fayyaa qaban eeguu, gargar siquu fi harka dhiqachuu dabalatee, ummata hundumaa fi nama hundumaaa biratti daddarbiinsa COVID-19 ittisuuf hojiitti hiikamuu qaba.

sourceString: Emergence of a Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19): Protocol for Extending Surveillance Used by the Royal College of General Practitioners Research and Surveillance Centre and Public Health England
targetString: Dhufaatii Vaayirasii Koroonaa Haarawa (COVID-19): Seera Hordoffii Kooleejiin Rooyaal kan Hordoffii fi Qo'annoo Ogeessota Fayyaa Waligalaa Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii itti Fayyadamu Dheeressan

sourceString: The Royal College of General Practitioners (RCGP) Research and Surveillance Centre (RSC) and Public Health England (PHE) have successfully worked together on the surveillance of influenza and other infectious diseases for over 50 years, including three previous pandemics.
targetString: Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) fi Fayyaan Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) waggoota 50 oliif hordoffii infiluweenzaafi dhukkuboota daddarboo biroo irratti, weeraroota dhibeewwan daddarboo sadii kanaan duraa dabalatee, milkaa'inaan waliin hojjetanii jiru.

sourceString: With the emergence of the international outbreak of the coronavirus infection (COVID-19), a UK national approach to containment has been established to test people suspected of exposure to COVID-19.
targetString: Ka'umsa jalqabbii dhukkuba koroonaa vaayirasii (COVID-19) biyyaalessaa wajjin, tooftaan to'annaa biyyaalessaa Yuunaayitid Kiingidam, namoota COVID-19 dhaaf saaxilamaniiru jedhamanii shakkaman qorachuudhaaf dhaabbate.

sourceString: At the same time and separately, the RCGP RSC's surveillance has been extended to monitor the temporal and geographical distribution of COVID-19 infection in the community as well as assess the effectiveness of the containment strategy.
targetString: Yerooma wal fakkaatuttiifi adda addatti, hordoffiin Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) faffaca'insa hawaasa keessaa dhukkuba COVID-19 kan yeroo fi bakkaanii to'achuuf, akkasumas bu'a-qabeessummaa tarsiimoo to'annaa gamaaggamuuf jecha dheereffamee jira.

sourceString: The aims of this study are to surveil COVID-19 in both asymptomatic populations and ambulatory cases with respiratory infections, ascertain both the rate and pattern of COVID-19 spread, and assess the effectiveness of the containment policy.
targetString: Kaayyoowwan qo'annoo kanaa namoota mallattoo hin agarsiisneefi dhukkubsattoota socho'an, kanneen dhukkuba hafuuraan darbu qaban lachuu keessatti COVID-19 hordofuu, hammaafi amala tatamsa'ina COVID-19 mirkaneessuu, akkasumas bu'a qabeessummaa himaammata to'annaa gamaaggamuudha.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC, a network of over 500 general practices in England, extract pseudonymized data weekly.
targetString: RCGP RSC'n Ingilaandi keessatti Neetwoorkii yaaliiwwan waliigalaa 500, odeeffannoo qindataa torbeef moggaasni ni dhiba.

sourceString: This extended surveillance comprises of five components: (1) Recording in medical records of anyone suspected to have or who has been exposed to COVID-19.
targetString: Hordoffiin dheereffame kun wantoota shan of keessaa qaba: (1) Nama COVID-19 qaba jedhamee shakkamu yookaan nama dhukkubichaaf saaxilame galmee fayyaa keessatti galmeessuu.

sourceString: Computerized medical records suppliers have within a week of request created new codes to support this.
targetString: Dhiyeessitoonni galmeewwan fayyaa koompiitaraan hojjetanii kan deeggaruudhaaf torban tokko gaaffiin dhiyeeffameef keessatti koodiiwwan haaraa uumani.

sourceString: (2) Extension of current virological surveillance and testing people with influenza-like illness or lower respiratory tract infections (LRTI)—with the caveat that people suspected to have or who have been exposed to COVID-19 should be referred to the national containment pathway and not seen in primary care.
targetString: (2) Babal'isuun hordoffii qorannoo vaayirasii yeroo ammaa fi namoota dhukkuba akka infiluweenzaa yookaan dhukkuboota ujummoo qilleensaa isa gajjallaa (LRTI) qaban qorachuu—namoonni COVID-19 qabu jedhamanii shakkaman yookaan namoonni dhukkuba kanaaf saaxilaman gara kallattii to'annoo biyyaalessaatti qajeelfamuu qabu malee bakkee kunuunsa bu'uraa keessatti argamuu hinqaban akeekkachiisa jedhu waliin.

sourceString: (3) Serology sample collection across all age groups.
targetString: (3) Funaansa samuuda qorannoo dhiigaa kan gareewwan umurii hundaa.

sourceString: This will be an extra blood sample taken from people who are attending their general practice for a scheduled blood test.
targetString: Kuni naamunaa dhiigaa baayyee uummata walii galaatti qorannoodhaaf achitti dabaree isaanii eegaa jiran irraa kan fuudhameedha

sourceString: The 100 general practices currently undertaking annual influenza virology surveillance will be involved in the extended virological and serological surveillance.
targetString: Ogeessonni fayyaa 100 kanneen yeroo ammaa hordoffii vaayirasii infiluweenzaa kan waggaa adeemsisaa jiran hordoffii qorannoo vaayirasiitii fi dhiigaa dheereffame keessatti ni hirmaatu.

sourceString: (4) Collecting convalescent serum samples.
targetString: (4) Samuudota dhiiga nama dhukkubicha dandamatee walitti qabuu.

sourceString: We have the opportunity to escalate the data extraction to twice weekly if needed.
targetString: Yoo barbaachisaa ta'e ragaalee walitti qabnu kana ol guddisnee torbanitti yeroo lama guuruuf carraa qabna.

sourceString: Swabs and sera will be analyzed in PHE reference laboratories.
targetString: Samuudi huccuu cittuun dhufeefi dhiigi laabiraatooriiwwan Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) kan irraa ilaalanii hojjettan keessatti qaacceffama.

sourceString: General practice clinical system providers have introduced an emergency new set of clinical codes to support COVID-19 surveillance.
targetString: Hordoffii COVID-19 deeggaruuf dhiyeessitoonni tajaajila waliigalaa mala wal'aansaa koodii wal'aansaa haaraa kan yeroo atattamaa eegalaniiru.

sourceString: Additionally, practices participating in current virology surveillance are now taking samples for COVID-19 surveillance from low-risk patients presenting with LRTIs.
targetString: Dabalataan, ogeessonni fayyaa hordoffii qorannoo vaayirasii yeroo ammaa keessatti hirmaachaa jiran hordoffii COVID-19 tiif dhukkubsattoota saaxilammi isaanii gad aanaa ta'e dhibamuu ujummoo qilleensaa wara gajjallaa (LRTI) isaanii dhiyeessuudhaan samuuda irraa fuudhaa jiru.

sourceString: Within the first 2 weeks of setup of this surveillance, we have identified 3 cases: 1 through the new coding system, the other 2 through the extended virology sampling.
targetString: Hordoffiin kun eegalamee torban jalqabaa 2n keessatti dhukkubsattoota 3 adda baasnee jirra: 1 karaa sirna koodii gochuu isa haaraa, warri hafan 2n immoo karaa samuudessuu qorannoo vaayirasiitiin addda baafaman.

sourceString: We have rapidly converted the established national RCGP RSC influenza surveillance system into one that can test the effectiveness of the COVID-19 containment policy.
targetString: Mala hordoffii infiluweenzaa Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) biyyoolessaa baratamee jiru atattamaan gara isa bu'a qabeessummaa imaammata to'annaa COVID-19 qorachuu danda'uutti jijjiirree jirra.

sourceString: The extended surveillance has already seen the use of new codes with 3 cases reported.
targetString: Baballiinsa to'annoo gabaasa dhibee gabaafame 3 wajjin bu'aan lakkaddaa haaraa mullateera.

sourceString: Rapid sharing of this protocol should enable scientific critique and shared learning.
targetString: Seerota kanniin dafanii waliif qooduun qeeqa saayinsaawaa argachuu fi beekumsa waliif qooduu nama dandeessisuu qaba.

sourceString: The Royal College of General Practitioners (RCGP) Research and Surveillance Centre (RSC) is a network of general practices (GPs) with a nationally representative population that provides pseudonymized data for weekly surveillance of infectious diseases.
targetString: Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) walitti hidhama hojiiwwan fayyaa waliigalaa (GPs) baayi'na sadarkaa biyyaaessaatti bakka bu'aa ta'e qabu, kan hordoffii torban torbanii dhibeewwan daddarbootiif ragaa maqaan nama ragaa kennee dhokfamedhiyeessudha.

sourceString: The disease surveillance program is commissioned by Public Health England (PHE) and covers 37 infectious diseases, including influenza.
targetString: Sagantaa hordoffii dhukkubaa kana Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE)tu akka hojjetamuuf kenne. Sagantaan kun infiluweenzaa dabalatee dhukkuboota daddarboo 37 waliin ga'a.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC and PHE have an established collaboration of over 50 years in influenza and respiratory disease surveillance and are now in their 53rd season of surveillance and analysis.
targetString: Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) fi Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) hordoffii infiluweenzaatiifi dhukkuba ujummoo qilleensaa irratti waggoota 50 oliif gamtaa bu'urri isaa cimaa qabu, amma immoo waqtii 53 ffaa hordoffii fi qaaccessaa keessa jiru.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC extracts pseudonymized data from a nationally representative sample of over 500 urban and nonurban GPs each week covering a population of over 4 million.
targetString: Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) ragaa maqaan abbaa ragaa dhokataa iddattoo biyyaalessa bakka bu'u, kan namoota miliyoona 4 olii, ogeessota fayyaa magaalaa fi baadiyyaa jiran 500 irraa torban torbaniin walitti qaba.

sourceString: Data from these practices are reported online in a weekly return, which includes monitoring weekly rates of influenza-like illness (ILI) and other communicable and respiratory diseases in England.
targetString: Ragaaleen hojiiwwan kanniin irraa argaman torban torbaniin toora intarneetiirratti gabaafamu, kun immoo dhukkuba dhibee qufaa fakkaatu (ILI) akkasumas dhukkuboota namaa namatti darbanii fi dhukkuboota qaamolee hafuura baafannaa biroo biyya Ingilizii keessaatiin torbanitti namni meeqa akka qabame to'achuufaa dabalata.

sourceString: We also produce an annual report.
targetString: Akkasumas, gabaasa waggaa ni qopheessina.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC data set includes all coded data and all prescribed items including vaccine exposure.
targetString: Tuuti odeeffannoo qindataa RCGP RSC daataa addaa fi maalimaa ajajjuu gosa talaallii adda baasuu wajjin hunduma ni hammata.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC conducts virology surveillance each influenza season, with 100 GPs participating in the 2019-2020 season (Figure 1).
targetString: Waqtii 2019-2020 keessa doktoroota hojii fayyaa waliigalaa hojjetan 100 hirmaachisuudhaan, Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) tokkoon tokkoon waqtii infiluweenzaatti hordoffii qorannoo vaayirasii taasisa (Fakkii 1).

sourceString: These virology sampling practices are also recruited to be nationally representative (Figure 1).
targetString: Hojiiwwan samuuda vaayirasii fuudhuu kunniinis akka biyyaalessaatti lakkoofsi isaanii ga'aa akka ta'anitti fiffilataman (Fakkii 1).

sourceString: GPs take nasopharyngeal swabs from persons showing acute respiratory illness within 7 days of the onset of symptoms.
targetString: GPs'n namoota jalqabuu mallattoo saniirraa kaasee guyyaa 7 keessatti dhibee hargansuu cimaan hubaman qulqulleessituu madaa nasopharyngeal fuudha.

sourceString: Nasopharyngeal swabs are taken from children younger than 5 years showing symptoms of acute bronchitis or bronchiolitis.
targetString: Qulqulleessituuwwan Nasopharyngeal daa'imoota waggaa 5 olii warra mallattoo dhibee hargansuu qaban irraa fuudhama.

sourceString: Additionally, nasopharyngeal samples are taken from anyone 5 years and older showing acute onset of ILI and respiratory synctial virus.
targetString: Dabalataan, samuudawwan qoonqoo keessaa, kanneen dafee jalqabuu dhibee ujummoo qilleensaa isa gajjallaa (ILI) fi vaayirasii ujummoo hafuuraa agarsiisan nama waggaa 5 fi isaa olii kam irraa iyyuu fuudhamaniiru.

sourceString: Swabs are tested at the PHE Respiratory Virus Unit for influenza to monitor positivity rates and circulating strains, as well as for measuring vaccine effectiveness.
targetString: Hamma qabaman to'achuufi akaakuu isaa beeksisuuf, akkasumas bu'a-qabeessummaa talaallii safaruuf jiidhi huccuun fuudhame Kutaa Vaayirasii Hafuuraan Darbuu kan infiluweenzaa isa kan Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) tti qoratama.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC successfully conducted a pilot collecting serological samples from adults and linking them to a patient's medical records during the 2018-2019 influenza season.
targetString: Waqtii infiluweenzaa 2018-2019 keessa Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) haala milkaawaa ta'een qo'annoo jalqabaa xiqqaadhaan samuudota qorannoo dhiigaa ga'eessota irraa fuudhuu fi galmee fayyaa dhukkubsataa waliin wal qabsiisuu adeemsisee ture.

sourceString: This pilot was in collaboration with the PHE Seroepidemiology Unit and added to the residual blood samples submitted to PHE by National Health Service (NHS) laboratories.
targetString: Qorannoon xiqqoon kun Kutaa Seeroo eppiidemiyooloojii Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) waliin adeemsifamee haftee samuuda dhiigaa laabiraatooriiwwan Tajaajila Fayyaa Biyyaalessaatiin (NHS) Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) tti galfame itti dabale.

sourceString: Serology can provide important information about background population immunity, and sentinel networks can provide a mechanism for systematic data collection and linkage to medical records and health outcomes.
targetString: Qorannoon dhiigaa waa'ee baay'ina dhukkuba ittisuu duubaa ilaalchisee odeeffannoo gaarii kennuu danda'a, neetoorkiiwwan agarsiistuu jiraachuu dhukkubaa immoo funaansa ragaa sirnaan adeemsifamuu fi hidhata inni galmeewwan fayyaa fi bu'aaawwan fayyaatiif tooftaa dhiyeessuu danda'u.

sourceString: The serology pilot has demonstrated the ability of the network to collect serology samples in adults.
targetString: Qo'annoon dhiigaa xiqqaan sun dandeettii walitti hidhamichi samuuda dhiigaa ga'eessotaa walitti qabuuf qabu agarsiisee jira.

sourceString: With the COVID-19 outbreak, PHE and RCGP RSC have adapted existing influenza surveillance to monitor the spread of COVID-19 in the community, and this protocol sets out the basis for that collaboration.
targetString: Ka'umsa COVID-19 wajjin, PHE fi RCGP RSC'n to'annoo faffaca'iinsa COVID-19'n hawaasa keessatti qabu dursuuf Influweenzaa jiru waliin madaqe, aaloon kun ammoo hojiiwwan wallinii bu'uuraa qindeessa.

sourceString: The primary national strategy for COVID-19 infection is containment, with patients who are at high risk managed via the telephone help system NHS111 and the PHE health protection teams, but the RCGP RSC surveillance is entirely separate.
targetString: Tarsiimoo ijoon biyyaalessaa dhukkuba COVID-19 to'annaadha, dhukkubsattoonni balaa cimaadhaaf saaxilaman mala gargaarsa sirna bilbilaatiin NHS 111 fi gareewwan eegumsa fayyaa Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) tiin to'achuu danda'an, garuu hordoffiin Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) guutummaan guutuutti adda ba'ee jira.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC, by extending its established work, will provide virological and serological surveillance to monitor the temporal and geographical distribution of COVID-19 infection in the community, and assess the effectiveness of the containment strategy.
targetString: Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP), hojii isaa beekamaa bal'isuudhaan, faffaca'iinsa yeroo fi bakkaa COVID-19 hawaasa keessaa to'achuu fi bu'a qabeessummaa tarsiimoo to'annaa gamaaggamuudhaaf hordoffii qorannoo vaayirasii fi dhiigaa ni dhiyeessa.

sourceString: We would not be working in isolation on this research.
targetString: Research kana irratti nuti waa'ee adda baasuu irratti hojjechaa hin jirru.

sourceString: We will share the protocol with UK colleagues and the I-MOVE consortium who have recently obtained EU Horizon 2020 funding from the stream “Advancing knowledge for the clinical and public health response to the novel coronavirus epidemic”.
targetString: Hiriyoota UK fi gartuun I-MOVE warri dhiyeenya kana Horizon 2020 maddicharraa baasuu ‘'dhibee haaraa vaayirasi kaoroonaatiif hubee dandamachiisu dhaabbata fayyaa fi ummataaf kennuu'' baratan waliin aaloo ni qooddanna.

sourceString: It is anticipated that great efficiencies in project management will result through this collaboration than that obtained from countries acting alone.
targetString: Isa biyyoota qofaa isaanii hojjetan irraa argame caalaa bu'a qabeessummaa guddaan to'annaa pirojektii keessaa karaa walta'iinsa kanaa dhufa jedhamee yaadama.

sourceString: The aim of this study is to identify whether there is undetected community transmission of COVID-19, estimate population susceptibility, and monitor the temporal and geographical distribution of COVID-19 infection in the community.
targetString: Kaayyoon qo'annoo kanaa daddarbi COVID-19 hawaasa keessaa hinmul'anne jiraachuu fi dhiisuu isaa adda baafachuuf, uummati meeqa qabamuu akka danda'u tilmaamuuf, akkasumas faffaca'a yeroo fi bakkaa dhukkuba COVID-19 hawaasa keessaa to'achuufidha.

sourceString: The objectives of this study are as follows:
targetString: Kaayyoon qorannoo kanaa akka kanatti fufee jiruudha.

sourceString: To monitor the burden of suspected COVID-19 activity in the community through primary care surveillance and clinical coding of possible COVID-19 cases referred into the containment pathway
targetString: Ba'aa COVID-19 shakkamee to'achuuf, gochi ummata keessaa yaalii to'annoo jalqabaa fi moggaasa kilinikaa COVID-19 uumamuu danda'u karaawwan daddarbiinsa isaa ittiin ittisuu dandeenyu keessatti eeramaniiru.

sourceString: To provide virological evidence on the presence and extent of undetected community transmission of COVID-19 and monitor positivity rates among individuals presenting ILI or acute respiratory tract infections to primary care
targetString: Ragaa jiraachuu fi daddarbiinsa dhibee COVID-19 ummata keessaa adda hin baanee fi hammamtaa namoota dhuunfaa dhibichaan qabamanii ILI ‘n kennamaafii jiruu ykn rakkoon hargansuu isaan mudatee irratti ragaa qorannoo vaayirasii to'annoo jalqabaa argamsiisa.

sourceString: To estimate baseline susceptibility to COVID-19 in the community and estimate both symptomatic and asymptomatic exposure rates in the population through seroprevalence monitoring
targetString: Sarjala fedha eeguu COVID-19 hawaasa keessaa fi mallattoo akkasumas hammamtaa baballatiinsa hawaasa keessaa karaa lachuu seroprevalence monitoring timaamuuf

sourceString: To pilot implementation of a scheme for collection of convalescent sera with antibody profiles among recovered cases of COVID-19 discharged to the community
targetString: Sagantaa dhiiga namoota fayyanii fuudhuu kan odeeffannoo wantoota qaama namaa keessaa dhukkuba ittisanii, kan dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 irraa fayyanii hawaasatti makamanii isa jalqabaa hojiirra oolchuuf

sourceString: We intend to capture the following.
targetString: Wantoota armaan gadii qabachuudhaaf yaadna.

sourceString: Clinical workload related to reports of COVID-19 using the codes created to flag cases, those being assessed and where the infection is located are excluded (Figures 2-​-44)
targetString: Baay'inni hojii mana yaalaa keessaa gabaasa COVID-19 koodiiwwan dhukkubsattoota adda baasuuf uumaman fayyadamuudhaan dhiyaatan waliin walqabatan, kanneen gamaaggamamaa jiranii fi bakki faalamichi itti argame keessaa hambifamaniiru (Fakkiiwwan 2-44).

sourceString: Foreign countries visited in the last 28 days
targetString: Biyyoota alaa guyyoota 28n darban keessatti daawwataman

sourceString: Existing codes that may have utility (Tables 1-​-3).3).
targetString: Koodiiwwan amma iyyuu jiran kanneen tajaajiloota qabaachuu malan (Gabatee 1-3).3).

sourceString: Many GPs and primary care teams may not realize that important relevant data can be coded.
targetString: GPs baay'ee fi gartuun yaalii jalqabaa odeeffannoo qindataan faayidaa qabu mogga'uu akka danda;u xiinxaluu dhiisuu malu.

sourceString: There is also the potential during any pandemic to monitor the effectiveness of any transmission control measures.
targetString: Yeroo weerara dhibee daddarbaa kamitti iyyuu carraan bu'a qabeessummaa tarkaanfiiwwan to'annaa namaa namatti darbuu dhukkubaa kamiinuu to'achuus jira.

sourceString: Reliable coding of letters and test results that will show an infection has become either confirmed or excluded
targetString: Koodii taasisuun qubeewwanii amansiisaanii fi bu'aawwan qorannoo faalamuu agarsiisan yookaan mirkaneeffamaniiru yookaan immoo keessaa hambifamaniiru.

sourceString: The methods will follow the approach used in the current influenza surveillance system and recent serology study, and includes five components: (1) primary care clinical surveillance; (2) virological surveillance; (3) population serological surveillance; (4) convalescent sera in cases; and (5) data curation.
targetString: Malleen sun mala to'annoo Influweenzaa fi qorannoo dhiigaa amma fayyadamamaa jiran hordofuuf jira, akkasumas qaamota shan hammachuun: (1) to'annoo eeggannaa kilinikaa jalqabaa; (2) to'annoo vaayirasii; (3) to'annoo haala dhiiga ummataa; (4) haala dandamannaa dhibee dhiiga waliin wal qabatuu; (5) qulqullina odeeffannoo qindataa

sourceString: The NHS uses the Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine Clinical Terms (SNOMED CT) system of coding, which is normally only updated twice annually.
targetString: Tajaajilli Fayyaa Biyyaalessaa (NHS) mala ittiin koodii taasisan kan Moggaasa Sirnaawaa Jechoota Qo'annoo fi Wal'aansa Dhibee (SNOMED CT) jedhamu, kan waggaatti aal lama qofa haareffamuun beekamu fayyadama.

sourceString: There was added complexity as some computerized medical record (CMR) suppliers use the Read coding systems (Read clinical terms version 3 – CTv3), which is no longer updated.
targetString: Dhiyeessitoonni galmeewwan mana yaalaa koompiitaraan deeggaramanii (CMR) tokko tokko mala koodii taasisuu ‘Read', isa yeroo ammaa haareffamaa hinjirre waan fayyadamaniif (jechoota waldhaansaa Read marsaa 3—CTv3) wantichi daran walxaxaa ta'eera.

sourceString: Additionally, there were no clinical codes to record COVID-19 in early February 2020.
targetString: Dabalataan, Gurraandhala 2020 keessa COVID-19 galmeessuuf koodiiwwan dhukkubsataa hinjiran turan.

sourceString: Therefore, the two main GP system suppliers added the five terms shown in Table 4 as system-wide local codes.
targetString: Waan kana ta'eef, dhiyeessitoonni guguddoon sirna GP lamaanii akka koodii naannoo sirnawwan hundaatti jechoota shan Gabatee 4 keessatti agarsiifaman itti dabalanii jiru.

sourceString: A UK emergency release of SNOMED CT concepts for COVID-19 was also subsequently made available across all CMR systems (Table 4).
targetString: Akkasumas, yaadawwan ‘SNOMED CT' kan COVID-19 Yuunaayitid Kiingidam atattamaan gad dhiiste boodarra sirnawwan ‘CMR' hunda keessa akka jiraatu taasifameera (Gabatee 4).

sourceString: The intention is that these will eventually be mapped to the new SNOMED CT concepts as they become available, allowing recording of relevant data (Multimedia Appendix 1).
targetString: Kaayyoon isaa wantoonni kunniin akkuma isaan argamaniin dhumarratti yaadota ragaalee barbaachisoon akka isaan galmeeffamaniif hayyamaa ‘SNOMED CT' haaraa waliin walitti makamu (Dabalee Maltiimiidiyaa 1).

sourceString: The key requirements for this release were the ability to code (Table 4) a case of COVID-19, exposure to risk of infection (travel to an area where there may be a higher risk), contact with anyone infected with COVID-19, a report that a person had been tested for COVID-19, and that the disease had been excluded (likely a negative test).
targetString: Gad-dhiifamuu kanaatiif ulaagaaleen furtuu ta'an kanniin turan: dandeettii nama COVID-19 qabame koodii taasisuu (Gabatee 4), balaa faalamuutiif saaxilamuu (bakkee dhukkubichaan qabamuudhaaf carraan isaa guddaa ta'etti imaluu), nama COVID-19 dhaan qabame kamiinuu waliin tuttuqqii qabaachuu, namni tokko kanaan dura qorannaa COVID-19 taasisuun isaa, fi dhukkubichi dhibamuun gabaafamuu (bu'aa qorannoo negetiivii ta'uu danda'a).

sourceString: In addition, practices are now able to code any foreign travel undertaken, including the ability to record visits to multiple countries (implemented February 8, 2020).
targetString: Kanatti dabaluudhaan, ogeessonni fayyaa dandeettii imaloota biyya hedduutti taasifaman galmeessuu dabalatee, imala biyya alaatti taasifame kam iyyuu yeroo ammaa koodii gochuu danda'aniiru (Gurraandhala 8, 2020 hojiirra oole).

sourceString: Figures 2-​-44 show the EMIS web implementation.
targetString: Fakkiiwwan 2—44 tti jiran hojiitti hiikuu marsariitii Malawwan Odeeffannoo Fayyaa Eegtan (EMIS) agarsiisu.

sourceString: Currently, virology samples for influenza surveillance are accompanied by a standard request form.
targetString: Yeroo ammaatti, samuuda qorannoo vaayirasii kan hordoffii infiluweenzaa wajjin uunkaa gaaffii baratamaatu guutama.

sourceString: For COVID-19, we will create a new request form that will record:
targetString: COVID-19 dhaaf uunkaa gaaffii haarawa isa wantoota kanniin galmeessu uumna:

sourceString: Date of onset of symptoms
targetString: Guyyaa mallattooleen itti eegalan

sourceString: Diagnosis of any of the following:
targetString: Qorannoo mallattoolee armaan gadii keessaa kamiinuu:

sourceString: Acute bronchitis/bronchiolitis in those younger than five years
targetString: Dhukkuba ujummoo sombaa hamaa kan daa'imman waggaa shanii gadii irratti mul'atu

sourceString: Lower respiratory tract infection (LRTI)
targetString: Dhukkuba ujummoo qilleensaa isa gajjallaa (LRTI)

sourceString: History of fever (Y/N); measured (Y/N); if yes, level
targetString: Seenaa ho'ina qaamaa (Y/N); safarama (Y/N); yoo eeyyee jette, sadarkaa

sourceString: Shortness of breath (Y/N), if measured: oxygen saturation and respiratory rate
targetString: Hafuura kutaan (E/L), yoo safarame: ooksijiiniin hammam hammamitti keessatti akka fudhatamuu fi hafuurri hammam hammamitti akka baafatamuu

sourceString: Recent travel (Y/N); if yes, countries visited in last 14 days
targetString: Adeemsa dhiyoo (Y/N); yoo sirrii ta'e, magaalonni guyyoottan 14'n darban keessatti daawwatamaniiru.

sourceString: Contact with a named person with confirmed COVID-19 (Y/N) with a free text comment about the level of certainty
targetString: Tuttuqqii nama maqaan kennameef waliinii, kan COVID-19 qabaachuun isaa mirkanaa'e (E/L)waa'ee sadarkaa amansiisummaa irratti yaada barreeffamaa bilisaa wajjin.

sourceString: These codes will be grouped ontologically into “definite”, “probable”, “possible”, and “not a case” using our standard approach to grouping codes (Table 5), which has been used previously across disease areas.
targetString: Koodiiwwan kunniin amala isaaniirratti hundaa'uun, adeemsa beekamaa koodiiwwan ittiin qoodnu (Gabatee 5), isa kanaan dura bakkeewwan dhukkubaa hundatti dhimma itti ba'aa turre fayyadamuudhaan gareewwan “mirkanaawaa”, “ta'uu mala”, “ta'uu danda'a” fi “kan hinqabamin” jedhamanitti qoodamu.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC definition for ILI is shown in Multimedia Appendix 2.
targetString: Hiiki ILI kan Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) Dabalee Maltiimiidiyaa 2 keessatti agarsiifamee jira.

sourceString: Public Presentation of Data Using an Observatory and Dashboards
targetString: Bakkee irraa daawataniifi Daashboordii FayyadamuudhaanRagaa Uummataa Dhiyeessuu

sourceString: We will develop an observatory to present data nationally and a dashboard for feedback to practices about their data quality and collection of virology and serology samples.
targetString: Ragaa akka biyyaalessaatti dhiyeessuuf bakkee irraa daawatamu ni ijaarra, waa'ee qulqullina ragaa isaanii fi funaansa samuuda qorannoo vaayirasii fi dhiigaa ilaalchisee ogeeyyii fayyaatiifis gabataa duubdeebii ni hojjenna.

sourceString: This is based on coding described in Table 4.
targetString: Kun akkaataa koodii gochuu Gabatee 4 keessaa irratti kan hundaa'edha.

sourceString: Definite case will be presented on our dashboard as “cases” of COVID-19.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoonni mirkaneeffaman daashboordii keenya irratti akka “dhukkubsattoota” COVID-19 tti dhiyeeffamu.

sourceString: Possible cases will be presented as “Under investigation” (investigating).
targetString: Dhibeewwan mudachuu danda'an akka “qoratamaa jiru” (qorataa jirra) jedhutti ibsamuu malu.

sourceString: “Not a case” will be presented as “Excluded”.
targetString: “Dhukkubsataa miti” inni jedhu “Keessaa Hambifameera” jedhamee dhiyeeffama.

sourceString: Online data has been established within the initial few weeks in the COVID-19 Observatory (Figure 5), indicating the overall number of patients and rate per 10,000 patients of cases confirmed or under investigation, as well as where the virus is excluded.
targetString: Odeeffannoon qindataa karaarraa (online) torbanoota muraasa argamuu COVID-19 gara jalqabaa keessatti dhaabamaniiru (fakkii 5), lakkoofsa dhukkubsattoota hundaa fi saffisa dhukkubsattoota 10,000 keessaa mirkanaa'anii qorannoorra jiranii, akkasumas bakka vaayirasichi hin ga'iin jiru agarsiisa.

sourceString: We have the option to move to twice weekly surveillance reports with a scope to change this to daily reporting.
targetString: Nuti gabaasa birkii jijjiirama guyyuu kanaa filannoo torban keessatti si'a lama adeemnee gabaasa argachuu ni qabna.

sourceString: We will continue virology sampling from our sentinel practices, rather than discontinuing as seasonal influenza declines.
targetString: Nuti akka gadi bu'iinsa Influweenzaa lakkaa'uu dhiisuurra yaalii eegduu keenyarraatii fakkeenya virology adda baasuu itti fufna.

sourceString: Additionally, we will recruit more surveillance practices.
targetString: Dabalataan, gartuuwwan yaalii to'annoo caalmaan ni dhaabna.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC virology practices will aim to undertake 200-300 nasopharyngeal swabs per week across the RCGP RSC sentinel network, collecting specimens across all age bands.
targetString: Yaaliin qorannoo vaayirasii RCGP RSC fakkeenyota umurii hundaa keessa jiran walitti qabuun, jalqabbii 200-300 gama dabaree neetwoorkii RCGP RSC'n torbeedhaan qulqulleessuun dhukkubbii funyaanii fi qoonqoo waliin walqabatutti fuulleffata

sourceString: In addition to the inclusion criteria for influenza virology surveillance (ILI, acute bronchitis/bronchiolitis), participating practices will take nasopharyngeal swab samples from any people showing acute symptoms of LRTI if the onset of symptoms is within 7 days.
targetString: Ulaagaa hammachiisa hordoffii qorannoo vaayirasii infiluweenzaatti dabaluudhaan (dhibee qufaa fakkaatu (ILI), dhukkuba ujummoo sombaa hamaa), ogeeyyiin fayyaa itti hirmaatan nama mallattoo hamaa dhibee ujummoo qilleensaa warra gajjallaa (LRTI) agarsiisu kam irraa iyyuu yoo yeroon dhukkubichi itti eegale guyyoota 7 keessatti ta'e samuudawwan harsassee fuudhu.

sourceString: RCGP RSC research officers and practice liaison staff will manage practices to achieve a total national sample of 200-300 swabs per week.
targetString: Hojjettoonni qo'annoo Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) fi hojjettoonni waajjira bakka bu'iinsa hojii kana keessaa hojiiwwan kanniin to'achuudhaan kaayyoon akka biyyaalessaatti samuuda haxooftuutiin dhiyaatu kan waliigalaa torbanii 200-300 akka galma ga'u taasisu.

sourceString: This could be increased if PHE modelers require more samples.
targetString: Kun kan dabaluu danda'u yoo warri moodelii Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) hojjetan samuuda dabalataa isaan barbaachisedha.

sourceString: Samples from each practice would be spread across the following age groups: < 5 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and 65 years and older
targetString: Naamunaan namoota irraa fudhatame akka umurii kanatti aanee jirutti qoqqoodamuu qaba, waggaa < 5,waggaa 5-17, 18-64 fiwaggaa 65 ykn isaa ol.

sourceString: Samples (swabs or serum) collected will be sent via prepaid envelopes addressed to the appropriate PHE laboratory for analysis.
targetString: Saamuddiiwwan dhiigaa fuudhame teessoo sirrii ta'een gara PHE tti qorannoo laaboraatoriif ergama.

sourceString: All samples collected will be tested for the presence of influenza and COVID-19.
targetString: Naamunaan walitti qabame hundumtuu Infiluweenzaa fi COVID-19 ni qoratama.

sourceString: Additionally, PHE will retrospectively test any influenza virology samples collected between early and mid-February 2020 for COVID-19.
targetString: Dabalataan PHE'n akkasumas naamunaan vaayirasii infiluweenzaa kamiyyuu qoratee gara giddu galeessa gurraandhala 2020 COVID-19'dhaaf

sourceString: Practices will still follow the PHE protocol for COVID-19 with respect to people at risk of infection who should be signposted down the containment pathway, rather than physically attend their practice.
targetString: Yaaliiwwan ammayyuu COVID-19'f gara namoota dhibee kanaan hubamuu malanii, warra yaalii isaanii qaamaan hordofuurra qabiyyee karaa daddarbiinsaa hubachuu qabaniif aaloo PHE hordofu.

sourceString: Direct testing of those who attend surgery remains permitted, but we have also rolled out self-swabbing at home.
targetString: Namoota tajaajila baqaqsanii hodhuu argachuuf dhufaniif hayyami kallattiidhaan qoramuu ittuma fufa, garuu meeshaa manatti dhangala'aa qorachuu dandeessisu oomishneerra.

sourceString: Summary of processes are detailed in Multimedia Appendix 3.
targetString: Cuunfaan adeemsotaa Dabalee Maltiimiidiyaa 3 irratti gadi fageenyaan dhiyaatee jira.

sourceString: Everyone with an ILI or a respiratory illness who contacts a GP (eg, phones for an appointment) should be asked specifically about recent travel to China and other countries flagged in current PHE advice, or if they have had contact with other people with COVID-19.
targetString: Namni dhibee qufaa fakkaatu (ILI) yookaan dhukkuba ujummoo hafuuraa qabuu fi ogeessa fayyaa waliigalaa quunnamu (fakkeenyaaf, beellama qabachuuf jecha bilbiluu) dhiyootti Chaayinaa fi biyyoota biroo gorsa Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) yeroo ammaa keessatti akeekkachiisi irra jirutti imaluu isaa yookaan namoota biroo COVID-19 dhaan qabaman waliin wal quunnamuu isaa addumaan gaafatamuu qaba.

sourceString: If these screening enquiries are positive, the patient would be advised to not come to the practice but instead to follow the PHE flow sheet.
targetString: Yoo gaaffiin calalliiwwan kunneenii poosetiivii ta'e, dhukkubsatichi gara yaaliitti dhufuurra yaa'iinsa PHE akka ordofu gorfama.

sourceString: This can be by a reception or clinician staff, depending on individual practice protocol.
targetString: Kun simannaadhaan yookaan immoo kutaa kilinikaa aaloo nama dhuunfaa irratti hudaa'uun ta'uu danda'a.

sourceString: These calls should be coded into the GP CMR system and can be reported as part of the RCGP RSC weekly return.
targetString: Bilbiloonni kunniin sirna ‘GP CMR' keessatti koodii taasifamuu qabu, akkasumas akka qaama deebii torban torbanii Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) tti gabaafamuu danda'u.

sourceString: We have developed training material to support this coding (Multimedia Appendix 4).
targetString: Moggaasa (coding) kana deggeruuf meeshaalee shaakalaa hojjennee jirra (Multimedia Appendix 4).

sourceString: These include prompt cards for:
targetString: Kunis kaardii kaasaa of keessaa qabatu:

sourceString: Practice reception or triage staff: for coding of any patients calling the practice with symptoms of acute respiratory infection with a history of travel to important areas based on PHE advice
targetString: Keessummeessitoota shaakallii yookaan hojjettoota doktoratti nama dabarsan: dhukkubsattoota mallattoo dhukkubbii ujummoo qilleensaa hamaa agarsiisanii fi seenaa imala bakkeewwan barbaachisoo gorsa Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE)' irratti hundaa'an yemmuu isaan bilbilan koodii taasisuuf

sourceString: Administrative staff or clinicians who code: to encourage consistent coding of results for any suspected cases, including coding of negative results for exclusion
targetString: Hojjettoota bulchiinsaa yookaan ogeessota fayyaa warra koodii taasisan: keessaa hambisuudhaaf jecha bu'aawwan negetiivii ta'an koodii taasisuu dabalatee, namoota shakkamaniif bu'aawwan haala walitti fufiinsa qabuun koodii akka godhaniif jajjabeessuu.

sourceString: Practices participating in virology surveillance will opportunistically collect blood samples from patients coming into the practice for a routine blood test.
targetString: Ogeessonni fayyaa hordoffii qorannoo vaayirasii irratti qooda fudhatan dhukkubsattoota qorannoo dhiigaa dhaabbataadhaaf dhufan irraa carricha fayyadamanii samuuda dhiigaa fuudhu.

sourceString: Patients who attend their practice for a routine blood test will be asked to provide an additional sample for serology.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoonni qorannoo dhiigaa baratamaadhaaf shaakala isaanii hordofan qorannoo dhiigaatiif samuuda dabalataa akka dhiyeessaniif gaafatamu.

sourceString: We have conducted initial searches within the RCGP RSC database to look at the number of full blood count (FBC) results and overall rates in adults and children (Figures 6-​-9).9).
targetString: Lakkoofsa qorannaa guutuu dhiigaa (FBC) ilaaluuf kuusaa ragaa Giddugala Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) keessatti qo'annoo jalqabaa adeemsifnee jirra (Fakkii 6—9).9).

sourceString: An FBC is one of the most common tests performed, and we hope this will give an approximate indication of overall numbers of blood tests performed.
targetString: Qorannoo Dhiigaa Guutuu (FBC)n qorannoowwan adeemsifaman baay'ee beekamoo keessaa isa tokkodha, kun lakkoofsa waliigalaa qorannoowwan dhiigaa taasifamanii tilmaama isaa ni agarsiisa jennee abdanna.

sourceString: The sampling rate, per 100,000 patients was highest for children 15-17 years of age and 60 year or older in adults, with the lowest rates in children 0-4 years of age and 18-29 years of age in adults (Figures 6-​-99).
targetString: Saffisi dhukkubsattoota 100,000 keessaa samuudessuu daa'imman umurii 15-17 gidduu jiranii fi umurii 60 yookaan isaa oliif olaanaa ture, inni baay'ee gad aanaan immoo kan daa'imman umurii 0-4 fi ga'eessota umurii 18-29 tti jiraniiti (Fakkiiwwan 6—99).

sourceString: We will provide 1000 serology baseline samples across all ages that reflect the varying rates of attendance by age.
targetString: Umuriiwwan hunda keessatti samuuda bu'uraa dhiigaa, kan baay'ina garaa garaa itti hirmaannaa umuriiwwan hundaa calaqqisiisan 1000 dhiyeessuuf jenna.

sourceString: Additionally, we will test if we can obtain these all from virology practices to enhance the yield.
targetString: Dabalataan, argannocha guddisuuf kanniin hunda hojiiwwan qorannoo dhiigaa irraa yoo argachuu dandeenye ni qoranna.

sourceString: A good geographical spread is important, so PHE can advise on areas where serology will most usefully be collected.
targetString: Fayyaan Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) bakkeewwan qorannoon dhiigaa hunda caalaa haala bu'aa buusuun walitti qabamuu danda'u gorsuu akka danda'utti tatamsa'inni bakkaa gaariin barbaachisaadha.

sourceString: This will be followed by 800 samples monthly.
targetString: Kanatti aansee iddattoowwan 800 tu dhufa.

sourceString: The sample will be stratified with 200 specimens for prepandemic survey (100 for monthly) in the following age groups: < 5 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and 65 years or older.
targetString: Eddattoonni ilaalcha weerarsa duraaf namoota 200 (ji'aaf 100) gartuuwwan umurii armaan gadii hordofuun sadarkaa isaanii ramada: waggoota < 5, waggoota 5-17 years, 18-64 akkasumas waggaa 65 fi isaa ol.

sourceString: The younger patients, in many practices younger than 14 years, and in nearly all for children younger than 8 years will require pediatric serology surveillance.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoonni dargaggeeyyiin, hojiiwwan hedduu keessatti kan umuriin isaanii 14 gadi ta'e, akkasumas kan daa'imman umuriin isaanii 8 gadii ammoo hundi isaanii haala jechuun danda'amuun hordoffii qorannoo dhiigaa daa'immanii barbaadu.

sourceString: We will develop a new request form for practices to capture recent travel and exposure to COVID-19.
targetString: Ogeessoti fayyaa imala dhiyeenya taasifameefi COVID-19 dhaaf saaxilamuu galmeessuu akka danda'aniif uunkaa gaaffii haarawa isaaniif qopheessina.

sourceString: We will pilot a scheme for collecting convalescent serology from people with confirmed cases and who have had an acute virology sample at the time of their infection.
targetString: Namoota dhukkubni irratti argamuun mirkaneeffamee fi yeroo faalamanitti eddattoo qorannoo vaayirasii hamaa qaban irraa sagantaa dhiiga dandamate fuudhuu adeemsisuuf jenna.

sourceString: This is to identify a carrier state in patients who have recovered from the virus but may continue shedding the virus.
targetString: Kunis haala dhukkubsattoota vaayirasicharraa dandamatanii garuu daddarbiinsa vaayirasichaa itti fufsiisuu danda'an dda baasuufi.

sourceString: If there are a small number of cases, this may assist in developing a test kit for patients to take to their own GP and explore its acceptability to patients.
targetString: Lakkoofsa dhukkubsattootaa muraasatu jira yoo ta'e, kun dhukkubsattoonni akka isaan ogeessa fayyaa isaaniitti geessaniifi dhukkubsattoota biratti fudhatamummaa isaa akka isaan qorataniif dhukkubsattootaaf meeshaa ittiin qoratan qopheessuu keessatti gargaaruu mala.

sourceString: If there are a large number of COVID-19 cases nationally, convalescent samples could be collected from RCGP RSC practices where there are confirmed cases, with the ability to link to the full medical record.
targetString: Akka biyyoolessatti lakkoofsi guddaan COVID-19 yoo qabaman, naamunaan warra fooyya'aa jiranii RCGP RSC irraa fudhatamee mirkanaa'uu qaba. Galmee faayyaa irratti guutamee walitti hidhamuu qaba.

sourceString: This process may include checking pseudonymized NHS numbers for positive individuals at RCGP RSC practices, checking current PHE guidance regarding considerations of infectiousness for confirmed cases, and offering the patient an appointment following the previously mentioned process.
targetString: Adeemsi kun wantoota kanniin of keessaa qabaachuu mala: lakkoofsota Tajaajila Fayyaa Biyyaalessaa (NHS), namoota tajaajila Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP)tti poozetiivii ta'aniif kan maqaan moggaafameef sirrummaa isaa ilaaluu, dhukkubsattoota mirkaneeffamaniif faalama fudhatama qabaatu ilaalchisee qajeelfama Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) yeroo ammaa sirrummaa isaa ilaaluu fi adeemsa duraan maqaa dha'ame hordofuudhaan dhukkubsataadhaaf beellama qabuu.

sourceString: This needs to be carefully coordinated nationally across the network and may require PHE to ensure individuals are not contacted by multiple agencies.
targetString: Kana irratti kan barbaachisu, namoonni karaa neetworkii akka gurmaa'anii fi namoonni dhaabbata garaagaraa keessa jiran akka wal tuttuqqaan hin jiraannetti PHEn hojii irra ooluu qaba.

sourceString: RCGP RSC could provide a useful structure to channel the initial contact once PHE has made a request.
targetString: RCGP OSC'n gaaffii tuqiinsaa jalqabaa PHR'n uume dabarsuuf caasaa barbaachisaa dabarsuu danda'a.S

sourceString: The RCGP RSC practices participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have started sampling from patients showing symptoms of a LRTI.
targetString: Ogeessonni Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) hordoffii qorannoo vaayirasii infiluweenzaa waggaa waggaanii keessatti hirmaatan dhukkubsattoota mallattoo dhibee ujummoo qilleensaa warra gajjallaa (LRTI) agarsiisan irraa samuuda fuudhuu eegalanii jiru.

sourceString: All samples received are being tested for influenza and COVID-19.
targetString: Samuudawwan fuudhaman hundi infiluweenzaa fi COVID-19 qabaachuun isaanii qoratamaa jira.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC will explore ways to collect convalescent samples from any patients tested positive for COVID-19 through the extension of the virological surveillance.
targetString: Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) mala ittiin samuuda dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 qoratamanii poozetiivii ta'an kamuu irraa karaa hordoffii qorannoo vaayirasii dheereffameetiin walitti qaban ni qorata.

sourceString: From the start, we will be carefully curating data to ensure that it can be used for future studies.
targetString: Jalqabuma irraa eegallee ragichi qorannoowwan gara fuulduraa keessatti akka inni fayyaduu danda'u mirkaneessuuf ragaa san eeggannoodhaan walitti qabnee qindeessinee hordofna.

sourceString: Our clinical data will be linked to virology.
targetString: Ragaa dhukkubsattootaa keenya qorannoo vaayirsii waliin wal qabsiifama.

sourceString: We will curate our data using the Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable principles.
targetString: Ragaa keenya seerota Argamuu danda'an, Hundaaf banaa, Qindoominaan hojjechuu danda'aniifi Irradeebiin itti fayyadamuun danda'amuun filannee, qindeessinee hordofna.

sourceString: To facilitate this our data set is listed with Health Data Research UK and the European Health Data Evidence Network.
targetString: Kana mijeessuuf kuusaan ragaa keenyaa Qo'annoo Ragaa Fayyaa Yuunaayitid Kiingidamii fi Neetwoorkii Mirkaneessituu Ragaa Fayyaa Awurooppaa waliin tarreeffamee jira.

sourceString: The statistical methodology is in support of a policy approach to widespread disease outbreak, where so-called nonpharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) are used to respond to an emerging pandemic to produce disease suppression.
targetString: Akkaataa mala taa'umsa lakkoofsaa to'annaa baballina dhukkubaa keessatti ni gargaara, nonpharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) kan jedhamu weerara dhukkuba kanaa hir'isuuf hojjeta.

sourceString: This policy aims to reduce contact rates in the population and thereby reduce transmission of the virus.
targetString: Ittiin bulmaati kun hammamtaa tuttuqqaa ummata keessattii hir'sa, sababa kanaaf daddarbiinsa vaayirasichaa ni hir'isa.

sourceString: To implement this the UK government has recently articulated the desire to implement population self-isolation measures.
targetString: Kana hojiirra oolchuuf, mootummaan Yuunaayitid Kiingidam taarkaanfii uummati ofuma isaatiin adda of baasuu hojiirra oolchuuf fedhii qabu dhiyeenya kana dubbatee jira.

sourceString: By targeting the reproduction number (R) (the average number of secondary cases each case generates) and aiming to reduce the R to below 1, the policy seeks to reduce case numbers to low levels or (as seen in previous outbreaks with severe acute respiratory syndrome and Ebola) to eliminate human-to-human transmission.
targetString: Lakkoofsa hormaataa (R) (lakkoofsa giddugaleessaa kan lakkoofsi lammaffaan tokkoon tokkoon nama qabamee maddisiisu) irratti xiyyeeffachuudhaan, akkasumas R 1 gaditti hir'isuu kaayyeeffachuudhaan, imaammatichi lakkoofsa namoota gabaafamanii isa gad aanaatti gadi buusuu barbaada yookaan (akkuma weeraroota mallattoolee hafuura baafannaa irratti rakkoo cimaa fidaniifi Iboolaa irratti argametti) daddarbuu namaa namattii balleessuu barbaada.

sourceString: As the experience from the 2009 H1N1 pandemic has shown, NPIs can be a crucial component of pandemic mitigation.
targetString: Akka muuxannoon weerara H1N1 2009 irraa agarsiisee jirutti, ‘NPI'n qabiyyee murteessaa humna dhibee daddarbaa laaffisuu ta'uu danda'a.

sourceString: Key to the focus of our study will be the estimation of peak cases in the population and continual monitoring by data collection and modelling the potential growth and emergence of subsequent peaks in new cases as social distancing measures are relaxed.
targetString: Xiyyeeffannoo keenyaaf furtuu kan ta'e, rakkoolee uummata keessaa olaanoo ta'an tilmaamuu fi ragaa funaanuudhaan to'annaa wal irraa hincinne gochuu, akkasumas akka tarkaanfiin fageenya hawaasummaa laafaa dhufeen dhukkubsattoota haarawa gidduutti guddachuufi isa booda mul'achuu rakkoolee guguddoo moodelii gochuudha.

sourceString: There has already been publication of important disease epidemiological measures concerning the outbreak of COVID-19 in mainland China.
targetString: Baballachuu COVID-19 lafa jalqabaa Chaayinaa keessaa waliin wal qabatee safartuu qindatiinsaa bu'a qabeessa ta'etu baay'atee ture.

sourceString: A further fundamental measure in pandemic dynamics is the length of time from infection to when a person is infectious to others and the mean duration of infectiousness.
targetString: Jijjiirama weerara dhukkuba kanaa haala murteessaa ta'een ilaalamuu fi yeroo dhukkubichi nama tokko qabeefi yeroo itti nama sanarraa nama birootti darbu gidduu yeroo jiruudha. Jechuun, wayita dhukkuba daddabarsuu.

sourceString: These factors, if estimated accurately, will give good predictions for the likely length of the pandemic, the final number of infected cases.
targetString: Haaldureewwan kun yoo sirriitti tilmaamaman haala turtii weerara kanaa irratti tilmaama gaarii kennuu danda'u.

sourceString: We intend to apply approximate Bayesian inference (ABC) to (possibly spatially heterogeneous) Susceptible-Exposed- Infectious-Removed (SEIR) stochastic epidemic models.
targetString: Namoota (bakkaan wal irraa fagaachuu malan) Miidhamuu malan—Saaxilamoo—Faaluu malan—Keessaa baafaman (SEIR) moodeliiwwan babal'ina dhukkubaa carraadhaan qoratamuutiif ‘appirooksimeet Baayeesiyaan Inferensii' (ABC) fayyadamuu yaadnee jirra.

sourceString: Such techniques are highly parallelizable and have been successfully applied to many fields including disease transmission modelling.
