targetString: Malleen akka kanaa sadarkaa olaanaan wal faana kan deemuu fi daddarbiinsa dhukkubaarratti dabalatee qorannoo baay'ee irratti milkaa'eera.

sourceString: They are particularly suited to situations where likelihood functions are absent and where more traditional approaches such as Markov chain Monte Carlo are impractical.
targetString: Wantoonni kunniin haalota faayidaaleen fakkaachuu keessa hinjirree fi malawwan aadaa dabalataa, kanneen akka ‘Maarkoov cheeyin Moonte Kaarloo' keessatti hojiirra ooluu hindandeenye waliin addumaan wal simu.

sourceString: Such an approach has been demonstrated to work effectively on the ASPREN surveillance data, a network of sentinel GPs and nurse practitioners who report deidentified information on ILIs and other conditions, where issues such as missing data and the need to model the observation process itself has been successfully addressed.
targetString: Tooftaan akkanaa kun akka inni ragaa hordoffii ‘ASPREN' irratti sirriitti hojjetu agarsiifamee jira. ‘ASPREN' kun neetwoorkii dooktorootaa fi narsoota dammaqinaan dhukkuba hordofan, kanneen odeeffannoo ‘ILI' fi haalota biroo, kan dhimmoonni akka ragaan keessaa hafee fi fedhii adeemsa hubannoo mataa isaa ittiin bocan ittiin milkaa'inaan furmaata argatan, irratti deebi'ee adda baafame gabaasanidha.

sourceString: Furthermore, peaks in new cases have been estimated by distributional methods.
targetString: Kana caalaas, olka'iinsi dhibeewwanhaaraa mala faffaca'iinsaan timaamameera.

sourceString: Estimates of the parameters of the SEIR model are tractable on large data sets because of parallelizability, and these methods have been implemented in several R libraries; we intend to use the libraries ABSEIR (deposited on GitHub: https://tinyurl.com/vqu35cj) and abctools (https://tinyurl.com/tfjavz4) to estimate epidemic measures on a weekly basis.
targetString: Tilmaammiin amaloota SEIR odeeffannoo qindataa guddaa irratti sababa tuuta wal bira qabamuuf salphaatti to'atamuu danda'u, malleen kuimmoo Library R baay'ee keessatti hojiittin hiikamaniiru; hammamtaa weerarsa torbee tilmaamuuf kuufamoota ABSEIR (deposited GitHub irratti: https://tinyurl.com/vqu35cj) fi abctools (https://tinyurl.com/tfjavz4) fayyamuu yaadna.

sourceString: Since we are fitting an SIR-epidemic model in the ABC routine, we anticipate that our results will be robust against weekly case data containing relatively small counts.
targetString: Hojii baratamaa ‘ABC' keessatti moodelii weerara ‘SIR' waan itti galchaa jirruuf, ragaa dhukkubsattoota torbanii, isa lakkoofsa xiqqoo of keessaa qabuu wajjin wal bira yoo qabamu bu'aan inni kan keenyaa baay'ee guddaadha jennee yaadna.

sourceString: For example, see for the ABC methodology applied to the Tristan da Cunha common cold data from 1967, where counts of I (number of infectious cases) and R (number of recovered cases) are in the tens at most.
targetString: Fakkeenyaaf, akkaataa ABC Tristan da Cunha bara 1967 utaalloo irratti hojiirra oolo, I (lakkoofsa namoota ittiin qabamee) fi R(namoota dhukkubicha irraa fayyanii) yeroo baayyee kurnan keessa jira.

sourceString: Finally, in addition to the above methodology we will employ the Kaplan-Meier method with two outcomes (death and recovery) to estimate the case fatality ratio.
targetString: Xumurarratti, malleen gararraa kanatti dabaluun nuti dhibichi hagam nama ajjeesuu akka tanda'u tilmaamuuf wantootadhufuu danda'an (du'aa fi dandamannaa) Kaplan-Meir qacarra

sourceString: This approach is independent of the ABC methodology and will allow comparisons between estimates from the two modelling approaches to judge robustness of results.
targetString: Malli kun tooftaa Baasii Hojii Irratti Hundaa'ee (ABC) irratti kan hin hundoofnedha, akkasumas cimina bu'aa isaa madaaluuf tilmaamota malawwan moodeleessuu lamaan irraa argaman walbira qabanii madaaluu nama dandeessisa.

sourceString: RCGP RSC's surveillance with PHE is defined as Health Protection under Regulation 3 of The Health Service (Control of Patient Information) Regulations 2002.
targetString: Hordoffiin Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE) waliin taasisu Seera 3ffaa Tajaajila Fayyaa (To'annaa Odeeffannoo Dhukkubsataa) Seerota 2002 jalatti Eegumsa Fayyaa jedhamuun hiikamee jira.

sourceString: This has been confirmed by PHE's Caldicott Guardian's Office.
targetString: Kun kan mirkaneeffame Waajjira Kaaldiikoot Gaardiyaan kan Fayyaa Uummattootaa Ingiliziitiini.

sourceString: We do not see any increased risk to practices or practitioners taking part in this surveillance.
targetString: To'annoo kana keessatti qooda fudhachuuf shaakala irratti saaxilama inni qabu yookiin immoo warreen kana hojjechaa jiran irratti balaa inni fide hin agarre.

sourceString: Infection prevention and control advice will follow extant national guidance.
targetString: Dhibee orgaaniizimoota seel-qeenxee irraa namatti dhufan ittisuu fi to'achuuf qajeelcha biyyoolessaa hordofamuu qaba.

sourceString: Any cases identified will be managed according to the PHE/NHS guidance in force at the time, including advice for identified contacts.
targetString: Dhimmi dhibeen qabamuu adda ba'e kam iyyuu, gorsa namoota qabamaniif kennamu dabalatee, haala qajeelfama hojiirra oolaa jiruun Fayyaa Uummataa Ingilizii (PHE)/Tajaajila Fayyaa Biyyaalessaa (NHS) tiin yerooma sanatti to'atama.

sourceString: However, our training will include reminders about safe handling of specimens and revision of infection control measures anticipated to be high in our practices.
targetString: Haa ta'u malee, leenjiin keenya yaadachiistuu akkaataa namoota iddatteeffaman ittiin qabatanii fi keessa deebii tarkaanfiiwwan ittisa dhukkubaa hojii keenya keessatti ol ka'uu malu jedhamanii yaadaman dabalata.

sourceString: It is a key part of Regulation 12 about safe care and treatment, periodically inspected by the Care Quality Commission.
targetString: Wanti kun waa'ee Seera 12 ffaa kunuunsa miidhaa hinqabnee fi wal'aansaa isa yeroo yerootti Koomishiinii Qulqullina Kunuunsaatiin hordofamu keessaa isa ijoodha.

sourceString: Travel History and Clinical Descriptors of the COVID-19 Infections
targetString: Seenaa imalaa fi ibsa fayyaa dhibee COVID-19

sourceString: The RCGP RSC practices have been advised on the clinical coding that has been made available for COVID-19 across all CMR systems.
targetString: Koodiiwwan wal'aansa dhukkubsattootaa kanneen COVID-19 sistamiiwwan CMR keessaa hundaaf dhiyaate irratti hojiiwwan Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) gorfamaniiru.

sourceString: This includes information on coding of clinical descriptors (Table 4) and any recent travel history.
targetString: Kun odeeffannoo ibsitoota dhukkubsattootaa koodii taasisuu (Gabatee 4) fi seenaa imalaa dhiyoo kam iyyuu of keessatti qabata.

sourceString: Establishment of Extended Virology Sampling
targetString: Hundeeffama Extended Virology Sampling

sourceString: The RCGP RSC practices participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have started sampling from patients showing symptoms of LRTI.
targetString: Ogeessonni fayyaa Giddugala Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) hordoffii qorannoo vaayirasii infiluweenzaa kan waggaa waggaanii keessatti qooda fudhachaa jiran, dhukkubsattoota mallattoo dhibee ujummoo qilleensaa isa gajjallaa (LRTI) agarsiisan irraa samuuda fuudhuu eegalaniiru.

sourceString: All samples received are being tested for influenza and COVID-19.
targetString: Samuudawwan fuudhaman hundi infiluweenzaa fi COVID-19 qabaachuun isaanii qoratamaa jira.

sourceString: This has led to initial early identification of background spread in low-risk patients.
targetString: Kun dhukkubsattoota balaa gad aanaaf saaxilaman keessatti gara tatamsa'ina dhokataa dursanii adda baasuu jalqabaatti geesseera.

sourceString: As of March 7, 2020, the surveillance system has detected 2 cases of COVID-19 in low-risk patients with no history of travel through extended virological sampling.
targetString: Bitootessa 7, 2020 asitti, sirni hordoffii dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 balaan isaanii gad aanaa ta'ee fi seenaa imalaa hinqabne 2 karaa samuudessuu qorannoo vaayirasii dheereffamee adda baaseera.

sourceString: This protocol describes how we have adapted a national influenza surveillance system to monitor community spread of an unexpected infection of COVID-19.
targetString: Ragaan jalqabaa kun tatamsa'ina hawaasaa dhukkuba COVID-19 utuu hin yaadamin dhufe to'achuuf mala hordoffii infiluweenzaa biyyoolessaa akkaataa nuti itti fooyyessine ibsa.

sourceString: We have rapidly created and incorporated new codes to allow data recording, and are collecting data to monitor the effectiveness of containment strategies.
targetString: Galmeessuun ragaalee akka danda'mu gochuuf koodiiwwan haarawa atattamaan uumnee itti daballee jirra, bu'a-qabeessummaa malawwan to'annaa hordofuufis ragaa funaanaa jirra.

sourceString: Through this surveillance, we intend to find out more about the epidemiology of COVID-19 in ambulatory care.
targetString: Karaa to'annoo kanaa, waa'ee amaloota COVID-19 kunuunsa namoota olii-gadi socho'anii keessaa ilaalchisee wantoota dabalataa arguuf yaadna.

sourceString: In particular, its rate of spread, both temporal and geographical.
targetString: Keessumaa, saffisa inni ittiin faffaca'aa jiru, yeroodhaanis ta'e bakkaan.

sourceString: Our testing of low-risk patients will also inform whether the containment strategy that is based on virology testing of high-risk patients and their contacts plus self-isolation is effective.
targetString: Qorannaan nuti dhukkubsattoota balaa gad aanaa qaban irratti adeemsifnu mala to'annaa isa qorannaa vaayirasii dhukkubsattoota balaa olaanaaf saaxilamaniifi namoota isaaniin walquunnaman irratti adeemsifnu akkasumas adda of baasuu irratti hundaa'e illee hammam bu'aa akka inni qabu baruuf ni gumaacha.

sourceString: Containment should slow the spread, and there may be benefits in the management of spread from intense surveillance.
targetString: To'annaan saffisa tatamsa'inaa xiqqeessuu qaba, tarii immoo hordoffii cimaarraa kan ka'e to'annaa tatamsa'inaa keessa bu'aan jiraachuu mala.

sourceString: However, there may come a point at which the virus spreads more widely into the population, as has happened in Italy.
targetString: Haa ta'u malee, akkuma Xaaliyaan keessatti ta'e qabxiin vaayirasiin kun uummata keessatti ballinaan itti babalachuu danda'u jiraachuu mala.

sourceString: Surveillance of low-risk patients should inform when we reach this tipping point and when infection rates start to remit.
targetString: Hordoffiin dhukkubsattoota balaan isaanii gad aanaa ta'ee yemmuu nuti tuqaa olaanaa kana geenyuufi yemmuu hammi dhukkubichaa gadi bu'uu jalqabu irratti odeeffannoo kennuu qaba.

sourceString: The epidemiology of COVID-19 remains emergent.
targetString: Qorannaan baballachuu fi to'annoo dhukkuba COVID-19 ariifachiisaa ta'ee jira.

sourceString: The registration-based nature of UK primary care means that we will be able to create a complete picture of the cumulative incidence and duration.
targetString: Uumamsi yaalii UK kan galmee bu'uureffatu haala mudannaa waliigalaa fi turtii guutummaatti uumuu nu dandeessisa jechuudha.

sourceString: The surveillance system should be able to identify areas where COVID-19 spread is taking place that might be suitable for trials of antiviral therapy.
targetString: Sirni to'annoo bakkeewwan faffaca'iinsi COVID-19 itti raawwataa jiru, kanneen yaalii farra vaayirasiitiif mijatoo ta'uu malan adda baasuu danda'uu qaba.

sourceString: We could also follow up on the effectiveness or any adverse reactions to these medicines or vaccinations.
targetString: Bu'a qabeessummaa fi miidhaa cinaa qorichoota yookaan talaalliiwwan kanniinii illee hordofuu ni dandeenya.

sourceString: Finally, early detection of a confirmed COVID-19 case has exemplified the rapid implementation of this enhanced surveillance in the national network.
targetString: Dhumarratti, dhukkubi COVID-19 mirkanaawaan dursee adda baafame neetwoorkii biyyaalessaa keessatti dafee hojiirra ooluu hordoffii fooyya'aa kanaatiif fakkeenya ta'eera.

sourceString: Safety of practices is our primary concern.
targetString: Eeggannoon shaakala irrattii dhimma jalqabaati.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC has operated for over 50 years and has been involved in collecting samples to monitor disease and vaccine effectiveness through the Hong Kong flu pandemic of 1968/69, the Russian flu of 1977/78, and the 2009 Swine flu pandemic.
targetString: RCGP RSC'n waggoota 50 oliif hojii irra tureera innis akka adda baasetti dhibeewwaniifi talaallii bu'a qabeessa weerara Flu Hong Kong kan bara 1968/69, Flu Raashiyaa kan 1977/78 fi weerara Flu Siwaayiniif kan 2009.

sourceString: We are not aware of any increased risk to practice staff or other patients from involvement in surveillance.
targetString: Nuyi dabaluu balaafama hojjettoota dhimma yaalaa ykn dhukkubsattoota biro to'annoo keessatti hirmaataniif hubannoo uuma miti.

sourceString: Pandemic preparedness is part of the role of the RCGP RSC.
targetString: Qophaa'inni weerara dhibee daddarbaatiif taasifamu qaama ga'ee Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP) ti.

sourceString: It is plausible that enhanced coding of information from contacts with the practices in RCGP RSC will reduce the likelihood of people who may be suspected COVID-19 cases being brought to the surgery inadvertently.
targetString: Koodessuun odeeffannoo fooyya'aan inni ogeessota fayyaa Giddugalli Qo'annoo fi Hordoffii (RSC) Ogeeyyii Hojii Fayyaa Waliigalaa Kooleejii Rooyaal (RCGP)tiin wal arguu irraa argamee carraa namoonni COVID-19 dhaan shakkaman dogoggoraan kutaa baqaqsanii hodhuu seenuu xiqqeessuu maluun isaa waanuma fakkaatudha.

sourceString: Where cases are detected unexpectedly, it is probably helpful for that patient, their contacts, and the practice to know.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoonni akka tasaa yoo argaman, dhukkubsataan sun, namoonni inni waliin walquunnameefi ogeessi sun beekuun faayidaa qabaachuu mala.

sourceString: The impact on practices has been to close for a day, if a case is found, for deep cleaning and then reopen.
targetString: Dhiibbaan ogeeyyii irrattii, yoo namni qabame argame ququlleessuu gadi fageenyaatiif guyyaa tokkoof cufanii deebisanii banuudha.

sourceString: The principal limitations of our system are the number of data points.
targetString: Danqaawwan sirna keenyaa inni guddaan lakkoofsa ragaati.

sourceString: We are collecting serology and virology data from 100 sites, which covers a small group of the population.
targetString: Nuti iddoolawwan 100 irraa qorannoo seelii fi vaayirasii walitti qabaa jirra, kunimmoo gartuu muraasa hawaasichaa ni hammata.

sourceString: This has been satisfactory for monitoring influenza, but we are not certain if this is a sufficiently large sample for the COVID-19 outbreak.
targetString: Infiluweenzaa to'achuudhaaf kun quubsaa ture, COVID-19 akka tasaa dhufe kanaaf garuu samuuda ga'aa ta'uu fi dhiisuu isaa afaan guutnee hin dubbannu.

sourceString: Our sites (surveillance practices) are currently fixed, and it could be helpful to be able to rapidly onboard practices in regions where there are more cases.
targetString: Bakkeewwan keenya (ogeessonni hordoffii) yeroo ammaatti dhaabbatoodha, bakkeewwan lakkoofsi namoota qabamanii hedduun jirutti ogeessota dafanii erguu danda'uun faayidaa qabaachuu danda'a.

sourceString: Currently, we will be reporting weekly.
targetString: Yeroo ammaatti torban torbaniin gabaasuuf jenna.

sourceString: Our existing system can be enhanced to twice weekly, but maybe daily or hourly data should be our current approach.
targetString: Sirni keenya amma jiru torbanitti aal lama fooyya'uu danda'a, garuu tarii ragaan guyyaa guyyaattii yookaan sa'atii sa'atiittii mala keenya yeroo ammaa ta'uu qaba.

sourceString: Opportunistic sampling for serology in children younger than 10 years might be limited due to the overall reduced rate of blood tests in children.
targetString: Samuuda dhiigaa yeroo dandeettiin dhukkuba ittisuu qaama namaa dadhabuu fuudhuun kan ijoollee umuriin isaanii 10 gadii saffisa qorannoo dhiigaa waliigalaa xiqqeeffameef jecha murtaa'aa ta'uu danda'a.

sourceString: The extended surveillance using the RCGP RSC-PHE network for the emergent COVID-19 outbreak has been established rapidly.
targetString: Haala dhukkuba haaraa COVID-19 hordofuuf neetwoorkii RCGP RSC-PHE jedhamu ariitiidhaan hunndeeffame.

sourceString: The model of getting the appropriate informatics to enable capture of the required data has already been a success, with data recording starting the week the codes were created.
targetString: Gosti odeeffannoo barbaachisaa caaseffama qindataa barbaachisu argamsiisu guutummaatti milkaa'eera, odeeffannoowwan qindatan lakkaa'uu dabalatee moggaasotbi torbee sanii kalaqamaniiru.

sourceString: In addition, modifying the existing surveillance system to collect population data in a parallel way has also been effective.
targetString: Itti dabaluudhaan, ragaa uummataa wal faana funaanuuf sirna hordoffii duraanii fooyyessuun bu'a-qabeessa ture.

sourceString: However, we are at present unsure as to whether the scale of this surveillance provides sufficient data to drive local containment strategies or if reporting infrequently meets the need of our information age.
targetString: Haa ta'u malee, nuti to'achuudhaaf qijndeeffamni qorannoo ga'aa ta'uusaa ammaaf sirriitti hi beeknu, tarsiimoo qabiyyee naannoo geggeessuuf ykn irra deddeebiin gabaasuu dhiisuuf odeeffannoo umurii keenyaa barbaachisa.

sourceString: National Basketball Association suspends season due to COVID-19 concerns
targetString: Waldaan Kubbaa Kochoo BIyyaalessaa sababa dhimmi COVID-19'tiif dabarfame.

sourceString: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.
targetString: Gaafa Roobii, ‘Waldaan Kubbaa Kaachoo Biyyaalessaa Yuunaayitid Isteetsi (NBA)'n sababa dhimmoota COVID-19n walqabatanniitiin waqtii kubbaa kaachoo ogeeyyotaa isaa tursiiseera.

sourceString: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Tarkaanfiin NBA taphataan Utaah Jaaz qorannoon COVID-19 pozotiivii ta'uu kan hordofeedha.

sourceString: The NBA did not release the identity of the player in question in its announcement.
targetString: NBA'n ibsa isaa keessa eenyummaa taphattota gaaffii keessa jiranii hin ifoomsine.

sourceString: They did say he was not present at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City, where the Utah Jazz were to play against the Oklahoma City Thunder.
targetString: Bakka Utah Jazz'onni ‘Oklahama City Thunder' waliin taphachuuf turan magaalaa Oklahoma keessaa ‘Chesapeake Energy Arena' tti akka hin argamne dubbatanii turan

sourceString: According to its press release, the NBA was "suspending game play following the conclusion of [Wednesday's] schedule of games until further notice."
targetString: Akka ibsa pireesiitti, NBA'n “xumuramuu sagantaa taphaa [Roobii] hordofuun taphni hanga ibsa dabalataatti ni dhaabbata.”

sourceString: The Jazz's game was cancelled, as was another NBA game Wednesday between the Sacramento Kings and the New Orleans Pelicans.
targetString: Akkuma tapha NBA biroo ‘Wednesday' kana ‘Sacramento Kings' fi ‘New Orleans Pelicans' gidduutti geggeeffamuu, taphni ‘Jazz' s haqameeraa.

sourceString: Other games scheduled for Wednesday were still held, according to NBC News.
targetString: Akka oduu NBC'tti taphoonni biroo Roobiif karoorfaman ammas gaggeeffamaniiru.

sourceString: The United States' other major basketball organization, the National Collegiate Athletic Association, which runs college basketball, has cancelled its own tournament, March Madness, for both men's and women's leagues.
targetString: Dhaabbati kubbaa kaachoo Yunaayitid Isteets guddaa kan biraa, Waldaa Atileetikii Biyyoolessaa Barattoota Koolleejjii (National Collegiate Athletic Association), kan kubbaa kaachoo koolleejjii adeemsisu, dorgommii mataa isaa, March Madness, liigota dhiirotaafi dubaraa lachuuf haqeera.

sourceString: According to Johns Hopkins University, as of Wednesday, there were at least 1,279 confirmed cases of COVID-19 in the United States.
targetString: Akka Yunivarsiitii Johns Hopkins tti, gaafa Roobii, dhimmoota COVID-19 mirkanaa'an yoo xinnaate 1,279 tu Yunaayitid Isteets keessa ture.

sourceString: CNBC reported there were at least 118,381 cases worldwide.
targetString: Guutuu addunyaarratti yoo xinnaate ta'iin 118,381 akka turan CNBC'n gabaaseera

sourceString: US President Trump declares COVID-19 national emergency
targetString: Pireezidaantiin US Traamp labsii balaa hatattamaa COVID-19 labsaniiru.

sourceString: On Friday, United States President Donald Trump declared a national emergency in response to the ongoing coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Jimaata, Pirezidaantiin Yuunaayitid Isteet Doonaald Traampi weerara vaayirasii koroonaa deemaa jiru dhabuuf labsii muddamaa biyyaalessaa labsa.

sourceString: The move came two days after the World Health Organization declared the outbreak, which causes the COVID-19 disease, to be a pandemic.
targetString: Sochiin kan dhukkuba COVID-19 weerara addunyaa taasise erga Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa weeraricha labsee guyyoota lama booda dhufe.

sourceString: The move gives the federal government access to around US$50 billion in extra funding to combat the pandemic, according to NBC News.
targetString: Sochichi mootummaa federaalaatiif bajata dabalataa keessaa hanga doolaara US billiyoona 50 weerara too'achuudhaaf argate, akka oduu NBC'tti.

sourceString: The proclamation specifically said "the COVID-19 outbreak in the United States constitutes a national emergency" and said the national emergency began on March 1, almost two weeks before the proclamation itself.
targetString: Labsichi addatti “weerarri COVID-19 Yuunayitid Isteetsi keessatti yeroo labsii hatattamaa biyyaalessaaf haala ni mijeessa ” kan jedhuu fi labsiin yeroo hatattamaa biyyaalessaa Bitootessa gaafa 1 jalqaba jedha, labsicha mataasaa dura torbeewwan lama ni ta'a.

sourceString: The United States Department of Health and Human Services declared the outbreak a "public health emergency" on January 31.
targetString: Muummeen Tajaajiloota Fayyaa fi Ilma Namaa Yunaayitid Isteets jalqabbii dhukkubichaa "balaa tasaa fayyaa uummataa" jechuun Amajjii 31 tti labseera.

sourceString: Trump did not place the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) in charge of the government's response to COVID-19, which Politico reported left some experts in disaster management disappointed.
targetString: Trump Ejensii To'annoo Balaa Tasaa Federaalaa (FEMA) deebii mootummaa COVID-19'f itti gaafatamummaa hin kennineef, kan akka Politico'n gabaasetti ogeessota muraasa to'annoo balaa keessaa mufachiise.

sourceString: Politico quoted Tim Manning, formerly a deputy administrator at FEMA, as saying "FEMA has an important role in coordinating the larger response to the crisis" and "[i]f there's an emergency, FEMA needs to be involved."
targetString: Politikoon jecha Tiim Maanniingi, bulchaa itti aanaa FEMA kan turanii, “qaala'iinsa kanaaf deebii qindeessuuf FEMA'n gahee guddaa qaba” akkasumas "[i]f muddama FEMA'n itti hirmaachuu qabutu jira.”

sourceString: Trump made the decision under provisions of the National Emergencies Act, amongst other governing authorities.
targetString: Akka Tumaa Balaa Biyyaalessaa irratti kaa'emitti abbaatii taayitaa bulchiinsarra jiran keessa Trump'tu murtoo dabarse.

sourceString: The Trump administration also announced other efforts in response to COVID-19, including waiving the interest it collects on federal student loans and increasing U.S. strategic oil reserve oil purchases.
targetString: Bulchiinsi Traamp dabalataanis carraaqqiiwwan kan biroo COVID-19 ilaalchisee beeksiseera, dhala inni liqiiwwan barattoota federaalaa irraa sassaabu irratti rincicuu dhabuu fi kuufama zayita tarsiimawaa bittaawwan zayitaa U.S. dabaluu hammachuun.

sourceString: Impact of the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic on education
targetString: Dhiibbaa weerarri koronaavaayiresii addunyaa 2019-20 barnoota irratti qabu

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic has affected educational systems worldwide, leading to the widespread closures of schools and universities.
targetString: Bara 2019–20 itti weerarri vaayirasiin sirna barnootaa guutuu addunyaa hube, kunis gara cufamuu manneen barnootaa fi yuunivarsiitiileetti ce'e.

sourceString: As of 8 April 2020, approximately 1.716 billion learners have been affected due to school closures in response to COVID-19.
targetString: Akka Ebla 8, 2020 tti, tilmaamaan barattoonni biiliyoona 1.716 COVID-19 ilaalchisee cufamuu mana barnootaatiin dhiibbaan irra gaheera.

sourceString: According to UNESCO monitoring, 188 countries have implemented nationwide closures and 5 have implemented local closures, impacting about 99.4%  of the world's student population.
targetString: Akka hordoffii UNESCO'tti, biyyoonnoo 188 cufiinsa guutuu addunyaa hojiirra oolchan akkasumas 5 cufama naannoo hojiirra oolchan, baay'inna barattoota addunyaa %99.4 hube.

sourceString: On 23 March 2020, Cambridge International Examinations (CIE) released a statement announcing the cancellation of Cambridge IGCSE, Cambridge O Level, Cambridge International AS & A Level, Cambridge AICE Diploma, and Cambridge Pre-U examinations for the May/June 2020 series across all countries.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 23 2020, Qormaatawwan Addunyaalessaa Cambridge (CIE) ibsa haqamuu Cambridge IGCSE, Cambridge Sadarkaa O, Sadarkaalee A fi AS Addunyaalessaa Cambridge, Dippiloomaa AICE Cambridge, fi Qormaatawwan Yuuniversiitiin duraa Cambridge kan Caamsaa/Waxabajjii 2020 biyyoota hunda keessattii ibsu baaseera.

sourceString: International Baccalaureate exams have also been cancelled.School closures impact not only students, teachers, and families, but have far-reaching economic and societal consequences.
targetString: Qorumsi namoota digirii jalqabaa fudhataniif kennamus haqame. Manneen barnootaa cufamuun barattoota, barsiisotaa, fi maatii barattootaa qofa miti kan miidhe, garuu miidhaa diinagdee fi hawaasummaas qaba.

sourceString: School closures in response to COVID-19 have shed light on various social and economic issues, including student debt, digital learning, food insecurity, and homelessness, as well as access to childcare, health care, housing, internet, and disability services.
targetString: COVID-19 ilaalchisee cufamuun mana barumsaa dhimmoota hawaasaafi diinagdee hedduu ifaa godheera, liqaa barataa, barnoota dijitaalaa, hanqina wabii nyaataa fi iddo jireenyaa dhabuu, akkasumas kunuunsa daa'imaa, kunuunsa fayyaa, mana, intarneetii, fi tajaajiloota hanqina qaamaa argachuu dabalatee.

sourceString: The impact was more severe for disadvantaged children and their families, causing interrupted learning, compromised nutrition, childcare problems, and consequent economic cost to families who could not work.In response to school closures, UNESCO recommended the use of distance learning programmes and open educational applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to reach learners remotely and limit the disruption of education.
targetString: Dhiibbichi ijoollee miidhamaniifi maatiiwwan isaaniif caalaatti hamaa ture, barnoota addaan cite, nyaata madaalamaa dhabuu, rakkoowwan kunuunsa daa'imaa akkasumas maatiiwwan hojjechuu hin dandeenyeef baasii diinagdee walitti aane geessisuun. Cufamuu mana barumsaa ilaalchisee, UNESCO'n faayidaa sagantaawwan barnoota fagoo akkasumas fayyadamoota barnootaa banoo fi hujeeffannoowwan kan manneen barnootaa fi barsiisonni barattoota fageenya irratti qaqqabuuf akkasumas goolamuu barnootaa daangessuuf fayyadaman yaada kenneera.

sourceString: Efforts to stem the spread of COVID-19 through non-pharmaceutical interventions and preventive measures such as social-distancing and self-isolation have prompted the widespread closure of primary, secondary, and tertiary schooling in over 100 countries.Previous outbreaks of infectious diseases have prompted widespread school closings around the world, with varying levels of effectiveness.
targetString: Carraaqqiiwwan tatamsa'ina COVID-19 hundeen buqqisuuf giddu seentummaa qorichaan alattii fi maloota ittisaa kanneen akka gargar fageenya hawaasaa fi adda of baasuu cufamuu manneen barnoota sadarkaa jalqabaa, lammaffaa fi sadaffaaf biyyoota 100 olii keessattiif sababa ta'eera. Weerarri dhukkuboota daddarboo asiin duraallee, sadarkaa hojiirra oolmaa adda addaatiin cufaatii manneen barnoota addunyaarra jiraniif sababa ta'aniiru.

sourceString: Mathematical modelling has shown that transmission of an outbreak may be delayed by closing schools.
targetString: Fakkeenyi herregaa akka agarsiisetti tatamsa'inni weerarichaa cufamuu manneen barnootaatiin hir'achuu mala.

sourceString: However, effectiveness depends on the contacts children maintain outside of school.
targetString: Haa ta'u malee, bu'a qabeessummaan isaa tuttuqqaa ijoolleen mana barnootaatiin alatti gootu irratti hundaa'a.

sourceString: School closures may be effective when enacted promptly.
targetString: Cufaatiin manneen barnootaa ajajaan gaafa raawwatamu bu'a qabeessa ta'uu malu.

sourceString: If school closures occur late relative to an outbreak, they are less effective and may not have any impact at all.
targetString: Utuu cufaatiin mana barumsaa weerarichaan walqabatu barfateera ta'ee, bu'aa gadaanaa kan qabaatuu fi walumaa galatti dhiibbaa homaatuu qabaachuu dhiisuu mala.

sourceString: Additionally, in some cases, the reopening of schools after a period of closure has resulted in increased infection rates.
targetString: Dabalataan, keezota muraasa keessatti, manneen barnootaa erga cufamanii booda banamuun hamma dhibeef saaxilamuu dabale.

sourceString: As closures tend to occur concurrently with other interventions such as public gathering bans, it can be difficult to measure the specific impact of school closures.During the 1918-1919 influenza pandemic in the United States, school closures and public gathering bans were associated with lower total mortality rates.
targetString: Akkuma cufaatileen giddu seentummaa akka uggura walitti qabama hawaasaa waliin walfaana ta'uu malu, miidhaa cufaatii manneen barnootaa adda baasanii safaruun cimuu danda'a. wayita weerara addunyaa infiluweenzaa 1918-1919 Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keessattii, cufaatiin manneen barumsaa fi uggurri walitti qabama hawaasaa hamma du'aatii gadi buusuu keessatti qooda qabaatee ture.

sourceString: Cities that implemented such interventions earlier had greater delays in reaching peak mortality rates.
targetString: Magaalotni giddu seentummaa kanneen dafanii fudhatan hamma du'aa olaanaa galmeessisuuf barfatanii turan.

sourceString: Schools closed for a median duration of 4 weeks according to a study of 43 US cities' response to the Spanish Flu.
targetString: Manneen barnootaa turmaata giddu-galeessaa akkaataa qorannoo deebii magaalaawwan US 43 Spanish Flu'f torbanoota 4'f cufaman.

sourceString: School closures were shown to reduce morbidity from the Asian flu by 90% during the 1957–58 outbreak, and up to 50% in controlling influenza in the US, 2004–2008.Multiple countries successfully slowed the spread of infection through school closures during the 2009 H1N1 Flu pandemic.
targetString: Cufaatiin manneen barnootaa fayya-maleessuummaa sababa ‘Asian flu' wayita weera 1957-58, 90%n fi US keessatti 2004-2008 tti infiluweenzaa to'achuuf 50% akka hir'atu taasiseera. Wayita weerara addunyaa ‘H1N1 Flu ‘ 2009 biyyoonni baayyeen manneen barnootaa cufuudhaan tatamsa'ina dhibechaa milkaa'inaan hir'isaniiru.

sourceString: School closures in the city of Oita, Japan, were found to have successfully decreased the number of infected students at the peak of infection; however closing schools was not found to have significantly decreased the total number of infected students.
targetString: Cufamuun mana barumsaa magaalaa Oita, Jaappaan lakkoofsa barattoota hubamanii sadarkaa hubamuu olaanaarra jiran milkaa'inaan xiqqeessuun isaa argameera; ta'us manneen barnootaa cufuun guutummaa lakkoofsa barattoota hubamanii haalaan xiqqeessuu hin dandeenye.

sourceString: Mandatory school closures and other social distancing measures were associated with a 29% to 37% reduction in influenza transmission rates.
targetString: Dirqamni cufamuu manneen barnootaa fi adda fageenyi hawaasaa 29% hanga 37%'tiin hir'achuu hamma tatamsa'ina infuluweenzaa wajjiin wal qabata.

sourceString: Early school closures in the United States delayed the peak of the 2009 H1N1 Flu pandemic.
targetString: Yeroon cufamuun mana barnootaa Yunaayitid Isteets keessatti olka'iinsi weerara addunyaawaa infiluweenzaa 2009 H1N1 akka turu godheera.

sourceString: Despite the overall success of closing schools, a study of school closures in Michigan found that "district level reactive school closures were ineffective."During the swine flu outbreak in 2009 in the UK, in an article titled "Closure of schools during an influenza pandemic" published in the Lancet Infectious Diseases, a group of epidemiologists endorsed the closure of schools in order to interrupt the course of the infection, slow further spread and buy time to research and produce a vaccine.
targetString: Milkaa'ina cufamuu barnootaatiin cinaatti, qorannoon cufamuu mana barnootaa Michigaan akka argatetti, “cufamuun manneen barnootaa gara aanaa jiranii bu'a qabeessaa miti.” Yeroo weerara infuluweenzaa bara 2009 UK'ttii barreeffama “cufamuu manneen barnootaa yeroo weerara infuluweenzaa” jedhu kan dhukkuba daddarbaa keessa maxxanfame, gareen Eppideemolojii dhibee ittisuuf, tatamsa'ina caalmaa hir'isuuf akkasumas qorannoo gaggeessuu fi talaallii oomishuuf yeroo argatan cufamuu manneen barnootaa deeggaran.

sourceString: Having studied previous influenza pandemics including the 1918 flu pandemic, the influenza pandemic of 1957 and the 1968 flu pandemic, they reported on the economic and workforce effect school closure would have, particularly with a large percentage of doctors and nurses being women, of whom half had children under the age of 16.
targetString: Weerara infuluweenzaa duraaa weerara infuluweenzaa bara 1918 dabalatee, weerara infuluweenzaa bara 1957 fi weerara infuluweenzaa bara 1968 qorachuun, dhiibbaa diinagdee fi humna hojii cufamuun manneen barnootaa qabaachuu malu, keessattuu parsantiin guddaan doktorootaa fi narsootaa dubartoota ta'uun, kanneen ijoollee umrii 16 gadii qaban.

sourceString: They also looked at the dynamics of the spread of influenza in France during French school holidays and noted that cases of flu dropped when schools closed and re-emerged when they re-opened.
targetString: Wayita kabaja ayyaanota mana barumsaa Fireench akkaataa uumama baballina infiluweenzaa kan ilaalanii fi ta'iileen ‘flu' yemmuu manneen barnootaa cufamanitti kan gadi bu'anii fi gaafa deebi'anii banaman immoo deebi'ee mullate.

sourceString: They noted that when teachers in Israel went on strike during the flu season of 1999–2000, visits to doctors and the number of respiratory infections dropped by more than a fifth and more than two fifths respectively.
targetString: Barsiisonni Israa'el kan hubaman yeroo waqtii infuluweenzaa bara 1999–2000 akka ta'e hubatan, doktoroota daawwachuunii akkasumas lakkoofsi dhibee qaama hargansuu shanaffaa oliin gadi bu'ee fi walduraa duubaan lama shanaffaa caala.

sourceString: For schools and childcare facilities, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: Meeshaalee manneen barnootaa fi kunuunsa daa'imaaf, Wiirtuuwwan U.S To'annoof Ittisa Dhukkubaaf (U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention) cufamuu yeroo gabaabaa qulqulleessuuf yookaan namni hubame faffaca'insa hawaasaa malee yoo gamoo mana barumsaa keessa tureera ta'e baakteeriyaa dhukkuba fidan ajjeesuun qulqulleessuuf.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as cancelling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: Yemmuu daddarbiinsi hawaasa keessaa xinnoodhaa haga giddu galeessaattii jiraatutti, tooftaaleen gargar fageenya hawaasaa warreen akka imalawwan dirreetti taasifaman, walga'iilee haquu fi walitti qabamawwan gurguddoo akka barnoota jabeenya qaamaa ykn barnoota gareenii ykn sooratawwan kaafteeriyaa keessatti, fageenya taa'umsawwan gidduu dabaluu, yeroo galumsaa fi ba'umsaa sirnaan mijeessuun, daawwattoota hin barbaachifne daangessuu, fi daa'imman mallattoolee flu fakkaatan qabaniif bakka waajjira fayyaa adda ba'e fayyadamuun hojiirra oolchuun ni danda'ama.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.
targetString: Gaafa daddarbiinsi hammaan guddaa ta'e hawaasa naannoo keessa jiraatu, tarsiimoowwan walirraa fageenyaa hawaasummaatti dabalataan, haqamuun mana barnootaa yeroon isaa dheerate tilmaama keessa galuu mala.

sourceString: On 26 January, China instituted measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak which included extending the Spring Festival holiday to contain the outbreak.
targetString: Amajjii 26, Chaayinaan tarkaanfilee weerara COVID-19 ittisan kan vaayirasicha too'achuuf dheerachuu ayyaana Bonaa dabalatu qopheessan.

sourceString: Universities and schools around the country closed.
targetString: Yuuniversiitiileen fi manneen barnootaa biyyattii ni cufaman.

sourceString: On 23 February, Iran's Ministry of Health announced the closure of universities, higher educational institutions and schools in several cities and provinces.
targetString: Gurraandhala 23 tti, Ministeerri Fayyaa Iraan cufamuu yunivarsiitiiwwanii, dhaabbilee barnootaa olaanoo akkasumas manneen barnootaa magaalotaa fi koonyaawwan baay'ee beeksiseera.

sourceString: On 3 March, UNESCO released the first global numbers on school closures and affected students.
targetString: Bitootessa 3, UNESCO'n lakkoofsa manneen barnootaa cufamanii fi barattoota miidhamanii yeroo jalqabaatiif gadi dhiise.

sourceString: It reported that 13 countries had enacted preventive measures including the temporary closure of schools and universities, impacting 290.5 million students around the world.
targetString: Cufaatii yeroo manneen barnootaa fi Yuuniversiitilee, addunyaarratti barattoota miiliyoona 290.5 miidhe dabalatee, biyyoonni 13 tarkaanfilee ittisaa akka jalqaba gabaafameera.

sourceString: In reaction, UNESCO called on countries to support affected students and families and facilitate large-scale inclusive distance learning programmes.
targetString: Akka deebiitti, UNESCO'n barattootaa fi maatiiwwan miidhaman akka gargaaranii fi sagantaalee barnoota fageenyaa hunda galeessa ta'an ariifachiisuuf biyyootaaf waamicha taasiseera.

sourceString: On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
targetString: Bitootessa 4, akkumas Xaaliyaanitti namoonni du'an 100 gahaniin mootummaan Xaaliyaanii guutuu biyyaatti cufamuu manneen barnootaa fi yuunivarsiitiilee hundaa ajaje.

sourceString: In doing so, Italy became one of 22 countries on three continents which had announced or implemented school closures.
targetString: Kana gochuudhaan, Xaaliyaaniin biyyoota 22 ardiilee sadi keessaa cufama manneen barnootaa hojiirra oolchan keessaa tokko taate.

sourceString: On 5 March, the majority of learners affected by COVID-19 emergency measures were located in China, with 233 million learners affected, followed by Japan at 16.5 million and Iran at 14.5 million.
targetString: Bitootessa 5, barattoonni tarkaanfii muddamaa COVID-19 qabaman hedduun Chaayinaa keessatti argamu, barattoonni miiliyoonni 233 qabaman, itti aansuun Jaappaan miiliyoona 16.5 fi Iraan miiliyoona 14.5.

sourceString: By 10 March, one in five students worldwide was "staying away from school due to the COVID-19 crisis" while another one in four was barred from higher education institutions.
targetString: Bitootessa 10, barattoonni guutuu addunyaa “sababa qaala'iinsa COVID-19'tiin mana barnotaa irraa fagaataa jiru” yeroo afur keessaa tokko immoo dhabbilee barnoota olaanoo irraa daangeffaman.

sourceString: On 13 March, governments in 49 countries announced or implemented school closures, including 39 countries which closed schools nationwide and 22 countries with localised school closures.
targetString: Bitootessa 13 tti, mootummoonni biyyoota 49 keessaa cufamuu mana barnootaa beeksisaniiru yookaan hojiirra oolchaniiru, biyyoota 39 kanneen akka biyyaatti manneen barnootaa cufaniifi biyyoota 22 iddoowwan xiqqootti mana barumsaa cufan dabalatee.

sourceString: By 16 March, this figure increased from 49 to 73 countries according to UNESCO.
targetString: Akka UNESCO tti Bitootessa 16tti, ragaan kun biyyoota 49 irraa gara 73 tti guddateera.

sourceString: By 19 March, 50% of students worldwide were affected by school closures, corresponding to nationwide closures in 102 countries and local closures in 11 countries affecting 850 million children and youth.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 19, cufaatii guutuu biyyaattii biyyoota 102 keessattii fi cufaatii naannoomattii biyyoota 11 keesatti daa'immanii fi dargaggoota miiliyoona 850 miidhuusaatiin, 50% n baratttootaa addunyaa cufaatii manneen barnootaatiin miidhamaniiru.

sourceString: By 20 March, over 70% of the world's learners were impacted by closures, with 124 country-wide school closures.
targetString: Bitootessa 20'tti, barattoonni addunyaa 70% ol ta'an cufamaan walqabatee hubaman, cufamuu manneen barnoota 124 guutuu biyyaa wajjiin.

sourceString: On 23 March, all Nigerian school were found to have been closed down by Nigerian government, markets as well as companies were closed down and children were forbidden by parents to step out of their homes.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 23, manneen barnootaa Naayijeeriyaa hundi Mootummaa Naayijeeriyaatiin cufamanii, iddoowwan gabaa akkasumas kaampaanonnis kan cufamanii fi daa'imman mana isaaniitii akka hin baane maatiiwwan isaaniitiin ittifamaniiru.

sourceString: On 26 March, all New Zealand schools and universities have been closed down across the country.
targetString: Bitootessa 26, Niwuuziilaanditti manneen barnootaa fi yuunivarsiitiileen guutuu biyyaatti cufaman.

sourceString: The government has imposed a two-week holiday, allowing schools to transition to forms of distant teaching as soon as possible.
targetString: Mootummaan ayyaana torban lamaa dirqisiise, manneen barnootaa hanga danda'ameen barnoota fagoo akka kennan dandeessisuuf.

sourceString: Universities have closed for one week, but resumed with online teaching afterwards.
targetString: Yuuniversiitileen torbee tokkoof cufamanii turan, garuu isaan booda barsiisa toora internaataan itti fufaniiru.

sourceString: Other school services remain open, but teaching is restricted to distant learning.
targetString: Tajaajiloonni mana barumsaa biroon banamanii turu, garuu barsiisni barnoota fageenyaatti kan daanga'edha.

sourceString: By 27 March, nearly 90 percent of the world's student population was out of class.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 27, baayyinaan barattoota addunyaa dhibbeentaa 90 tti kan siqan dareedhaa ala ta'aniiru.

sourceString: Regions with schools remaining open included Taiwan, Singapore, Australia, Sweden, and some U.S. states.
targetString: Naannoleen manneen barnoota banamanii hafan kaninni dabalatu Taayiwaan, Singaapoor, Awsutraaliyaa, Iswiidin fi Bulchiinsota U.S. muraasa.

sourceString: By 29 March, more than 1.5 billion children and other students were affected by nationwide school closures.
targetString: Bitootesa gaafa 29, daa'imman biiliyoona 1.5 olii fi barattoonni biroon cufaatii manneen barnootaa guutuu biyyaatiin miidhamanii turan.

sourceString: Others were disrupted by localized closures.
targetString: Kanneen biroo cufamuu naannootiin jeeqaman.

sourceString: Until April 6, holidays were extended in all secondary schools of Turkmenistan.
targetString: Hanga Ebla 6'tti, manneen barnoota Turkimeenistaan hundattu ayyaanonni itti fufanii turan.

sourceString: An order signed by the Ministry of Education as a preventative measure aims to prevent the spread of respiratory diseases in connection with the WHO coronavirus pandemic.
targetString: Ajajni Ministeera Barnootaatiin akka tarkaanfii ittisaatti mallattaa'e weerara vaayirasii koroonaa Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) wajjiin ta'uun tatamsa'ina dhukkuboota qaama hargansuu ittisuuf kan kaayyefateedha.

sourceString: 10 countries have localised schools closures, UNESCO estimates  473,933,356  learners are potentially at risk (pre-primary to upper-secondary education) and 77,938,904 learners are potentially at risk in tertiary education.
targetString: Biyyoonni 10 cufamuu manneen barnootaa fudhatan, Barattoonni 473,933,356 ta'an rakkoo guddaa irra akka jiran (barnoota gadaanaa hanga olaanaatti) UNESCO tilmaame akkasumas barattoonni barnoota olaanoo 77,938,904 rakkoo keessa jiru.

sourceString: Note: Figures correspond to total number of learners enrolled at pre-primary, primary, lower-secondary, and upper-secondary levels of education [ISCED levels 0 to 3], as well as at tertiary education levels [ISCED levels 5 to 8] who could be affected should localised closures become countrywide.
targetString: Yaada: Fakkiiwwan ida'ama lakkoofsa barattoota barnoota sadarkaa gadaanaa, giddugaleessa, sadarkaa lammaffaa, fi olaanaatti hirmaatan [ISCED sadarkaa 0 hanga 3], akkasumas sadarkaa barnoota olaanoo [ISCED sadarkaa 5 hanga 8] hubaman cufamuu guutuu biyyaa gara naannoo isaaniitti fiduu qabu.

sourceString: Enrolment figures based on latest UNESCO Institute of Statistics data.
targetString: Lakkoofsonni galmee odeeffannoo Dhaabbata Istaatistiksii UNESCO haaraa irratti hundaa'u.

sourceString: School closures in response to the COVID-19 pandemic have shed a light on numerous issues affecting access to education, as well as broader socio-economic issues.
targetString: Weerara COVID-19 f akka deebiitti manneen barnootaa cufamuun dhimmoota hedduu argannaa barumsaa miidhanii fi akkasumas dhimmoota hawaas-diinagdee ballaaf ifa kan ta'edha.

sourceString: As of March 12, more than 370 million children and youth are not attending school because of temporary or indefinite country wide school closures mandated by governments in an attempt to slow the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: Akka Bitootessa 12'tti, sababa tatamsa'ina COVID-19 hir'isuuf mootummoonni manneen barnootaa yeroof yookaan guutumatti cufaniif daa'immanii fi dargaggoonni miiliyoona 370 caalan ta'an barnoota hordofaa hin jiran.

sourceString: As of 29 March, nearly 90% of the world's learners were impacted by closures.Even when school closures are temporary, it carries high social and economic costs.
targetString: Hanga Bitootessa 29tti, barattoonni addunyaa 90% jedhamuun hamma danda'amuun cufaatiidhaan dhiibbaan irra gaheera. Yeroo cufamuun mana barumsaa yeroodhaaf ta'ettillee, inni baasiiwwan hawaasummaafi diinagdee olaanaa baata.

sourceString: The disruptions they cause affect people across communities, but their impact is more severe for disadvantaged children and their families including interrupted learning, compromised nutrition, childcare problems and consequent economic cost to families who cannot work.
targetString: Tasgabbii dhabiinsi isaan sababa ta'aniif kun namoota hawaasa keessaa irraan dhiibbaa kan geessisudha, garuu daa'imman hanqinaalee qabanii fi maatiiwwan isaaniif barnoota jejjeeqame, hir'ina soorataa, rakkoolee oolmaa daa'immanii fi gatiiwwan diinagdee maatiiwwan hojjechuu hin dandeenyetti dhufu dabalatee dhiibbaa jabaa geessisuu mala.

sourceString: Working parents are more likely to miss work when schools close in order to take care of their children, incurring wage loss in many instances and negatively impacting productivity.
targetString: Maatiiwwan hojjetan wayita manneen barnootaa cufamanitti daa'immaan isaanii kunuunsuuf jecha hojii hafuun wantoota baayyeen galii akka dhaban fi oomishtummaa isaaniirratti dhiibbaa hin taane qabaata.

sourceString: Localised school closures place burdens on schools as parents and officials redirect children to schools that are open.
targetString: Cufaatiin manneen barnootaa naannawaan sababa maatiiwwan fi qondaaltonni barattoota gara manneen barnootaa banamootti erganiif manneen barnootaatti ba'aa ta'eera.

sourceString: Women often represent a large share of health-care workers and often cannot attend work because of childcare obligations that result from school closures.
targetString: Dubartoonni yeroo hunda hojjattoota tajajila fayyaa harka caalmaa qooddatu akkasumas yeroo hunda sababa cufamuu mana barnootaatiin daa'imman isaanii kunuunsuuf hojiirratti hin argaman.

sourceString: This means that many medical professionals are not at the facilities where they are most needed during a health crisis.
targetString: Kana jechuun ogeeyyonni fayyaa hedduun yeroo balaa kanatti meeshaa caalaatti barbaadan kan argan miti.

sourceString: Lack of access to technology or fast, reliable internet access can prevent students in rural areas and from disadvantaged families.
targetString: Hanqinni gahiinsa teknolojii yookaan gahiinsa interneetii saffisaa, amansiisaa barattoota iddoowwan baadiyyaa fi maatiiwwan humna hin qabne keessaa dhorkuu danda'a.

sourceString: Lack of access to technology or good internet connectivity is an obstacle to continued learning, especially for students from disadvantaged families.
targetString: Hanqinni argannaa teknoloojii fi quunnamtii interneetaa gaarii, keessattuu barattoota maatii rakkatoo irraa ta'aniif barnoota itti fufuuf gufuu ta'eera,

sourceString: In response to school closures caused by COVID-19, UNESCO recommends the use of distance learning programmes and open educational applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to reach learners remotely and limit the disruption of education.To aid in slowing the transmission of COVID-19, hundreds of libraries have temporarily closed.
targetString: Cufamuu mana barumsaa COVID-19'n gahe ilaalchisee, UNESCO'n faayidaa sagantaawwan barnoota fagoo akkasumas fayyadamoota barnootaa banoo fi hujeeffannoowwan kan manneen barnootaa fi barsiisonni barattoota fageenya irratti qaqqabuuf fi goolamuu barnootaa daangessuuf fayyadaman yaada kenneera. Faffaca'insa COVID-19 hir'isuu gargaaruuf, manneen kitaabaa dhibbaan lakkaa'aman yeroodhaaf cufamaniiru.

sourceString: In the United States, numerous major cities announced public library closures, including Los Angeles, San Francisco, Seattle, and New York City, affecting 221 libraries.
targetString: Yuunaayitis Isteetitti, magaalonni gurguddoon hedduun manneen kitaaba ummataa cufan, Loos Anjeles, Saan Firaansiiskoo, Siyaatil, fi Niwuu Yoorki dabalatee manneen kitaabaa 221 cufaan.

sourceString: For students without internet at home, this increases the difficulty of keeping up with distance learning.
targetString: Barattoota intarneetii manatti hin qabneef, kun rakkina barnoota fagoo wajjiin deemuu ol guddisa.

sourceString: School closures puts a strain on parents and guardians to provide childcare and manage distance learning while children are out of school.
targetString: Manneen barnootaa cufamuun maatii fi kunuunsitoota oolmaa daa'immanii dhiheessan fi yeroo ijoolleen mana barnootaatiin ala ta'an barnoota fagoo hogganan nuffisiisee jira.

sourceString: In the absence of alternative options, working parents often leave children alone when schools close and this can lead to risky behaviours, including increased influence of peer pressure and substance abuse.
targetString: Filannoowwan biroon dhibuu isaaniitiin, maatiiwwan hojjetanii bulan wayita manni barumsaa cufamanitti daa'imman qophaatti kan dhiisanii fi kunimmoo dhiibbaa hiriyaa fi wantoota hin malleefiitti fayyadamuu dabalatee, amaloota rakkisoo hordofsiisuu danda'a.

sourceString: Many children worldwide rely on free or discounted meals at schools.
targetString: Ijoolleen guutuu addunyaa hedduun nyaata mana barnootaa kan bilisaa yookaan gatiin hir'ate irratti hirkatu.

sourceString: When schools close, nutrition is compromised.Nutrition plays a critical role in cognitive development and academic performance for children.In Washington State, around 45% of the states 1.1 million students enrolled in traditional public and charter schools qualify for subsidised school meals.
targetString: Yeroo manneen barnootaa cufaman, sooranni addaan cite. Sooranni guddina sammuu fi barnootaa daa'immanii keessatti gahee olaanaa qaba. Kutaa Waashingitan keessatti barattoota miliyoona 1.1 keessaa %45 dhiheessa nyaata mana barnootaa fi kan aadaa hawaasaa keessatti hirmaatan.

sourceString: At least 520,000 students and their families may be affected by food insecurity as a result of school closures.School lunch programmes are the second-biggest anti-hunger initiative in the United States after food stamps.
targetString: Sababa cufamuu manneen barnootaatiif yoo xiqqaate barattootaa fi maatiin 520,000 hanqinni nyaataa muudate. Yuunaayitid Isteetitti sagantaa irbaata mana baruumsaa warraaqsa farra-beelaa guddicha lammaffaadha.

sourceString: Every year, nearly 30 million children rely on schools to provide free or low-cost meals including breakfast, lunch, snacks, and even dinner.In Alabama, where state-wide school closures as of 18 March have affected over 720,000 students, the state Superintendent announced that staff in schools disproportionately affected by poverty would create meal distribution networks to provide food for students who rely on school lunches.
targetString: Waggaa waggaan, daa'imoonni miiliyoona 30 jechuun hamma danda'amuun manneen barnootaa nyaata bilisaa yookaan gatii gadi aanaa ciree, laaqana, qacanii, fi irbaatallee dabalachuun dhiyeessan irratti hirkatu. Alaabaamaa keessatti, iddoo cufamuun mana barnootaa akka guutummaa biyyaa Bitootessa 18 tii barattoota 720,000 irra dhiibbaa geessiseen, to'ataa olaanaan mootummichaa hojjetaan manneen barnootaa haala madaalamaa hin taaneen hiyyummaan dhiibbaan irra gahe keessaa mantagoowwan raabsa nyaataa barattoota laaqanoota mana barumsaa irratti hirkataniif nyaata dhiyeessuuf uumuu danda'uu beeksise.

sourceString: School closures negatively impact student learning outcomes.
targetString: Cufaatiin mana barumsaa faayidaalee barachuu barattootaa irratti miidhaa hin taane ni qabaata.

sourceString: Schooling provides essential learning and when schools close, children and youth are deprived opportunities for growth and development.
targetString: Manneen barnootaa keessa ta'uun barnoota barbaachisoo kan kennuu fi manneen barnootaa wayita cufaman, daa'immanii fi dargaggootni caraa guddinaa fi misoomaa ni dhabu.

sourceString: The disadvantages are disproportionate for under-privileged learners who tend to have fewer educational opportunities beyond school.Student drop-out rates tend to increase as an effect of school closures due to the challenge of ensuring all students return to school once school closures ends.
targetString: Miidhaawwan barattoota carraa xiqqaa qaban kanneen carraawwan barnootaa xiqqaa qabaniif mana barnootaan alatti kan wal hin madaalle. Hammi barattoonni mana barumsaa gadhiisanii ba'an akka miidhaa cufamuu mana barumsaa sababa rakkoo yeroo cufamuun mana barumsaa xumuramutti barattoonni hundi mana barnootaatti deebi'uu isaanii mirkaneessuutiin dabaluu jalqabeera.

sourceString: This is especially true of protracted closures.Schools are hubs of social activity and human interaction.
targetString: Kuni immoo cufaatiilee yeroo dheeraatiif dhugaadha. Manneen barnoota sochiilee hawaasummaa fi walitti dhufeenya namaaf giddu galadha.

sourceString: When schools are closed, many children and youth miss out of on social contact that is essential to learning and development.When schools close parents are often asked to facilitate the learning of children at home and can struggle to perform this task.
targetString: Yeroo manneen barnootaa cufaman, hedduun daa'immanii fi dargaggootaa walqunnamtii hawaasaatiin ala waan ta'aniif barnootaa fi guddinaaf murteessaadha. Yeroo manneen barnootaa cufaman maatiin barnoota ijoollee manattii akka mijeessanii fi akka hojjatan qabsaa'uu gaafatamu.

sourceString: This is especially true for parents with limited education and resources.
targetString: Kun keessattuu maatii barnootaa fi qabeenya muraasa qabaniif dhuugaadha.

sourceString: Potential impacts of school closures and reliance on distance learning are not addressed in federal acts of legislation at this time.
targetString: Dhiibbaaleen jajjaboon cufaatii manneen barnootaa fi hirkannaan barnoota fagoorrattii yeroo kanatti tumaalee seera federaalaatiin hin furamne.

sourceString: Formal education — as opposed to informal education or non-formal education — tends to refer to schools, colleges, universities and training institutions.
targetString: Barnooti sirnaawaa — fallaa barnoota seeraan alaa yookaan sirnaawaa hin taaneen — manneen barnootaa, koolleejjota, yunivarsiitiiwwan fi dhaabbilee leenjii agarsiisa.

sourceString: A 1974 report by the World Bank defined formal education as the following:Formal education: the hierarchically structured, chronologically graded ‘education system', running from primary school through the university and including, in addition to general academic studies, a variety of specialised programmes and institutions for full-time technical and professional training.The majority of data collected on the number of students and learners impacted by COVID-19 has been calculated based on the closure of formal education systems.
targetString: Gabaasi Baankii Addunyaatiin (World Bank) 1974 barnoota sirnaawaa akka armaan gadiitti hiike: Barnoota sirnaawaa: gulantaan kan caaseffame, ‘sirna barnootaa' akka duraaf aanteetti sadarkeeffamu, barumsa mana barnootaa sadarkaa tokkoffaa hanga yuunivarsiitiitti adeemsifamu akkasumas dabalachuun, qu'annoo barnoota waliigalaatti dabalataan, sagantaawwan ogummaa addaa garaagaraa fi jaarmayaalee leenjii tekinikaa yeroo-guutuuf fi ogummaan ta'e. Harki caalaan deetaa baay'ina barattootaafi warra baratan irratti sassaabamee COVID-19'n dhiibbaan irra gahu cufamuu sirnoota barnoota sirnaawaa irratti hundaa'uun shallagame.

sourceString: The UNESCO Institute for Statistics provides figures on students impacted by COVID-19 corresponding to the number of learners enrolled at pre-primary, primary, lower-secondary, and upper-secondary levels of education [ISCED levels 0 to 3], as well as at tertiary education levels [ISCED levels 5 to 8].
targetString: Dhabbanni UNESCO Istaatistiksii gabatee barattoota COVID-19'n miidhamanii kanneen sadarkaa barnoota gadi aannaa, giddu galeessaa, sadarkaa lammaffaa fi sadarkaa olaanoo keessatti hirmaatan [sadarkaa ISCED 0 to 3], akkasumas kanneen akka sadarkaa barnoota sadaffaa [sadarkaa ISCED 5 to 8].

sourceString: Early childhood educational programmes are usually designed for children below the age of 3 and may refer to preschools, nursery schools, kindergartens, and some day care programmes.
targetString: Sagantaaleen barnoota daa'immanii duraa yeroo baayyee daa'imman umrii 3 gadiitiif kan qophaa'uu fi barnoota idileen duraa, mana barumsaa daa'imman xixinnoo, oolmaawwan daa'immanii fi sagantaalee eegumsa guyyaa muraasa kan ibsudha.

sourceString: While many primary and secondary schools have closed around the world due to COVID-19, measures impacting early childhood educational programmes have varied.
targetString: Yeroo manneen barnootaa sadarkaa tokkoffaa fi lammaffaa sababa COVID-19'tiif guutuu addunyaatti cufamanitti, tarkaanfileen sagantaa barnoota daa'immanii huban garaagarummaa qabu.

sourceString: In some countries and territories, preschools and day cares are considered necessary services and have not closed in tandem with broader school closure measures.In the United States, the Washington State Department of Children, Youth, and Families encouraged child care and early learning centres to stay open.
targetString: Biyyootaafi daangaawwan muraasa keessatti, oolmaawwan daa'immanii fi iddoowwan kunuunsa daa'imaa akka tajaajiloota barbaachisootti ilaalamu akkasumas tarkaanfiiwwan cufamuu mana barumsaa bal'aa waliin walduraa duubaan hin cufamne. Yunaayitid Isteetis keessatti, Muummeen Ijoollee, Dargaggootaafi Maatiiwwanii Mootummaa Waashingtan wiirtuuwwan kunuunsa daa'imaafi barnoota duraa akka isaan banamanii turan jajjabeesse.

sourceString: Some school districts may offer alternative child care options, prioritising the children of first responders and healthcare workers.
targetString: Kutaaleen mana barumsaa muraasni, daa'imman deebi-kennitoota jalqabaa fi hojjettoota fayyaaf dursa kennuudhaan, filannoowwan kunuunsa daa'immanii dhiyeessuutii mala.

sourceString: The governor of Maryland mandated that specific child care services remain open for the children of emergency personnel while Washington State and California have left it to the discretion of care providers.
targetString: Yeroo kutaan Waashingitan fi Kaalifoorniyaa tajaajiltootaaf dhiisanitti mootummaan Meeriilaand namoota muddamaatiif oolmaan daa'immanii addaa akka jiraatu dirqamsiisa.

sourceString: California Governor Gavin Newsom explained his state's position, saying “We need our child care facilities, our daycare centers, to operate to absorb the impact of these school closures.”
targetString: Hogganaan Kaalifoorniyaa Gaaviin Niwuusam kallattii naannoo isaanii, “miidhaa cufamuu manneen barnootaa kanatti madaquuf dhiheessa oolmaa daa'immanii, giddugala kunuunsaa barbaanna” jechuun ibsan.

sourceString: Colorado has encouraged the development of "tool kits" for parents to use at home to emulate the lessons children would have received in their early learning programmes.In Japan, Prime Minister Shinzo Abe closed all schools throughout the country until April 8, however, children's daycare facilities were excluded.
targetString: Koloraadoon adeemsa “meeshaalee” maatiin barnoota ijoolleen fudhatan sagantaa barnoota isaanii keessatti jalqaba fudhatan manatti itti fayyadaman jajjabeesse. Ministeerri muummee Jaappaan Shiinzoo Aabeen manneen barnootaa guutuu biyyaa keessa jiran hanga Ebla 8'tti cufan, garuu, oolmaa daa'immanii hin hammatu.

sourceString: In early March, five adults associated with a nursing facility for preschool children in Kobe tested positive for coronavirus.
targetString: Bitootessa gara jalqabaatti, ga'eessonni shan kan Kobe tajaajila yaalaa daa'imman barnoota idileen duraa waliin walqabatan bu'aan qorannoo isaanii poosetiiva ta'e.

sourceString: After testing over one hundred children at the facility, a preschool student was found to be carrying the virus.
targetString: Buufatichatti erga daa'imman dhibba tokkoo ol qoratanii booda, barattoonni mana barnootaatiin alaa vaayirasicha akka qabaatanii argaman.

sourceString: Primary or elementary education typically consists of the first four to seven years of formal education.
targetString: Barnoonni sadarkaa duraa ykn elementerii barnoota idilee waggaa afurii hanga torbaatti jiran kan hammatudha.

sourceString: The International Baccalaureate Organization (IBO) canceled the examinations for its Diploma Programme and Career-related Programme candidates scheduled between 30 April and 22 May 2020, reportedly affecting more than 200,000 students worldwide.
targetString: Dhaabbanni Baakaalooreetii Addunyaa (IBO) n qorumsawwan kaadhimamtoota Sagantaa Dippiloomaa fi Sagantaalee Hojiin walqabatanii gidduu Eebla 30 fi Caamsaa 22, 2020tti wayitiin bayeefii ture haquun, addunyaarraa barattoota 200,000tti siqan irratti miidhuu fiduunsaa gabaafameera.

sourceString: The IBO stated that it would award candidates their diplomas or certificates based on "their coursework" and "the established assessment expertise, rigor, and quality control already built into the programme."
targetString: IBO'n kaadhimamtoota “gosa hojii isaanii” fi “ tilmaama dandeettii hojjatame, cimina, fi too'annaa qulqullinaa saganticha keessatti ijaaramee jiru” irratti hundaa'uu diploomaa yookaan waraqaa ragaa akka badhaasu hime.

sourceString: Tertiary education, also known as higher education, refers to the non-compulsory educational levels that follow completion of secondary school or high school.
targetString: Barnoonni sadarkaa sadaffaa, Barnoota sadarkaa olaanaa jedhamuun beekamu, sadarkaa barnootaa dirqama hin taane kan mana barumsaa sadarkaa lammaffaa ykn mana barumsaa olaanaa xumuruun booda dhufudha.

sourceString: Tertiary education is normally taken to include undergraduate and postgraduate education, as well as vocational education and training.
targetString: Barnoonni olaanoon barnoota digirii jalqabaa fi digirii sadaffaa of keessatti hammata, akkasumas barnoota dandeettii hojii fi leenjii of keessatti hammata.

sourceString: Individuals who complete tertiary education generally receive certificates, diplomas, or academic degrees.
targetString: Namoonni barnoota sadarkaa olaanoo xumuran walumaagalatti waraqaa raga, dippiloomaa, yookaan digirii fudhatu.

sourceString: Undergraduate education is education conducted after secondary education and prior to post-graduate education, for which the learner is typically awarded a bachelor's degree.
targetString: Barnoonni digirii duraa barumsa barnoota sadarkaa lammaffaa boodaafi barnoota digirii lammaffaa dura adeemsifama, kan baraataan addatti digirii jalqabaa ittiin argatu.

sourceString: Students enrolled in higher education programmes at colleges, universities, and community colleges are often refereed to in countries such as United States as "college students."The closure of colleges and universities has widespread implications for students, faculty, administrators, and the institutions themselves.
targetString: Barattoonni sagantaa barnoota olaanoo kolleejjii, yuunivarsiitii, fi kolleejjii hawaasaatti hordofan biyyoota akka Yuunaayitid Isteetitti “barattoota kolleejjii” jedhamu. Cufamuun kolleejjii fi yuunivarsiitii babal'ate barattoota, kutaa barnootaa, hoggansaa, fi dhaabbilee mataa isaaniitiif murteessaadha.

sourceString: Colleges and universities across the United States have been called upon to issue refunds to students for the cost of tuition and room and board.
targetString: Kolleejjii fi Yuunivarsiitiileen Yuunaayitid Isteet keessa jiraniif kafaltii barnootaa, kan kutaa fi miseensaa akka irra deebiin ramadamu waamichi dhihaate.

sourceString: In the United States of America, Colleges and universities operate as "mini-cities" which generate significant revenue for cities, states, and regions.
targetString: Yuunaayitid Isteet oof Ameerikaatti, Kolleejjii fi Yuunivarsiitiileen akka “magaala xiqqootti” hojjatu, kunis magaalota, kutaalee, fi naannoleef galii murteessaa maddisiisa.

sourceString: For example, Princeton University contributed $1.58 billion USD to the New Jersey economy and students spent about $60 million in off-campus spending.
targetString: Fakkeenyaaf, Yuunivarsiitiin Piriinsitan diinagdee Niwuu Jeersiitiif doolaara Ameerikaa biiliyoona 1.58 gumaache akkasumas barattoonni baasii kaampaasiin alaatiin doolaara miiliyoona 60 baasan.

sourceString: College and university closures have a domino effect on economies with far-reaching implications.According to Linda Bilmes of the Harvard Kennedy School, "local hotels, restaurants, cafes, shops, car rental agencies and other local businesses obtain a significant share of annual revenue from graduation week and college reunions...
targetString: Kolleejjii fi yuunivarsiitiileen cufamuun ilaalcha qixaan bira gahuutiin diinagdee irratti miidhaa qaba. Akka Liindaa Biilmees mana barnoota Haarvaaerd Kennediitti, “hoteelonni naannoo, manneen nyaataa, manneen nyaata fi dugaatii, dukkaanota, dhaabbilee konkolaataa kireessanii fi daldalli naannoo kanneen biroo galii waggaa torban eebbaa fi banamuu kolleejjii keessatti qooda olaanaa qaba.

sourceString: these communities will suffer a lot of economic damage if the colleges remain closed at that time."Small towns which rely on college students to support the local economy and provide labour to local businesses are especially impacted by school closures and the exodus of students from campus.
targetString: Hawaasni kunneen kolleejjonni yeroo sanatti cufamanii utuu turanii miidhaawwan diinagdee hedduuf ni saaxilamu. “Magaalonni xixinnoon diinagdee hawaasa naannoo deeggaruu fi daldalawwan naannoof humna dhiyeessuuf barattoota kolleejjii irratti hundaa'an cufaatii manneen barnootaatii fi barattoonni kaampaasii keessaa baafamuun addatti miidhamaniiru.

sourceString: In Ithaca, New York, Cornell University students spent at least $4 million a week in Tompkins county.
targetString: Itaakaa, Niwuuyoorkitti, barattoonni yuunivarsiitii Cornell kutaa Tooppiskiinitti torbanitti yoo xiqqaate doolaara miiliyoona 4 baasu.

sourceString: In the wake of Cornell's decision to keep students home following spring break and transition to virtual instruction, the Mayor of Ithaca called for "immediate and forceful federal action — we will see a horrific economic impact as a result of Cornell University closing."
targetString: Murtoo Cornell boqonnaa birraa hordofuudhaan barattoonni mana akka turanii fi cee'umsa gara barumsa toora interneetaarratti, Kantiibaan Ithaca “tarkaansii hatattamaa fi humnaa federaalaaf — sabab cufaatii Yuuniversiitii Cornell'f dhiibbaa diinagdee hamaa kan ilaallu ta'a” jechuun waamicha dhiyeessaniiru.

sourceString: UNESCO is sharing 10 recommendations during this period:
targetString: Yeroo kanatti UNESCO'n yaadota kennaman 10 qoodaa jira:

sourceString: Examine the readiness and choose the most relevant tools: Decide on the use high-technology and low-technology solutions based on the reliability of local power supplies, internet connectivity, and digital skills of teachers and students.
targetString: Qophaa'ummaa qoradhuu meeshaa caalaatti itti dhihaatu filadhu: dandeettii barattootaa fi barsiisotaa, qunnaman intarneetii, dhiheessa humna naannoo irratti hundaa'uun fayyadama teeknoolojii olaanaa fi teeknoolojii gadi aanaa murteessaa.

sourceString: This could range through integrated digital learning platforms, video lessons, MOOCs, to broadcasting through radios and TVs.
targetString: Kun karaa hujeeffannoowwan barnoota dijitaalaa walfudhatoo ta'an, barnoota suur-sagalee, MOOCwwanii, hanga tamsaasa karaa raadiyoofi televiiziyoonaatti deema.

sourceString: Ensure inclusion of the distance learning programmes: Implement measures to ensure that students including those with disabilities or from low-income backgrounds have access to distance learning programmes, if only a limited number of them have access to digital devices.
targetString: Sagantaan barnoonni fagoo hammataa ta'uu mirkaneessaa: barattoonni kanneen miidhaa qaamaa qaban yookaan galii gadi aanaa qaban dabalatee sagantaa barnoota fagoo argachuu isaanii dhogoomsuuf tarkaanfiilee fudhadhaa, yoo muraasni isaanii qofti dhiheessa meeshaalee dijiitaalaa qabaatan.

sourceString: Consider temporarily decentralising such devices from computer labs to families and support them with internet connectivity.
targetString: Meeshaalee akkasii kutaa kompiwuutara irraa yeroof adda baasaa maatii intarneetiin gargaaraa.

sourceString: Protect data privacy and data security: Assess data security when uploading data or educational resources to web spaces, as well as when sharing them with other organisations or individuals.
targetString: Iccitii deetaafi nageenya deetaa eegaa: Nageenya deetaa yeroo deetaa yookaan barruulee barnootaa gara iddoowwan saphaphuutti ol feetanitti, akkasumas yeroo isaaniin dhaabbilee yookaan namoota dhuunfaa kan biroo waliin qooddattanitti xiinxalaa.

sourceString: Ensure that the use of applications and platforms does not violate students' data privacy.
targetString: Fayyadamni fayyadamootaafi hujeeffannoowwanii iccitii deetaa barataa akka hin cabsine mirkaneeffadhaa.

sourceString: Prioritize solutions to address psychosocial challenges before teaching: Mobilize available tools to connect schools, parents, teachers, and students with each other.
targetString: Barsiisuun dura rakkoolee xiinsammuu hawaasaa furuuf furmaatawwaniif dursa kennuu: manneen barnootaa, maatiiwwaan, barsiisota, fi barattoota walquunnamsiisuuf wantoota jiran gara kan moobaayilaatti jijjiiru.

sourceString: Create communities to ensure regular human interactions, enable social caring measures, and address possible psychosocial challenges that students may face when they are isolated.
targetString: Walitti dhufeenya idilee mirkaneessuuf, tarkaanfiiwwan kunuunsa hawaasaa dandeessisuuf, akkasumas danqaawwan xiinhawaasummaa ta'uu danda'an kan barattoonni yeroo qofaatti baafaman isaan quunnamuu malu hiikuuf hawaasota uumaa.

sourceString: Plan the study schedule of the distance learning programmes: Organise discussions with stakeholders to examine the possible duration of school closures and decide whether the distance learning programme should focus on teaching new knowledge or enhance students' knowledge of prior lessons.
targetString: Sagantaa barumsaa sagantaawwan barnoota fageenyaa karoorsaa: Qaamota gahee qaban waliin turmaata cufamuu mana barumsaa ta'uu danda'u qorachuuf fi sagantaan barnoota fagoo beekumsa haaraa barsiisuu moo beekumsa barataan barnoota duraa irratti qabu fooyyessuu irratti xiyyeeffachuu akka qabu murteessuuf mariiwwan gurmeessaa.

sourceString: Plan the schedule depending on the situation of the affected zones, level of studies, needs of students needs, and availability of parents.
targetString: Haalota akka zoonota miidhaman, sadarkaa barnootaa, wantoota bu'uuraa barattoonni barbaadanii fi akkaataa argama maatii irratti hundaa'uun wayitii karoorfachuu.

sourceString: Choose the appropriate learning methodologies based on the status of school closures and home-based quarantines.
targetString: Haala cufaatiiwwan mana barnoota fi iddoo turtii manatti irratti hundaa'uun maloota baruu fi barsiisuu sirrii ta'e filadhu.

sourceString: Avoid learning methodologies that require face-to-face communication.
targetString: Maloota baruu fi barsiiuu quunnamtii fuulaa-fi-fuulaa barbaadan hambisi.

sourceString: Provide support to teachers and parents on the use of digital tools: Organise brief training or orientation sessions for teachers and parents as well, if monitoring and facilitation are needed.
targetString: Sadarkaa itti fayyadama meeshaalee dijiitaalaa irratti maatii fi barsiisotaaf gargaarsa dhiheessaa: Sagantaa leenjii gabaabaa barsiisotaa fi maatiifis qindeessaa, yoo hordofuu fi mijeessuun barbaachise.

sourceString: Help teachers to prepare the basic settings such as solutions to the use of internet data if they are required to provide live streaming of lessons.
targetString: Barsiisonni barnoota karaa tamsaasa kallattiitiin dabarsuu yoo barbaadan wantoota akka intarneetiin mijeessudhaan gargaaraa.

sourceString: Blend appropriate approaches and limit the number of applications and platforms: Blend tools or media that are available for most students, both for synchronous communication and lessons, and for asynchronous learning.
targetString: Argannoowwan sirrii walitti makaa akkasumas lakkoofsa gaaffii fi haalaa daangessaa: meeshaa walitti makuu yookaan miidiyaa barattoota hedduuf qophaa'aa ta'e, walqunnamtii gar-lameetii fi barnootaaf kan ta'u, fi barnoota gar-tokkeef kan ta'u.

sourceString: Avoid overloading students and parents by asking them to download and test too many applications or platforms.
targetString: Barattootaa fi maatiin wantootaa fi moosaajiiwwan baay'ee akka buusaniif gaafachuudhaan hojii itti hin baay'isinaa.

sourceString: Develop distance learning rules and monitor students' learning process: Define the rules with parents and students on distance learning.
targetString: Seera barnoota fagoo ijaaraa akkasumas adeemsa barnoota barattootaa too'adhaa: maatii fi barattoota wajjiin barnoota fagoo irratti seera kaa'aa.

sourceString: Design formative questions, tests, or exercises to monitor closely students' learning process.
targetString: Gaaffiiwwan amala namaa irratti dhiibbaa jabaa qaban, qormaatawwan, yookaan gilgaalota adeemsa barumsa barataa dhiyeenyaan to'atan saxaxaa.

sourceString: Try to use tools to support submission of students' feedback and avoid overloading parents by requesting them to scan and send students' feedback
targetString: Fuudhiinsa duub-deebii barattootaa deeggaruuf meeshaalee fayyadamuu fi maatiiwwan duub-deebii barattootaa iskaan akka godhanii fi erganiif gaaffiin dhiphisuu irraa of qusachuu yaali.

sourceString: Define the duration of distance learning units based on students' self-regulation skills: Keep a coherent timing according to the level of the students' self-regulation and metacognitive abilities especially for livestreaming classes.
targetString: Dandeettiiwwan of to'achuu barattootaa irratti hundaa'uun turtii borannoowwan barnoota fagoo addeessi: akkaataa gulantaa of to'achuu barataatiin fi dandeettiiwwan yaaduu keessattuu dareewwan tamsaasa kallattiin kennamaniitiin yeroo walitti bubbuti.

sourceString: Preferably, the unit for primary school students should not be more than 20 minutes, and no longer than 40 minutes for secondary school students.
targetString: Fooyya'iinsaan, barannoon barattoota sadarkaa tokkoffaa daqiiqaa 20 caaluu hin qabu, akkasumas barattoota mana barnoota sadarkaa lammaffaatiif daqiiqaa 40 caaluu hin qabu.

sourceString: Create communities and enhance connection: Create communities of teachers, parents, and school managers to address sense of loneliness or helplessness, facilitate sharing of experience and discussion on coping strategies when facing learning difficulties.
targetString: Hawaasa ijaaraa akkasumas walqunnamtii uumaa: miira kophummaa yookaan gargaarsa maleessummaa ibsuuf, wal jijjiirraa muuxannoo mijeessuu fi yeroo rakkoo barnootaa muudattan tooftaalee fala ta'an irratti mari'achuuf hawaasa barsiisota, maatii, fi hoggantoota mana barnootaa of keessatti hamate ijaaraa.

sourceString: 290 million students out of school due to COVID-19: UNESCO releases first global numbers and mobilizes response,   UNESCO.
targetString: Barattoonni miiliyoona 290'ni sababa COVID-19'n mana barnootaa ala jiru: UNESCO'n lakkoofsota addunyaawoo jalqabaa gadhiisa akkasumas deebii qindeessa, UNESCO.

sourceString: WHEREAS on March 4, 2020, I proclaimed a State of Emergency to exist in California as a result of the threat of COVID-19;
targetString: AKKASUMAS Bitootessa 4, 2020, sababa COVID-19 Kaalifoorniyaatti labsiin yeroo muddamaa akka labsamu dabarseen jira.

sourceString: and WHEREAS in a short period of time, COVID-19 has rapidly spread throughout California, necessitating updated and more stringent guidance from federal, state, and local public health officials;
targetString: fi GARUU yeroo gabaabaa keessatti, COVID-19 Kaalifoorniyaa keessatti saffisaan tatamsa'e, qajeelfama murtaa'aa fi akka barbaachisummaa isaatti qophaa'e federaala, naannoo, fi hoggantoota fayyaa hawaasaa naannoo irraa;
