sourceString: and WHEREAS for the preservation of public health and safety throughout the entire State of California, I find it necessary for all Californians to heed the State public health directives from the Department of Public Health.
targetString: Akkasumas HAALA ittisa fayyaa hawaasaa fi nageenya guutuu kutaa Kaalifoorniyaatti, ummanni Kaalifoorniyaa xiyyeeffannoo kallattii yaala fayyyaa isaa gara Dippaartimanii Fayyaa Ummataatti gochuun barbaachisaa ta'ee natti mul'ata.

sourceString: NOW, THEREFORE, I, GAVIN NEWSOM, Governor of the State of California, in accordance with the authority vested in me by the State Constitution and statutes of the State of California, and in particular, Government Code sections 8567, 8627, and 8665 do hereby issue the following Order to become effective immediately:
targetString: AMMA, KANAAFUU, ANI, GAAVIIN NIWUUSAM, hogganaan kutaa Kaalifoorniyaa, aangoo heerri biyyaa naaf kennee fi seera Kaalifoorniyaa, fi addatti Koodii Mootummaa kutaa 8567, 8627, fi 8665 ajajni armaan gadii akka hojiirra oolu dhaama:

sourceString: IT IS HEREBY ORDERED THAT:
targetString: HAALA KANAAN AJAJAME:

sourceString: 1) To preserve the public health and safety, and to ensure the healthcare delivery system is capable of serving all, and prioritizing those at the highest risk and vulnerability, all residents are directed to immediately heed the current State public health directives, which I ordered the Department of Public Health to develop for the current statewide status of COVID-19.
targetString: 1)Fayyummaa fi nagummaa hawaasaa eeguu fi sirna qaqqabsiisa eegumsa fayyaa hunda tajaajiluu akka danda'uu fi warreen balaa keessa jiranii fi hundarra saaxilamoo ta'aniif ta'uu mirkaneessuuf, jiraattonni qajeelchawwan fayyaa haawaa Bulchiinsaa yeroo amma, ani Muummeen Fayyaa Hawaasaa haala COVID-19 guutuu bulchiinsa kanaa irratti akka baasuuf ajajeef hatattamaan xiyyeeffannoo akka kennan kallattiin kaa'ameera.

sourceString: Those directives are consistent with the March 19, 2020, Memorandum on Identification of Essential Critical Infrastructure Workers During COVID-19 Response, found at: https://covid19.ca.gov/.
targetString: Qajeelfamoonni sanneen kan Bitootessa 19, 2020 waliin tokkichuma, Katabbii Yaadannoo Gabaabaa Hojjettoota Bu'uuraalee Misoomaa Barbaachisoo Murteessoo Adda Baasuu Waqtii Deebii COVID-19 tti Kenname, iddoo argame: https://covid19.ca.gov/.

sourceString: ORDER OF THE STATE PUBLIC HEALTH OFFICER
targetString: AJAJA HOGGANAA FAYYAA HAWAASAA NAANNOO

sourceString: To protect public health, I as State Public Health Officer and Director of the California Department of Public Health order all individuals living in the State of California to stay home or at their place of residence except as needed to maintain continuity of operations of the federal critical infrastructure sectors, as outlined at https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors.
targetString: Fayyaa hawaasaa eeguudhaaf, ani akka Qondaala Fayyaa Hawaasaa Bulchiinsichaattii fi Daayirektera Muummee Fayyaa Hawaasaa Kaalifoorniyaatti , itti fufiinsa bobbiiwwan sekteroota bu'uuraalee misoomaa federaalaa ijoo eeguu https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors irratti tuqame irraan kan hafe, namoonni Kaalifoorniyaa keessa jiraachaa jiran hunduu akka manaa ykn iddoo jireenyaa isaanii turan nan ajeja.

sourceString: In addition, and in consultation with the Director of the Governor's Office of Emergency Services, I may designate additional sectors as critical in order to protect the health and well-being of all Californians.
targetString: Dabalataan, akkasumas tajaajila gorsaa Daarektara Waajjira Bulchaa Tajaajiloota Balaa Tasaa waliin, Ani fayyaafi fayyummaa namoota Kaalifoorniyaa hunda eeguuf seektaroota dabalataa akka yaachisootti moggaasuun mala.

sourceString: Pursuant to the authority under the Health and Safety Code 120125, 120140, 131080, 120130(c), 120135, 120145, 120175 and 120150, this order is to go into effect immediately and shall stay in effect until further notice.
targetString: Akkaataa abbootii taayitaa fayyaa fi koodii nageenyaa 120125, 120140, 131080, 120130(c), 120135, 120145, 120175 and 120150 jala jiraniitti, ajajni kun hojiirra oola akkasumas hanga ifoomsa dabalataatti tura.

sourceString: The federal government has identified 16 critical infrastructure sectors whose assets, systems, and networks, whether physical or virtual, are considered so vital to the United States that their incapacitation or destruction would have a debilitating effect on security, economic security, public health or safety, or any combination thereof.
targetString: Mootummaan federaalaa sekteroota bu'uuraalee misoomaa murteessoo ta'an 16 kan qabeenyi dhaabbataan, hojmaatnii fi walitti hidhamiinsi isaanii, kan argamus kan hin argamnes haa ta'u, humna dhabuun ykn diigamuun isaanii miidhaa dadhabsiisaa nageenya, nageenya diinagdee, fayyaafi nagummaa hawaasaa, ykn walitti dabalam kamiiyyuu qabachuu waan danda'aniif, Yuunaayitid Isteetsiif bu'aa kan qabanidha

sourceString: I order that Californians working in these 16 critical infrastructure sectors may continue their work because of the importance of these sectors to Californians' health and well-being.
targetString: Lammiileen Kaalifoorniyaa buufata addaa 16 keessa hojjatan sababa hojiin isaaniii fayyaa fi nageenya lammiileee Kaalifoorniyaatiif barbaachisaa ta'eef hojii isaanii itti fufuu akka qaban nan ajaja.

sourceString: This Order is being issued to protect the public health of Californians.
targetString: Ajajni kun fayyaa hawaasa Kaalifoorniyaa kunuunsuuf kan taa'e.

sourceString: The California Department of Public Health looks to establish consistency across the state in order to ensure that we mitigate the impact of COVID-19.
targetString: Kutaan Fayyaa Hawaasaa Kaalifoorniyaa guutuu naannootti miidhaa COVID-19 hir'isuu keenya mirkaneessuuf yaada dhaabbii bu'uuressuuf ilaalaa jira.

sourceString: Our goal is simple, we want to bend the curve, and disrupt the spread of the virus.
targetString: Galmi keenya salphaadha, golboo sana diriirsuu barbaanna, akkasumas tatamsa'ina vaayirasichaa dhaabuu barbaanna.

sourceString: The supply chain must continue, and Californians must have access to such necessities as food, prescriptions, and health care.
targetString: Sararri dhiheessaa itti fufuu qaba, akkasumas lammiileen Kaalifoorniyaa wantoota akkanaa kanneen akka nyaataa, qorichootaa, fi tajaajila fayyaa argachuu qabu.

sourceString: When people need to leave their homes or places of residence, whether to obtain or perform the functions above, or to otherwise facilitate authorized necessary activities, they should at all times practice social distancing.
targetString: Yommuu namoonni manneen yookaan iddoowwan jiraatanii ba'uu barbaadanitti, wantoota olitti eeraman argachuuf ykn raawwachuuf, ykn immoo gochoota barbaachisoo eyyemaman ariifachiisuuf, yeroo hundayyuu gargar fageenya hawaasaa hojiirra oolchuutu irra jiraata.

sourceString: 2) The healthcare delivery system shall prioritize services to serving those who are the sickest and shall prioritize resources, including personal protective equipment, for the providers providing direct care to them.
targetString: 2) Sirni dhiyeessii kunuunsa fayyaa tajaajiloota warreen baay'ee isaan dhukkubu tajaajiluuf dursa kennuu qaba akkasumas qabeenyota, meeshaa of-eeggannoo dhuunfaa dabalatee dhiyeessitoota kunuunsa kallattii dhiyeessaniif dursa kennuu qaba.

sourceString: 3) The Office of Emergency Services is directed to take necessary steps to ensure compliance with this Order.
targetString: 3) Biiroon Tajaajila Ummataa gocha hojii kanaa dhugoomsuuf tarkaanfiiwwan barbaachisaa fudhachuuf kallattiin kennameef.

sourceString: 4) This Order shall be enforceable pursuant to California law, including, but not limited to, Government Code section 8665.
targetString: 4) Ajajni kun akkaatuma Seera Kaalifoorniyaa, Koodii Mootummaa kutaa 8665 kan dabalatuu, garuu kanatti kan hin daangofneetiin kan raawwachiifamudha.

sourceString: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that as soon as hereafter possible, this Order be filed in the Office of the Secretary of State and that widespread publicity and notice be given of this Order.
targetString: INNI CAALAATTI AJAJAMEERA saffisa danda'ameen, Ajaji kun Waajjira Barreessaa Mootummaa keessatti galmaa'uu kan qabuufi yaadachiisa babal'ate sanaaf akkasumas yaadannoon Ajaja kanaaf kennamuu qaba.

sourceString: This Order is not intended to, and does not, create any rights or benefits, substantive or procedural, enforceable at law or in equity, against the State of California, its agencies, departments, entities, officers, employees, or any other person.
targetString: Ajaji kun mirgootaa fi faayidaawwan, dhugaa yookaan adeemsa irratti kan hundaa'e, seeraan yookaan waanta madaalawaa ta'een Mootummaa Kaalifoorniyaa, ejensiiwwan, muummeewwan, qaamolee, qondaaltota, hojjettoota isaa, yookaan nama biraa kamuu irratti kan hojiirra oolu uumuuf yaadamees miti, akkasumas hin uumus.

sourceString: IN WITNESS WHEREOF I have hereunto set my hand and caused the Great Seal of the State of California to be affixed this 19th day of March 2020.
targetString: KANNEEN ILAALAN KEESSAA anis kunoo harka koo qopheesse akkasumas Chaappaa Guddaa Kutaa Kaalifoorniyaa guyyaa 19ffaaBitootessaa 2020 Maxxanfame akka ta'u kan taasise.

sourceString: The SARS-CoV-2 virus is the cause of COVID-19 (coronavirus disease 2019), a contagious respiratory disease that was first identified in December 2019, in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
targetString: Vaayrasiin SARS-CoV-2 COVID-19 ni fida (dhukkuba vaayrasii koronaa 2019), dhukkubni sirna hargaansu daddarban kun yeroo jalqabaatiif adda kan ba'e Muddee 2019, Wuhaan, Hubeey, Chaayinaa keessatti.

sourceString: The disease is a type of coronavirus, the same family that includes SARS, MERS, and some varieties of the common cold.
targetString: Dhukkubichi gosa koronaavaayiresii, maatii SARS, MERS, fi gosoota utaalloo muraasa of keessatti qabatuuti.

sourceString: It was declared a pandemic by the World Health Organization (WHO) on 11 March 2020.
targetString: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) akka weeraratti Bitootessa 11,2020 labseera.

sourceString: While much about COVID-19 is still unknown, preliminary data suggests that it is more virulent and contagious than the seasonal flu, and less virulent but more contagious than SARS and MERS.
targetString: Amallee waa'een COVID-19 sirritti kan hin beekamne yoo ta'u, daataan jalqabaa uttalloo waqtii caala ajjeesaa fi daddarbaa akka ta'e yaaddessa, akkasumas SARS Fi MERS gadi kan ajjeesuu fi isaanii ol immoo kan daddarbuudha.

sourceString: Older people and those with underlying conditions are the most at risk of serious complications including death.
targetString: Namoonni dulloomanii fi kanneen haala hamaa keessa jiran du'a dabalatee rakkoolee hamoodhaaf warreen hundarra saaxilamoodha.

sourceString: Due to the spread of the disease, you are advised not to travel unless necessary, to avoid being infected, quarantined, or stranded by changing restrictions and cancelled flights.
targetString: Sababa babal'ina dhukkubichaaf, barbaachisaa ta'ee yoo argame irraan kan hafe akka hin imalleef ni gorfamtu, hubamuu, qofaatti baafamuu hambisuuf, yookaan daangeffamoota jijjiiramaniin fi balali'uuwan haqamaniin akka hin baane godhamuu.

sourceString: Avoid crowded places whenever possible.
targetString: Hamma danda'ametti bakkeewwan namni itti heddummaatu irraa of dhorki.

sourceString: This is not just to protect you, but also those you come in contact with.
targetString: Inni kun kin isiin ittisuu hin danda'u, garuu akkasumas kanneen isin waliin walqannamtanis.

sourceString: As it happens, you probably aren't missing much by staying home, as many attractions around the world are closing their doors to avoid spreading the disease.
targetString: Akkuma inni ta'een, mana ooluu keessaniin tarii waan baay'ee dhabaa hin jirtan, waan hawwattoonni baay'ee addunyaa irraa babal'ina dhukkubichaa dhorkuuf balbala isaanii cufataa jiraniif.

sourceString: If you do need to travel, take precautions as you would for other infections: wash your hands frequently, avoid touching your face, cough and sneeze into your elbow or a tissue, and avoid contact with sick people.
targetString: Yoo imaluu qabdu ta'e, dhukkubaan faalamuu kan birootiif akkuma gootan of-eeggannoo godhaa: harka keessan yeroo yeroon dhiqadhaa, fuula keessan tuquu irraa of-qusadhaa, ciqilee yookaan sooftiitti qufa'aa akkasumas haxxiffadhaa, akkasumas namoota dhukkubsatan quunnamuu irraa of-qusadhaa.

sourceString: Before traveling, read up on the extensive and fast-changing array of travel restrictions that have been imposed around the world.
targetString: Imaluun dura, daangeffamawwan imalaa guddaafi dafee jijjiiramu kan akka addunyaatti dirqisiifame dubbisaa.

sourceString: After travel, monitor your health and consider self-isolation for two weeks to avoid transmitting the disease to others.
targetString: Imala booda, fayyaa kee to'adhu akkasumas dhukkubicha namoota biraattis akka hin dabarsineef torban lamaaf qofa kee turu tilmaama keessa galchi.

sourceString: Transportation from long-distance passenger flights to local buses has been curtailed or completely shut down in many countries due to low demand or government orders.
targetString: Geejjibni balali'aa imaltoota karaa dheeraa gara konkolaataawwan naannootti daangeefameera yookiin immoo guutummatti biyyoota hedduun sababa fedhii xinnoo yookiin ajaja mootummaatin dhaabbateera.

sourceString: Many international and regional borders are closed.
targetString: Daangaaleen idil-addunyaa fi naannoo hedduun cufamaniiru.

sourceString: If you are away from home, and especially if you are in another country, consider returning home as soon as possible; this may get even more difficult as restrictions continue to change.
targetString: Yoo manarraa fagoo jirta ta'ee, fi keessattuu immoo biyya biraa keessa jirta ta'e, akkaatuma dhorkaawwan jijjiiramaa deemaniin kunis cimaa demuu waan danda'uuf hamma siif danda'ametti daftee manatti deebi'uu yadi.

sourceString: In some cases it may simply not be possible, even if you're healthy and meet the legal requirements for entry.
targetString: Dhimmoota muraasa keessatti salphaamatti ta'uu dhiisuu mala, yoo fayyaa fi seensaaf ulaaga seeraa barbaachisu guuttanis.

sourceString: If you can't find a way back to your country, contact your nearest embassy or consulate for assistance.
targetString: Garaa biyya keetii akka itti deebitu yoo dhaabde, qoontsila dhiyoo kee jiruu qunnami yookiin gargaaraa kee haasofsisi.

sourceString: They may be able to organize an evacuation, identify non-regularly scheduled flights, or give you an emergency loan to pay for transport.
targetString: Isaan iddoo gadhiisisuu qindeessuu malu, balaali'uuwwan al-idileen saganteeffaman adda baasuun, yookaan liqii tasaa geejjibaaf akka kaffaltan isiniif kennuun.

sourceString: In case they can't, make preparations in case you need to stay where you are for an extended period.
targetString: Isaan kan hin dandeenye yoo ta'e, iddoo jirtutti yeroo dabalataatif turuuf qophii taasisuun sirra jiraachuu mala.

sourceString: If you do find a way back home, be prepared that it may be expensive, inconvenient, and have unusual restrictions (such as no checked baggage).
targetString: Karaa ittiin gara manaatti deebitu yoo argatte, qaala'aa, kan hin mijannee fi danqaalee hin baratamne qabaachuu (kan akka boorsaan sakatta'ame jiraachuu dhiisuunfaa) waan danda'uuf itti qophaa'I.

sourceString: As of early April 2020, the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 is approaching one million.
targetString: Hanga xumura Eebla 2020tti namoonni COVID-19 keessatti argame gara miliyoonaatti siqaniiru.

sourceString: Though the disease started in mainland China, it has spread around the world and China has fewer confirmed cases and deaths than several other countries.
targetString: Dhukkubichi Chaayinaa meenlaandii kesssatti eegaluyyuu, addunyaa guutuu keessatti babal'aate jira akkasumas chaayinaan biyyoota biroo caalaa du'aa fi dhimmoota xinnoo adda ba'e qabdi.

sourceString: Europe is the new epicenter of the pandemic.
targetString: Awurooppaan jiddugala haaraa weraarichati.

sourceString: All but a handful of countries have reported at least one case, with the highest numbers of reported cases in the United States, Spain, Italy, Germany, France, mainland China, Iran, and the United Kingdom.
targetString: Guutumaatti garuu biyyoonni hunduu yoo xinnaate dhimma tokko gabaasani jiru, lakkoofsi guddaan immoo Yuunaaytid Isteet, Ispeen, Xaaliyaan, Jaarman, Faaransay, Chaayinaa meenlaand, Iraani, fi Yuunaaytid Kingidaam keessatti gabaafame.

sourceString: Local transmission is established in many countries in all major inhabited regions of the world except some Pacific island nations.
targetString: Daddarbuun naannoo biyyoota addunyaa baay'ee keessatti odoloota paasifikii muraasan alatti iddoo jiraattoonni jiraatan gurguddaa hundaa goonfate jira

sourceString: (See updates from the WHO.)
targetString: (WHO irraa waan haaraa ilaali)

sourceString: The full extent of the spread is uncertain, due in part to limited testing.
targetString: Hammamtaa guutuun faffaca'insaa beekamaa miti, sababa yaalii murtaa'eef.

sourceString: Many countries are experiencing a severe shortage of test kits, and the authorities have not been able to test everybody who is at high risk, so the real number of cases is probably much higher than the official one.
targetString: Biyyoonni baayyeen hanqina meeshaalee qorannoo hamaa keessa kan jiranii fi aanga'oonni namoota balaa guddaarra jiran tokko tokkoon sakatta'uu hin dandeenye. Kanaafuu, hangi mullinasaa hamma ibsamuu ol ta'uutii mala.

sourceString: Countries also differ in their testing and reporting practices, so comparisons of the number of reported cases do not tell the full story of how the epidemic has progressed in different areas.
targetString: Shaakalli qorannaa fi gabaasa biyyootas garaagarummaa qabu, walbira qabuun lakkoofsa dhimmota gabaafamee seenaa guutuu hanga balbal'inaa fi guddina iddoo garagaraa hin himu.

sourceString: The virus is transmitted through respiratory droplets and through objects.
targetString: Vaayiresichi karaa coccopha hargansuu fi karaa meeshaalee daddarba.

sourceString: The coronavirus is a relatively large virus, meaning it is not truly airborne: it will settle down in respiratory droplets.
targetString: Koronaavayiresiin birqabaan vaayiresii guddaadha, jechuun dhugumatti qilleensarraan kan dhufu miti: coccoba hargansuu keessa kan qubatudha.

sourceString: Staying two metres (six feet) away from other people is usually enough to prevent transmission through this route.
targetString: Meetira lama (faana jaha) namoota biroo irra fagaatanii turuun yeroo baay'ee daddaarbuu karaa kanan dhufuu ittisuuf gahaadha.

sourceString: Transmission from objects can happen, for example, if someone sneezes, touches a doorknob, and then other people touch the doorknob and then touch their faces.
targetString: Meeshaaleerra kaninni daddarbuu danda'u, fknf, yoo namni wayii haxxiffate, bantuu balbalaa tuqee, fi namoonni biroo immoo bantuu balbalichaa tuqanii fi fuula isaanii tuqanidha.

sourceString: The SARS-CoV-2 virus may last on cardboard for up to 24 hours and on plastic for up to 3 days.
targetString: Vaayiresiin SARS-CoV-2 kaartooniirra saatii 24 fi laastikiirra haga guyyaa 3 turuu danda'a.

sourceString: Transmission via the fecal–oral route may also be possible.
targetString: Karaa toora sagaraa--afaaniis kan dadddarbu ta'uu danda'a.

sourceString: Evidence suggests that COVID-19 is contagious even without symptoms, though to what extent is still being investigated.
targetString: Ragaan akka agarsiisutti COVID-19 mallattoo maleellee kan daddarbudha, hamma kamiitti kan jedhu amayyuu qoratamaa jira.

sourceString: Common symptoms include a fever, dry cough, and fatigue.
targetString: Mallattooleen baratamoon dhaqna gubaa, qufaa gogss, fi dhaqna caccabsuu kan dabalatudha.

sourceString: Other less common symptoms include shortness of breath, a sore throat, headache, muscle pain, or sputum production.
targetString: Mallattooleen baayyinaan hin mullanne biroon hargansuu dadhabuu, qoonqoon dhukkubuu, mataa bowwoo, dhukkubbii maashaa, ykn furiin uumamuu dabalata.

sourceString: Some patients have very mild symptoms, similar to a cold.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoonni muraasni mallattoo dhukkubbi giddu galeesssa akka qufaat qabu.

sourceString: Serious complications include pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, and multi-organ failure leading to disability or death.
targetString: Rakkoowwan ulfaatoon michii sombaa, dhibee hafuura kutaa hatattamaa, fi hojii dhaabuu qaamota baay'ee kan hanqina qaamaa yookaan du'atti geessuu danda'an.

sourceString: About 80% of infections result in mild symptoms, while the remaining may result in hospitalization.
targetString: Naannoon 80% hubiinsa kanaa mallattoolee giddu-galeessaa kan fidu yemmu ta'u, kan hafe immoo hospitaala ciisanii wallaanamuu fiduu mala.

sourceString: Case fatality rate is estimated at 1-3% of infected individuals, most of whom are elderly with underlying health conditions.
targetString: Hammi du'aatii 1-3% namoota hubamanii ta'ee, harki caalaan isaanii namoota dulloomoo rakkoo fayyaa qaban akka ta'e tilmaamama.

sourceString: The fatality rate is much higher for those over 70 but significantly lower for those under 40.
targetString: Hammi du'aa warra umriin isaanii 70 oliif baay'ee ol ka'aadha. Garuu, warra waggaa 40 gadiif haga ta'e gadi bu'aadha.

sourceString: Those most at risk of COVID-19 infection and serious complications are the elderly and those with weakened immune systems or underlying health conditions like cardiovascular disease, diabetes, hypertension, chronic respiratory disease, and cancer.
targetString: Warri dhukkuba COVID-19 fi mallattoolee hamoon hundarra rakkoo keessa galuu malaan warra dulloomanii fi warra sirna madiinnummaa dadhabe qaban ykn rakkoo fayyaa akka dhukkuba onnee, sukkaaraa, dhiibbaa dhiigaa, sombaa fi kaanserii qabanidha.

sourceString: Not many cases are reported in children and most of these are mild or moderate, though a significant fraction do get pneumonia.
targetString: Ijoollee irratti dhimmooti baay'een hin gabaafamne akkasumas baay'een kanneenii salphaa yookaan giddu galeessa, lakkoofsa guddaa kan qaban michii sombaa qabaatanis.

sourceString: Occupationally, health care workers have higher risk compared to others with clusters of disease among workers and in health care settings.
targetString: Hojii dhaan, hojjettoonni kunuunsa fayyaa kilaasterii dhukkubaa kan biroo hojjeettota gidduuttiifi qindaa'inoota kunuunsa fayyaa keessaatti gaafa walbira qabamu saaxilamuu ol'aanaa qabu.

sourceString: The time between being exposed to the virus and the emergence of symptoms (incubation period) is typically between 2 and 14 days, though there has been one reported case in China where symptoms appeared 27 days after exposure.
targetString: Yeroon vaayrasiif saaxilamuu fi mallattooleen mul'atan gidduu jiru (incubation period) guyyoota 2-14 ta'a, garuu gaabasni chaayinaa tokko erga vaayrasiin saaxilamee booda hanga guyyoota 27 tti mul'achuu danda'a kan jedhu ni jira.

sourceString: As of February 2020, the period of infectiousness is unknown, but is likely most significant when people are symptomatic.
targetString: Akka Gurraandhala 2020 tti, yeroon dhukkubaan faalamuu beekamaa miti, garuu yeroo namoonni mallattoo agarsiisan tarii baay'ee guddaadha.

sourceString: There is evidence of transmission from people who don't have symptoms, although to what extent is still being investigated.
targetString: Hammisaa qoratamaa kan jiru ta'us, namoota mallattoolee hin qabnerraa akka daddarbu ragaan jira.

sourceString: It is unclear whether it is possible to be reinfected with the virus after recovering from it the first time around.
targetString: Gara yeroo jalqabaa bayyanannaa booda vaayiresiin deebi'anii faalamuu danda'uu fi dhiisuun ifa hin turre.

sourceString: Long-term effects for people who have recovered remain unclear, but there is evidence of reduced lung capacity in some recovered patients.
targetString: Dhiibbaan yeroo dheeraa namoota fayyanii osoo hin qulqulloofne jira, garuu dandeettii somba isaanii akka hir'isu ragaan dhukkubsattota fayyan muraasni irraa fudhatame ni jira.

sourceString: Testing for the virus usually consists of a swab inserted through the nose or a throat swab which is analysed in a laboratory for the virus.
targetString: Qorannoon vaayrasii yeroo baay'ee qulqulleessituu funyaaniin galu yookiin qulqulleessituu ujummoo qileensaa laboraatoorii keessatti vaayrasiif xinxalamu of keessatti qabata.

sourceString: The current "gold standard" test involves extracting the genetic material from the sample and analysing it for known genetic markers of the virus.
targetString: Qorannan “sadarkaa warkii” yeroo ammaa qaama jiinii saamuda irra baasuunii fi xinxaalun jiinii vaayrasii beekama mallattoo itti kaa'udha.

sourceString: There is no established test assessing for the virus or antibodies in the blood, although tests are being developed.
targetString: Vaayiresii ykn farreen-qaamaa dhiiga keessa jiran madaaluuf sakattiin lafa taa'e hin jiru, ta'us qophaa'aaa jira.

sourceString: There is no test to establish immunity to the virus.
targetString: Vaayirasichatti madiinummaa hundeessuuf qorannaan hin jiru.

sourceString: Many governments around the world have advised their citizens not to travel unnecessarily amid the pandemic.
targetString: Mootummoolee baay'een addunyaa guutuu irra jiran lammiilee isaanii imala barbaachisaa hin taane babal'ina dhukkubaa dhaabuuf akka hin taasisfne gorsaniru.

sourceString: Lots of airlines and package holidays are making it easy for you by waiving cancellation and change fees.
targetString: Buufatoonni xiyyaaraa hedduu fi qarqabi ayyaanotaa haquu dhiisuun fi kaffaltii jijjiiruun isiniif salphaa gochaa jiru.

sourceString: Particularly avoid cruise ship travel.
targetString: Caalaatti imala bashana doonii hambisa.

sourceString: Older travelers and those with underlying health conditions are most at risk and should avoid travel that puts them at risk, such as long plane flights, visits to crowded places, and especially cruises, even outside of severely affected areas.
targetString: Imaltoonni dulloomoon fi warreen rakkoo fayyaa qaban hunda caalaa balaa keessa kan jiranii fi imalawwan balaarra isaan buusuu danda'an, kan akka balalii xiyyaaraa dheeraa, naannoowwan namni itti heddummaatu daawwachuu, fi keessattuu imala bashannanaaf taasifamu, bakkeewwan haala hamaan miidhamanii alatti yoo ta'ellee irraa dhiisuu qabu.

sourceString: In affected areas, most experts recommend a practice known as social distancing.
targetString: Bakkeewwan hubamanitti, ogeeyyonni garri caalan gochaa fageenya hawaasummaa jedhamu gorsu.

sourceString: This means minimising contact with others by keeping a distance of six feet or two meters from them and avoiding gathering together in groups.
targetString: Kana jechuun fageenya faana ja'a yookiin meetira lama eeguun xuxxuqqii kanneen biroo wajjiin hir'isuunii fi garee dhaan walitti qabamuu dhiisuu.

sourceString: Some areas permit small groups; others prohibit all group gatherings.
targetString: Bakkeewwan muraasni walitti qabama nama muraasaa ni eyyemu; kaanimmoo walitti qabama hunda ni dhorku.

sourceString: Measures you are encouraged to take include working from home whenever possible, avoiding crowds and avoiding leaving your home unless absolutely necessary.
targetString: Hojii mana keessatti fudhatanii hojjechuun ni jajjabeeffama akkasumas yoo sii danda'ameef lafa namoonni itti baayy'atan deemuu dhiisuu fi mana keessaa ba'uu dhiisuun bayyee barbaachisaadha.

sourceString: If you must go out, try to stay at least 2 meters (6 feet) away from other people.
targetString: Yoo dirqama ala ba'uu qabdu ta'e, yoo xinnaate meetira 2 (faana 6) namoota irraa siqachuu yaalaa.

sourceString: In many places these measures are required.
targetString: Iddoo baay'eetti tarkaaffiwwan kunniin ni barbaachisu.

sourceString: Follow hygiene practices like for flu prevention.
targetString: Shaakala qulqullinaa akka ittisa infiluweenzaatii godhamu hordofaa.

sourceString: Frequently wash your hands with soap and warm water, and then dry your hands on a clean towel.
targetString: Harka keessan saamunaa fi bishaan ho'aadhaan yeroo yeroodhaan dhiqadhaa, sanaan booda immoo uffata qulqulluu fi gogaa ta'een harka keessan gogoffadha.

sourceString: As coronaviruses are enveloped viruses, washing your hands with soap kills the virus by disrupting the mostly fat-based viral envelope.
targetString: Koronaavaayiresoonni vaayiresoota golgaa alaa qaban waan ta'aniif, harka kee saamunaan dhiqachuun golgaa alaa vaayirasii kan coomarraa tolfame diiguun vaayiresicha ajjeesa.

sourceString: Effective hand washing requires rubbing your hands for at least 20 seconds.
targetString: Dhiqannaa harkaa bu'a-qabeessi harkakee yoo xinnaate sekoondii 20 f walitti riguu gaafata.

sourceString: Drying your washed hands physically removes some germs from your skin (so don't skip that step, and don't share towels).
targetString: Harka kee isa dhiqame irraa qoorsuun jermoota muraasa gogaa keeraa ni kaasa (kanaaf adeemsa kanarra akka hin dabarree fi qoorsituu akka waliin hin fayyadamne).

sourceString: If soap and water are not available, then use a >60% alcohol-based hand sanitizer.
targetString: Yoo saamunaa fi bishaan hin jiran ta'e, sanitaayizarii harkaa alkoolii >60% irratti hundaa'e fayyadamaa.

sourceString: Alcohol is a quick germ-killer, but it's not quite instant, so this still requires the same 20 seconds of rubbing your hands together, making sure that every single scrap of skin gets wet, and then you have to wait about another minute, for the alcohol to completely dry.
targetString: Alkooliin ajjeesaa jermii ariifataadha, garuu altakkaatti miti. Kanaafuu gogaan hundi akka jiidhuuf, kunis sekoondii 20 f harkakee sukkuumuu sana ni gaafatuu, fi alkoolichi guutummaa guutuutti akka goguuf daqiiqaa tokko biraa eeguutu sirra jiraata.

sourceString: Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth with your hands.
targetString: Harka keetiin ija, funyaanii fi afaan kee qabuu dhiisuu.

sourceString: Most people touch their faces every few minutes, all day long.
targetString: Namoonni garri caalaan guyyaa guutuu garaagarummaa daqiiqaawwan muraasaan fuula isaanii ni tuqu.

sourceString: Try to do this less, and try to wash your hands before touching your face.
targetString: Kanaa gadi hojjechuuf yaaluu, fi harka kee fuula kee tuquun dura dhiqachuus yaali.

sourceString: Also, try to avoid touching surfaces you don't have to touch in the first place, at least with your bare hands.
targetString: Akkasumas, dirroota jalqabarratti ofii tuquu hin qabne irraa of-qusadhaa, yoo xinnaate harka duwwaatiin.

sourceString: Cough and sneeze into your elbow or a tissue, and then immediately throw away the tissue and wash your hands.
targetString: Yeroo qufaatu fi haxxiffattu ciqilee ykn sooftiitti jedhi, fi isa booda hatattamaan sooftichi gatiitii harka kees dhiqadhu.

sourceString: Don't stand or sit near people who might be sick.
targetString: Namoota dhukkubsatan cinaa hin dhaabbatin yookiin hin taa'in.

sourceString: Stay at least one meter – and ideally two meters (six feet) – away.
targetString: Meetira tokko -- fi yaadaan meetira lama (tarkaanfii ja'a )-- walirraa fagaadhaa turaa.

sourceString: As a quick way to eyeball this distance, imagine that you and the other person both reached your hands towards each other.
targetString: Fageenya kana gabaabsuuf akka karaa ariifataatti, isiniifi namni inni kan biraan lamaanuu harka walii keessanii bira akka waan geessaniitti yaadaa.

sourceString: Could you touch the other person's hand without taking a step towards that person?
targetString: Harka nama biroo osoo deemsa itti aanu itti hin siqin tuquu dandeessa?

sourceString: If the answer is yes, then you're too close.
targetString: Yoo deebiin keessan eeyyee ta'e, isin baay'ee itti dhiyoo jirtu.

sourceString: Clean objects and surfaces that a lot of people touch, such as doorknobs, phones, and television remotes with regular household cleaner.
targetString: Wantootaa fi irrataawwan uummataa tuttuqaman, kanneen akka bantuu balbalaa, bilbila fi ajajjuu televiizyinii maatiin utuu walirraa hin citiin qulqulleessuu.

sourceString: Disinfect the surfaces with a suitable disinfectant, such as diluted household bleach.
targetString: Farra orgaanizimoota seelxeen qaamota faalamuu danda'an qulqulleessuu, kan akka addaachuu maatii himbaabsawee.

sourceString: Stay home when you are sick, and avoid contact with other people until your symptoms are gone.
targetString: Yemmuu isin dhukkubu mana turaa, fi hamma mallattooleen keessan badanitti nama quunnamuu dhiisaa.

sourceString: Do not share personal items that come into contact with saliva, such as toothbrushes, eating utensils, drinks, water bottles, and towels.
targetString: Meeshaalee dhuunfaa kanneen gororaan tuqamuu danda'an kanneen akka rigaa ilkaanii, meeshaalee nyaataa, dhugaatiilee, qaruuraawwan bishaanii, fi qoorsituu waliin hin fayyadamiinaa.

sourceString: The practice of serving yourself from a common plate with your own chopsticks, common in China, should be avoided.
targetString: Barteen qodaa tokko irratti waliin fal'aana ofiitiin nyaachuu, Chaayinaa keessatti beekamaa ta'e, hambifamu qaba.

sourceString: Greet people without touching them.
targetString: Utuu hin tuqiin ummata nagaa gaafadhaa.

sourceString: Avoid hugs, kisses, handshakes, fist bumps, and any other contact.
targetString: Wal-hammachuu,wal-dhungachuu, harka wal-fuudhuu fi tuttuqqaa kan biroon dhorkaadha.

sourceString: If it's impossible to avoid contact, then wash your hands both before and after.
targetString: Wal tuqaati hambisuun hin danda'amu taanan, harka keessan tuqaatii duraa fi booda dhiqadha.

sourceString: It won't protect you from the coronavirus, but it will partially protect you from the flu, which remains a greater risk than COVID-19 in many areas.
targetString: Inni vaayirasii koroonaa irraa isin hin eegu, garuu infiluweenzicha irraa hamma walakkaa ta'een isin eeguu danda'a, kan iddoowwan baay'eetti COVID-19 irra balaafamaa ta'e.

sourceString: This also saves you from unnecessary worry if you get the flu and think it might be the coronavirus.
targetString: Kuni sodaa hin barbaachisne kan yoo utaalloon si qabe vaayirasii koronaati jettee yaada'u irraa si oolcha.

sourceString: If you are elderly or otherwise in a high-risk group and can be vaccinated for pneumonia, get that vaccination.
targetString: Yoo maanguddoo taatan yookaan Kanaan ala garee balaa ol'aanaa keessa jirtu ta'e fi michii sombaatiif talaallii fudhachuu dandeessu ta'e, talaallii sana fudhaa.

sourceString: It won't protect you from viral pneumonia from COVID-19, but some COVID-19 patients have died of bacterial pneumonia that attacked their weakened lungs, so a pneumonia vaccination could save your life.
targetString: Nimooniyaa vaayralii COVID-19 irra isiin hin ittisu, garuu dhukkubsattoonni COVID-19 muraasni sababa baakteriyaan nimooniyaa somba isaanii dadhaabsen du'aa jiru, kanaafuu talaallin nimooniyaa lubbuu kee oolchu mala.

sourceString: Wearing masks is recommended for those who are suspected of carrying of disease and those who are in close contact with those infected.
targetString: Maaskii godhachuun namoota dhukkubaan qabamuu isaanii shakkanii fi isaaniin walitti dhiyeenya qabaniif ni eerama.

sourceString: For those who are asymptomatic, the WHO does not recommend masks, though some national governments do.
targetString: Namoota mallattoo hin agarsiifneef, WHO'n golgaa fuulaa hin gorsu, mootummoonni biyyaa muraasi kan gorsan yoo ta'es.

sourceString: Wearing a mask of some kind is required in some countries and cities in an effort to reduce community transmission.
targetString: Haguugduu afaanii fi funyaanii biyyootaa fi magaalawwan muraasa keessatti tatamsa'ina isaa hir'isuuf uffachuun barbaachisaadha.

sourceString: There are worldwide shortages of surgical masks.
targetString: Hanqinni haguuggiiwwan fuulaa ogeeyyii fayyaa guutuu addunyaarra jira.

sourceString: If you do wear a mask, make sure to use it correctly.
targetString: Yoo golgaa uffattan, sirriitti fayyadamuu keessan mirkaneessaa.

sourceString: The mask should cover your nose and mouth and fit without gaps.
targetString: Golgichi funyaanii fi afaan keessan haguuguu fi qaawwa malee kan ta'u ta'uu qaba.

sourceString: Wash your hands before putting on the mask and avoid touching the mask while wearing it.
targetString: Golgicha uffachuu keessaniin dura harka keessan dhiqadhaa akkasumas yeroo uffataa jirtanitti golgicha tuquu irraa of qusadhaaa.

sourceString: If you do touch it, wash your hands immediately afterwards.
targetString: Yoo tuqxan, isa booda battalumatti harka keessan dhiqadhaa.

sourceString: When the mask becomes damp, discard and replace it.
targetString: Golgaan keessan yoo jiidhe, gaataa achumaan bakka buusaa.

sourceString: Remove it from the back, throw it away, and then wash your hands.
targetString: Duuba irraa baasi, fageessi gati, akkasumas sana booda harka kee dhiqadhu.

sourceString: Remember that masks are not a substitute for good hygiene: continue to wash your hands frequently.
targetString: Maaskii fayyadamuun qulqullina sirrii akka bakka hin bune hubadhu: harka kee yeroo hunda dhiqachuu itti fufi.

sourceString: Don't stock up on masks if you don't need them.
targetString: Maaskiiwwan isin kan hin barbaadne taanan hin kuusina.

sourceString: Mask shortages mean that healthcare workers are having trouble getting a hold of masks, which puts everyone at risk.
targetString: Hanqinni maaskii jiru ogeessonni fayyaa maaskii argachuuf rakkachaa akka jiran agarsiisa, kunimmoo nama kamuu balaa keessa buusa.

sourceString: That includes N95 respirators, which are not recommended for the general public – these are specialist equipment which must be fitted to be optimally effective.
targetString: Sun N95 hargansiisaa kan dabalatu, kan hawaasa guutummaaf hin eeramne – kun meeshaawwan ispeeshaalistii kan giddu-galeessaan bu'a qabeessa ta'uu qabu.

sourceString: Leave them for healthcare workers.
targetString: Isaaniin hojjettoota kunuunsa fayyaaf dhiisaa.

sourceString: Avoid crowded areas, especially enclosed areas without much air circulation, such as conferences, performances, shopping malls, public transportation, and religious services.
targetString: Iddoowwan namoonni baay'inaan itti walitti qabaman irraa of dhorkaa, keessattuu iddoowwan cufamoo naanna'uu qilleensaa gahaa hin qabne, kan akka walga'ii guddaa, iddoowwan agarsiisaa, galmoota gabaa, geejjiba uummataa, fi tajaajiloota amantaa.

sourceString: Events which involve a large scale gathering of people, from religious pilgrimages to music concerts, are being canceled worldwide, in an effort to contain the spread of the virus.
targetString: Ta'iiwwan walitti qabama namootaa sadarkaa guddaa qaban imalawwan amantiitii hanga koonsertiiwwan muuziqaatti, tatamsa'insa vaayiresichaa to'achuuf jecha addunyaa guutuutti haqamaa jiru.

sourceString: Tourist attractions, businesses, and transportation may be closed, especially in affected countries.
targetString: Keessattuu biyyoota hubamanitti hawwatni tuurizimii, daldalli, fi geejjibni cufamuu mala.

sourceString: Some canceled events, especially performances, sporting events, and classes, are being moved online, which means you can experience them without traveling.
targetString: Muraasni taateewwan haqaniiru, keessattuu agarsiisota, taateewwan ispoortii, fi barnoonni, gara sarara irraatti darbeera, kana jechuun imala malee fayyadamuu dandeessu jechuudha.

sourceString: At petrol/gas stations, use gloves or wipe down the handle with a disinfectant wipe if you can.
targetString: Buufatalee peetrolii/gaazii tti, gaantii fayyadami yookiin harkee farra keemikalaatiin yoo dandeessan sirriitti qulqulleessa.

sourceString: After filling up, clean your hands with hand sanitizer.
targetString: Erga guuttanii booda, harka keessan sanitaayizariin qulleessaa.

sourceString: The U.S. and Canadian governments recommend avoiding travel by cruise ship.
targetString: Mootummaan U.S fi kanaadaa dooniidhaan bashannanaaf imaluu dhorkaniiru.

sourceString: Infections spread easily on board, and medical care is limited.
targetString: Dhibeeleen nyaataan salphaatti kan tatamsa'anii, fi kenniinsa qorichaa immoo murtaa'aadha.

sourceString: Amid a cruise ship outbreak, quarantines and docking are challenging partly due to the large number of people aboard.
targetString: Dhorkamuun bashana doonii, mana turuunii fi addan fagaachuun paartii rakkisaadha sababa namoonni baay'een biyyaa alaa jiraniif.

sourceString: Even cruise ships without confirmed cases have been denied permission to dock due to virus fears, and in the high-profile case of the Diamond Princess in Japan, hundreds of people were infected on the ship.
targetString: Dooniiwwan bashannanaa ta'iiwwan mirkanaa'e hin qabnellee sodaa vaayiresii fi ta'ii Diyaamendi Piriinsesii Jaappaan keessatti doonii namootni dhibbaan lakkaa'aman irratti hubamanii maqaa guddaa argatee irraan kan ka'e fe'isaaf eyyema kennuu didaniiru.

sourceString: If you believe you may be infected, call a hospital or local emergency medical services instead of going in person to avoid infecting others.
targetString: Yoo akka qabamte amante, gara hospitaalaa yookiin tajaajila fayya balaa tasaa naannooo jirutti bilbiluun qofa deemanii namoota biroo faaluu irra ni wayya.

sourceString: Mention your symptoms and travel history.
targetString: Mallattoolee sirratti mul'atanii fi seenaa imala keetii ibsi.

sourceString: Wear a medical mask and follow the instructions of authorities and doctors.
targetString: Golgaa wal'aansaa uffadhaa akkasumas qajeelcha angaawotaa fi ogeessota fayyaa hordofaa.

sourceString: See also: Flight and health
targetString: Kanas ilaali: Balali'uu fi Fayyaa

sourceString: On a plane, follow the same hygiene practices as anywhere else: wash hands frequently, or use alcohol-based hand sanitizer if it's not convenient to leave your seat, and avoid touching your face.
targetString: Xiyyaara irratti, akka iddoo biraa barteewwan qulqullinaa walfakkaatoo hordofaa: yeroo yeroon harka keessan dhiqadhaa, yookaan iddoo keessan irraa ka'uuf mijataa miti yoo ta'e sanitaayizarii harkaa alkoolii irratti hundaa'e fayyadamaa, akkasumas fuula keessan tuquu irraa of-qusadhaa.

sourceString: Researchers have found that passengers in window seats have less risk of contact with sick people.
targetString: Imaltoonni teessumoota foddaa biraa irra taa'an carraan isaan namoota dhukkubsatoo waliin walquunnamuuf qaban xiqqaa ta'uu qorattoonni bira ga'aniiru.

sourceString: Try to book a window seat, and avoid moving around the cabin during the flight.
targetString: Teessuma fooddaa bituuf yaali, akkasumas yeroo imalaa naannoo kaabiniin socho'uu dhiisi.

sourceString: After washing your hands and before sitting down, use disinfectant wipes to wipe down the area around your seat.
targetString: Erga harka kee dhiqattee booda fi taa'uudhan dura, qulquleessittuwwan farra baaktreriyatin naannoo teessuu qulqulleessi.

sourceString: Wipe hard surfaces, and if your seat is leather you can wipe that too.
targetString: Dirrawwan jabaa haxaa'aa, akkasumas yoo teessumni keessan gogaa ta'e isas haxaa'uu ni dandeessu.

sourceString: Don't wipe a cloth seat, as the moisture can make transmission easier.
targetString: Teessuma huccuu hin haxaa'inaa, jiidhinsi isaa daddarbuu waan salphaa gochuu danda'uuf.

sourceString: When using disinfectant wipes, follow the instructions on the packaging.
targetString: Yemmuu qulqulleessituuwwan farra ilbiisotaa fayyadamtu, ajajawwan haguugiirra jiran hordofi.

sourceString: And remember, viruses enter through your mouth, nose, and eyes – wiping down the area doesn't hurt, but it's not a substitute for proper hygiene.
targetString: Vaayiresoonni karaa afaanii, funyaanii fi ijaa akka seenan qalbifadhu -- naannoowwan sana irraa haxaawuun miidhaa hin qabu, garuu qulqullina sirrii bakka hin bu'u.

sourceString: Wash your hands and avoid touching your face.
targetString: Harka kee dhiqadhu akkasumas fuula kee tuquu dhiisi.

sourceString: And use a tissue to touch the touch screen or other controls.
targetString: Akkasumas argii tuqamu yookaan to'attoota tuquuf sooftii fayyadamaa.

sourceString: When using the lavatory, use paper towels to turn off the faucet and open the door, then throw them away.
targetString: Kutaa qulqullinaa yemmuu fayyadamtu, ujummoo bishaanii cufuu fi balbala banuuf herbee qoorsituu fayyadamiitii, ergasii darbadhuu gati.

sourceString: Airlines in affected areas are taking steps to reduce transmission and keep passengers safe.
targetString: Buufatoonni xiyyaaraa iddoowwan dhiibbaan irra ga'ee daddarbuu hir'suuf fi imaltoota nageenya isaanii eeguuf tarkaanfii fudhachaa jiru.

sourceString: For instance, these may include cleaning facilities more frequently, allowing flight attendants to wear masks, and serving prepackaged instead of freshly heated meals.
targetString: Fakkeenyaaf, isaan kunniin meeshaalee qulqullinaa yeroo baay'ee, itti fayyadamtoonni xiyyaaraa maaskii akka godhatan, akkasumas nyaata hoo'u irra nyaata goolgame of keessatti qabata.

sourceString: If a group of passengers is connecting from an area with a severe outbreak, the flight attendants may be able to seat them away from the rest of the passengers (and if you were recently in a high-risk area, consider telling the flight attendants for this reason).
targetString: Gareen imaltootaa bakka jalqabbii dhukkubaa jabaa irraa quunnamaa jiru yoo ta'e, keessummeessitoonni imala xiyyaaraa imaltoota warra kaan irraa adda baasanii isaan teessisuu malu (akkasumas dhihootti bakka balaa ol'aanaa turtan yoo ta'e, keessummeessitoota imala xiyyaaraatti himuu sababa kanaaf akka ta'e yaadadhaa).

sourceString: You may be prohibited from changing seats on the flight.
targetString: Teesssoo xiyyaara irra ta'uun dhorkaamuun sirra jiraachuu mala.

sourceString: This is so that, if someone on the flight turns out to be infected, the authorities can track down the people who were sitting near them for testing or quarantine.
targetString: Kunimmoo yoo namni balaliirra ture dhukkubsatee argame, aanga'oonni namoota isatti dhiyoo taa'aa turan sakatta'uuf ykn qofaatti tursiisuuf faana dha'uu akka danda'aniifi dha.

sourceString: COVID-19 is treated by relieving symptoms and preventing complications.
targetString: COVID-19 kan wal'aannamu mallattoolee hir'isuunii fi rakkinoota hambisuun.

sourceString: There is no vaccine or specific treatment for the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Talaalliin ykn yaaliin adda bahe noovel koronaavaayiresiif hin jiru.

sourceString: Research into a vaccine or specific antiviral drug is underway.
targetString: Qorannoon talallii ykn dawaan farra vaayiresii adda bahee adeemsarra jira.

sourceString: There are a variety of trials using HIV medications and other novel antiviral medications for treatment of COVID-19.
targetString: Yaaliiwwan garagaraa qoricha HIV fi qoricha farra vaayrasii haaraa biroo fayyadamuun wal'aansa COVID-19 'f taasifama jira.

sourceString: Mild symptoms may be relieved by taking paracetamol (acetaminophen).
targetString: Mallattooleen giddu-galeessaa paarastaamolii (aasetaaminoofiinii) fudhachuun dhaabbachuu danda'a.

sourceString: If you are infected with COVID-19, countries will isolate you until several consecutive tests for COVID-19 are negative.
targetString: Yoo COVID-19'n hubamtaniittu ta'e, hamma qorannoowwan walitti aanan baay'een COVID-19'f negatiivii ta'anitti biyyoonni qofaatti isin baasu.

sourceString: If you have been in close contact with someone infected with COVID-19, many countries will quarantine you for 14 days since the last exposure and monitor you for signs and symptoms.
targetString: Nama COVID-19'n faalame waliin walitti dhiyeenya dhihoo kan qabaachaa turtan yoo ta'e, erga saaxilbahinsa dhumaa biyyoonni hedduun guyyoota 14'f qofaatti isin baasu akkasumas mallattoolee fi mallattoolee dhukkubichaaf isin to'atu.

sourceString: Some countries will also test you even if you don't have symptoms.
targetString: Biyyoonni muraasi yoo mallattoo hin qabdan ta'ellee isin qoratu.

sourceString: In many countries, the healthcare system has been stretched to the point of not being able to handle the sheer number of patients, and there is a chance you may be refused treatment due to the lack of available medical staff, supplies or equipment.
targetString: Biyyoota hedduu keessatti, sirni kunuunsa fayyichaa lakkoofsa dhukkubsattootaa keessummessuu dadhabuu irra ga'eera, akkasumas sababa hanqina hojjettoota wal'aansaa jiranii, dhiheessii yookaan meeshaa irraa kan ka'e carraan isin wal'aansaaf didamuu maltan ni jira.

sourceString: Many countries have shut down or severely limited flights, ships, and border crossings, especially to and from affected areas.
targetString: Biyyoonni baayyeen balaliiwwan, yabala galaanarra fi qaxxaamura daangaa, keessattuu naannowwan huban irraa ykn itti taasifamu cufaniiru ykn baayyee dangessaniiru.

sourceString: Even more countries have imposed restrictions on arriving travelers, either barring entry (maybe with an exception for local citizens and permanent residents) or requiring you to be quarantined, typically for 14 days.
targetString: Biyyoonni caalaan imaltoota gara biyyaa dhufaniif daangeffamoota kaa'aniiru, seensa irraa dhorkamuu (tarii lammiilee biyya keessaa fi jiraattoota dhaabbatoo osoo hin dabalatin) yookaan akka isin qofaatti baafamtan barbaaduun, akkuma barame guyyoota 14'f.

sourceString: Even if a mandatory quarantine is not imposed, you may be asked to "self-quarantine" by staying at home and not interacting with other people.
targetString: yoo qofaatti baafamuun dirqamaa hin godhamne ta'es, isin tarii “ofiin qofaatti akka of baastan” gaafatamuu dandeessu mana taa'uudhaanfi namoota kan biro waliin walquunnamuu dhiisuun.

sourceString: The most severe restrictions are on travellers who have recently been to affected areas, but increasingly many countries are applying them to incoming travellers overall.
targetString: Dhorkiinsa hundarra hamaaan imaltoota dhiyootti gara naannowwan hubamanitti deemanirrattidha, garuu biyyoonni baayyeen imaltoota dhufanitti isaan dabalaa jiru.

sourceString: Some countries have even prohibited all or almost all foreigners from entry or limited the ability of local citizens and residents to leave.
targetString: Biyyoonni muraasi keessummoota alaa hunda yookaan hunda jechuun hamma danda'amuun biyya keessa galuu irraa dhowwaniiru yookaan dandeettii biyyaa ba'uu lammiilee fi jiraattota naannoo daangessaniiru.

sourceString: What are the affected areas?
targetString: Bakkeewwan hubaman maal fa'I?

sourceString: Well, this is a fast-changing situation, and each country/region/organization has its own list of what areas are subject to restrictions.
targetString: Hayyee, kun haala ariitiidhaan jijjiiramaa jiruu, fi tokkoon tokkoo biyyaa/naannoo/dhaabbataa tarreeffama iddoowwan dhorkaawwan kana jala jiranii kan mataasaa qaba.

sourceString: The city of Wuhan is on every list and the rest of mainland China is on most.
targetString: Magaalaan Wuhaan tarreeffama hundarra kan jiruu fi walakkaan Chaayinaa immoo gara duraarra jiru.

sourceString: Other areas that are often included: France, Germany, Hong Kong, Iran, Italy, Japan, Macau, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, the United States, the Schengen Area as a whole, and sometimes various others.
targetString: Bakkeewwan biroon altokko tokko hammataman: Faransaayi, Jarman, Hoongi Koongi, Iraan, Xaaliyaan, Jaappaan, Maakaawu, Singaapoor, Kooriyaa Kibbaa, Ispeen, Taayiwaan, Yuunaayitid Kiingidem, Yuunaayitid Isteetsi, guutummaa Naannoo Sheengen, fi yeroo tokko tokkommoo kanneen biroo hedduu.

sourceString: Some countries have imposed restrictions based on citizenship or residency from severely affected areas.
targetString: Biyyoonni muraasni lammummaa yookiin iddoo jireenyaa irratti hundaa'un naannoolee miidhamtoonni baay'eetan irratti qoqqobbii geessisan.

sourceString: A detailed list of entry restrictions is maintained by the IATA.
targetString: Tarreeffamni gadi fageenyaa daangeffama seensaa IATA dhaan tursiifama.

sourceString: It doesn't cover all the restrictions, but it's still useful.
targetString: Qoqqobbiiwwan hunda hin haammatu, garuu ammayyuu faayida qabeessa.

sourceString: Keep up to date—the outbreak and the travel restrictions are changing rapidly.
targetString: Hanga guyyaa har'aatti tamsaa'inni fi daangeffamni imalaa saffisaan jijjirramaa jira.

sourceString: For travel in the near future, consider making refundable reservations in case the changing situation forces you to change your plans.
targetString: Fuuldara kanatti imaluuf, haalonni jijjiiramaa jiran karoora kee akka jijjiirtu sii dirqisiisuu waan maluuf, iddoo qubannaa kan haqamuu danda'u qabachuu yaadi.

sourceString: Avoid buying tickets with a connection in an affected area – even changing planes can make you subject to restrictions.
targetString: Tikkeettiwwan naannoolee faalama waliin hidhata qaban irraa bituu dhiisa – xiyyaara jijjiiruniyyuu qoqqobbi isinirra geessisu danda'a.

sourceString: Flights may get canceled with little notice, either due to the disease's spread and ever-changing entry restrictions, or simply because fewer people are flying and airlines are having trouble filling seats.
targetString: Balaliiwwan beeksisa xiqqoodhaan dhiifamuu mala, faffaca'insa dhukkubichaa irraan kan ka'eefi daangeffama seensaa yeroo hunda jijjiiramuun, yookaan salphaamatti sababa namoonni xiqqoon barrisaa jiraniif akkasumas buufatoonni xiyyaaraa iddoowwan guutuuf rakkoon isaan mudachaa waan jiruuf.

sourceString: You might also be delayed for hours upon arrival waiting for temperature checks and related procedures and paperwork, or even get quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Isin ammayyuu gaafa gahumsaa ilaalamuu ho'ina qaamaa akkasumas adeemsoota firoomaniifi hojii waraqaa eeguudhaan sa'aatiiwwaniif turuu dandeessu, yookaan torban lamaaf illee qofaatti baafamuu ni dandeessu.

sourceString: Be prepared for the possibility of disruption to your travel plans, especially if traveling internationally.
targetString: Jeeqamuun karoora imalaa akka si qunnamauu danda'u of qopheessi, keesssattu yoo imala idil-addunyaa ta'e.

sourceString: Even if you're nowhere near affected areas there's a risk that you'll have to stay at the destination longer than planned if you've shared a building or vessel with an infected person.
targetString: Iddoowwan dhiibbaan irra ga'e bira yoo hin jirtan ta'ellee balaan waan jiruuf gahumsa karoorfame caalaa fagoo turuu qabdu yoo mana yookaan meeshaa nama hubame waliin fayyadamtaniittu ta'e.

sourceString: For example, in late February an Italian doctor on vacation in Costa Adeje (Canary Islands) was diagnosed with COVID-19, and as a result all the guests in the hotel he stayed at were quarantined.
targetString: Fakkeenyaaf, dhuma Gurraandhalaatti doktarri Xaaliyaan Costa Adeje (Oddoolota Canary) tti boqonnaa irra jiru COVID-19 qabamuun isaa mirkanaa'eera, sababa kanaaf keessummoonni iddoo inni ture turan hundumtuu qofaatti baafamaniiru.

sourceString: Lockdowns and other internal restrictions
targetString: Mana turuu fi ittisawwan keessoo gara biro

sourceString: Some countries and regions, especially severely affected ones, are implementing emergency lockdowns and restrictions on people's movements and activities, even for those who haven't recently been abroad.
targetString: Biyyoonniifi naannoleen muraasi, keessattuu kan baay'ee dhiibbaan irra ga'e, ugguroota akka tasaa akkasumas sochiiwwanii fi gochaawwan namootaa irra daangeffama hojiirra oolchaa jiru.

sourceString: These include the temporary reintroduction of some border controls, restrictions on travel within the country, closing or limiting service at restaurants and other establishments, banning large public events, and in the most severe cases prohibiting people from leaving the house except for essential reasons.
targetString: Kunis kan dabalatu to'annoowwan daangaa yeroof bifa haaraan jalqabuu, sosochii biyya keessaarra daangaa kaa'uu, tajaajiloota restooraantii fi dhaabbilee birootti kennaman cufuu ykn daangessuu, waltajjiilee ummataa gurguddoo ugguruu, fi haalota baayyee hammaatoo keessatti immoo sababa quubsaa irraan kan hafe namoonni manaa akka hin baane dhorkuu dha.

sourceString: Beyond government restrictions, individual establishments are shutting their doors and cancelling events to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: Daangeffama mootummaan olitti, hundeeffamoonni dhuunfaa tamsa'ina vaayirasichaa hir'isuu yaaluuf balbala isaanii cufuu fi taateewwan haquutti jiru.

sourceString: In China, there are extensive restrictions on transportation and activity, which vary widely by province, city, and even by district or village.
targetString: Chaayinaa keessatti, gochaa fi geejiba keessatti ittisa bal'aa, kan kutaalee, magaalotaa fi naannoo ykn mandaraa irratti daangeffamni jira.

sourceString: Many governments recommend against traveling to China at this time.
targetString: Mootummoonni baayyeen yeroo kanatti Chaayinaatti imalli akka hin taasifamne gorsaa jiru.

sourceString: If you have no choice, do your research and get up-to-date information about the local situation wherever you are going.
targetString: Yoo Filannooo dhabde, qorrannoo ofii keetii gaggeessitoo waa'ee haala naannoo sanaa iddoo deemtutti oodeeffannoo ammayyaa ta'e barbaadi.

sourceString: People who have traveled to Hubei face particularly severe restrictions.
targetString: Keessumaa Namoonni magaalaa Hubei face irra dhufan irratti daangaa(dhowwa) guddaatu taasifame.

sourceString: Examples of restrictions that you may encounter in some parts of China (this is not an exhaustive list):
targetString: Fakkeenyota dhorkaalee kutaaleeChaayinaa muraasa keessatti si mudachuu malan (kun garuu tarreeffama guutuu miti):

sourceString: 14-day quarantine, self-quarantine, or COVID-19 test upon arrival from other parts of China or from other countries, at your expense
targetString: Turfata (quarantine) guyyaa 14, eeggannoo dhuunfaa ykn qorannoo COVID-19 qubannaa iddoowwan chaayinaa biroorraa ykn biyyoota biroorraa, baasiiwwan keetti.

sourceString: questions about your travel and medical history (lying can get you years in prison)
targetString: gaaffiiwwan waa'ee imalaa fi seenaa wal'aansa keessanii (sobuun waggootaaf mana hidhaa keessa isin tursiisuu danda'a)

sourceString: mandatory registration using an online or paper form
targetString: Galmee dirqamaa sarara irraa fayyadamuun ykn unka waraqataanii.

sourceString: requirement to wear a face mask in public
targetString: lafa namni hedduun argamutti haguuggii fuulaa uffachuun gaafatamuu

sourceString: people who have been outside of China within 14 days not allowed into public places like malls
targetString: namooni Chaayinaan ala guyyoota 14 gidduutti turan iddoowwan uummataa akka galmootaa galuun hin hayyamamuuf

sourceString: shops only accept mobile payments, not cash
targetString: Suuqiiwwan kaffaltii bilbilaa qofa fudhatu, kaffaltii kaashii miti.

sourceString: restaurants, transportation and other establishments refusing service to non-Chinese citizens
targetString: Restooraantonni, geejjebni fi dhaabbileen biroon lammiilee Chaayinaan alatti tajaajila kennuu didaa jiru.

sourceString: many forms of transportation reduced or shut down
targetString: Gosoonni geejibaa baay'een hir'ataniiru, kaan ammoo cufamaniiru.

sourceString: mandatory real-name registration for public transit cards
targetString: Kaardiiwwan daddarbinsa uummataf galmeen maqaa sirrii dirqama.

sourceString: access in and out of a town, village, or city completely blocked
targetString: Magaalaa, ganda ykn mandaroota keessaa fi alatti ba'uun guutummaatti dhorkameera.

sourceString: non-resident visitors prohibited from entering apartment complexes
targetString: daawwattoonni jiraattota hin taane gamoowwan appaartimantii akka hin galle dhorkamaniiru.

sourceString: only allowed to go outside once every two days to get supplies
targetString: Dhiyeessiiwwan argachuudhaaf guyyaa lama lamaani gadi ba'uun kan hayyamamu

sourceString: businesses, activities, and attractions closed
targetString: hojiileen daldalaa, sochiiwwan, akkasumas hawwattoonni cufamaniiru.

sourceString: businesses need local government permission to re-open
targetString: Daldaalli banamuuf heeyamma mootummaa naannoo irraa argachuu barbaada.

sourceString: restaurants (if they are even open) require a minimum distance between customers
targetString: manneen nyaataa (yoo banaa ta'an) fageenya xiqqoo maamiloota gidduu isaan barbaachisa.

sourceString: selling substandard face masks has a maximum sentence of life imprisonment
targetString: golgaawwan fuulaa sadarkaa isaanii hin eegganne gurguruun hidhaa jireenyaa guddaa qaba.

sourceString: As of mid-March 2020, Europe is the epicenter of the epidemic, and many European countries have closed their borders to international travel - only border commuters and freight are allowed to cross.
targetString: Akkuma gaafa giddugaleessa ebila 2020, awurooppaan kaan caalaa weerarsichaan hubamaa jirti, biyyoonni awurooppaa baayyeen ammoo daangaa fi sochii balaliinsaa dhaabaniiru – geejibdoota meeshaa fi warra achirra hojjetan qofatu ce'uu danda'a.

sourceString: Also businesses other than food stores and pharmacies are closed, and public transport has been reduced or stopped.
targetString: Akkasumas kuusaawwan nyaataa fi faarmaasiiwwan malee hojiiwwan daldalaa cufamaniiru, akkasumas geejjibni uummataa hir'ateera yookaan dhaabbateera.

sourceString: In the worst affected countries including Italy, Spain and France, lockdowns like in China in January, have been implemented.
targetString: Biyyoota baay'ee hubaman Xaaliyaan, Ispeen fi Faransaay keessatti dabalatee, ugguroota akka Chaayinaa keessaatti Amajji keessa, hojiirra ooleera.

sourceString: As well the EU has closed its outer borders.
targetString: EU nis daangaa ishee cuftee jirti.

sourceString: COVID-19 is prevalent also in North America.
targetString: COVID-19 Americaa kaabaa keessatti bal'inaan argama.

sourceString: The borders between Canada, the U.S., and Mexico are closed to non-essential travel, and in many areas bans on big gatherings are in effect (this means places like restaurants are closed, and events are canceled).
targetString: Daangaawwan Kaanaadaa, U.S., fi Meeksiikoo gidduu imalawwan hedduu barbaachisoo hin taaaneef kan cufamanii, fi bakkeewwan baayyeetti uggurri walitti qabama namoota hedduurratti kan hojiirra oolee jirudha ( kana jechuun iddoowwan akka restooraantii cufamanii kan jiranii fi waltajjiileen haqamaniiru).

sourceString: Numerous state, county, and municipal jurisdictions have issued stay-at-home orders that require all nonessential businesses to close.
targetString: Haaloonni baay'een, biyyoonni fi manneen murtii labsii ajajaawwan mana tura daldala sirritti hin barbaachisne hunda cufu baasaniru.

sourceString: With lots of flights canceled, warnings issued, and restrictions imposed, flying in the time of coronavirus can be a challenge.
targetString: Balaliiwwan hedduun haqamuun, akeekkachiisni kennamuun, fi danqaaleen kaawwamuun walqabatee, balaliin yeroo koronaavaayiresii qarumsa ta'uu mala.

sourceString: Some routes are not possible.
targetString: Karaawwan muraasi hin danda'amani.

sourceString: Others will require more inconvenient connections than usual—multiple stops and long waits between flights.
targetString: Kanneen biroo hidhatawwan hin mijanne isa baramaa caalaa ni barbaadu—dhaabbiiwwan baay'ee fi balalliwwan turtii dheeraa gidduu.

sourceString: In some cases that means more expensive tickets.
targetString: Dhimma muraasa keessatti sana jechuun tikkeetti baay'ee miidha.

sourceString: On the other hand, the good news is that many flights are cheaper than usual due to decreased demand, and there's a decent chance you'll get an empty seat next to you.
targetString: Karaa biraatiin, oduun nama gammachiisu sababa fedhiin gadi bu'eef imalli xiyyaaraa hedduun isa durii irra rakasa, akkasumas carraan teessuma duwwaa isinitti aanee jiru ittiin argattan ni jira.

sourceString: Build in extra time for your connections, especially if transferring from an international flight to a domestic flight and especially if your itinerary involves a country that's seriously affected.
targetString: Quunnamtiiwwan keessaniif yeroo dabalataa ijaaraa, keessattuu balali'uu addunyaawaa irraa gara balali'uu biyya keessaatti ce'aa jirtu yoo ta'ee fi keessumattuu karoorri imala keessanii biyya haala jabaan miidhamte kan hirmaachisu yoo ta'e.

sourceString: Screenings, temperature checks, extra paperwork, and the associated waiting around can add minutes or hours before you're allowed to continue on your journey.
targetString: Calalliiwwan, ilaalamuun ho'ina qaamaa, hojiin waraqaa dabalataa, fi turmaati walqabatan imala keessan akka itti fuftaniif hayyamamuun dura daqiiqaawwan yookaan sa'aatiiwwan dabaluu danda'u.

sourceString: You may find it harder than usual to buy a ticket to or from a destination subject to warnings and restrictions.
targetString: Isa duraa caalaa tikkeetti bituun gara yookiin iddoo ga'umsatti akeekkachisni fi qoqqobbin ulfaachuu mala.

sourceString: This is a real concern if you're trying to get out of an affected area.
targetString: Bakka faalamaa kanaa ba'uuf yoo yaalta ta'e, wanti kun sirritti itti yaaddamuu qaba.

sourceString: For instance, most aggregators are not selling tickets from China to the United States (presumably to avoid falling afoul of restrictions and being on the hook for a passenger's flight out).
targetString: Haa jennu, marsariitiiwwan odeeffannoo garaagaraa sassaabuun agarsiisan baay'een isaanii tikeetiiwwan Chaayinaa irraa gara Amerikaatti gurguraa hin jiran (tarii haala daangeffamaa waliin rakkoo keessa galuufi haala gadhee imala imaltootaa dhorkuuf)

sourceString: To buy a ticket for an itinerary like this, you may have to contact the airline or use a lesser-known aggregator.
targetString: Tarreewwan balalii akkasiif tikkeettii bituu yoo barbaaddee, daandii qilleensichaa quunnamuu ykn quunnamsiisaa isa hedduu hin beekamne fayyadamuu ni dandeessa.

sourceString: Another possibility is to buy two separate tickets (for instance, a ticket from China to Cambodia and a second ticket from Cambodia to the U.S.), but be careful you won't get quarantined or lose your luggage in between.
targetString: Carraan kan biraan tikkeettii adda addaa lama bituu dha (fakkeenyaaf, tikkeettii Chaayinaa gara kaambodiyaa fi tikkeetti lammaffaan Kaambodiyaa gara U.S.), garuu tursiisa dirqii akka hin seennee yookiin subbaa uffataa kee gidduutti akka hin ganne of eeggadhu.

sourceString: Connecting flights can be a problem.
targetString: Xiyyaaraan balali'uu walquunnamsiisuun rakkoo ta'uu danda'a.

sourceString: The risk of getting stuck in the connection city is higher than usual right now, due to delays for screening and testing as well as extensive cancellations.
targetString: Sakattii fi qorannaan boodatti harkifachuu fi haqamuun baayyachuu irraan ka'e, giddu-gala to'annootti qabuum isa durii caalaatti baayyateera.

sourceString: Connecting in an affected area may lead to entry restrictions later on, and if you've been in an affected area recently some countries won't even let you change planes.
targetString: Naannoolee dhukkubaan miidhamaniin walitti hidhata qabachuun gara keessaa seenuu irratti qoqqobbii geessu mala, akkasumas naannoo dhukkuban miidhame yeroo dhiyoo turte taanan biyyoonni muraasni xiyyaara akka jijjirtuu siif hin heeyyaman.

sourceString: On certain itineraries there is a risk of getting quarantined somewhere along the way.
targetString: Imaloota karoorfaman murtaa'an irratti karaa irraa iddoo ta'etti balaan qofaatti baafamuu ni jira.

sourceString: So book a direct flight if you can, and if not, think carefully about where to connect.
targetString: Kanaafuu yoo dandeessan balali'uu kallattii dursaa qabadhaa, akkasumas yoo miti ta'e, eessatti quunnamuu akka qabdan of-eeggannoon yaadaa.

sourceString: In uncertain times, plans can change.
targetString: Waqtiilee hin murtoofnetti, koraaronni jijjiiramuu malan.

sourceString: Many embassies and consulates have evacuated nonessential staff, and some have shut down operations completely.
targetString: Embaasiiwwanii fi qonsoloonni hojjettoota baay'ee hin barbaachsine hojii dhaabsisaniiru, akkasumas muraasni guutumatti hojii dhaabaaniiru.

sourceString: Emergency assistance should still be available, though it's possible you may have to contact a further-away consulate if your local one has shut down.
targetString: Gargaarsi yeroo balaa tasaa ammayyuu jiraachuu qaba, isin waajjirri qonsiilaa naannoo keessanii yoo cufame isa isinirraa fagoo quunnamuu maluu dandeessu.

sourceString: If you have been stranded due to the pandemic, your nearest consulate may be able to help you find a flight home, arrange an emergency loan so you can buy a ticket, or provide an emergency passport.
targetString: Yoo sababa weerara kanaatiin karaa irratti hafteetta ta'e, qonsilaan kee sitti dhiyoo jiru balalii ittiin mana galtu barbaaduun, tikkeetii akka bitattuuf liqaa yeroo balaa siif mijeessuun, ykn paaspoortii yeroo balaa siif kennuun si gargaaruu danda'u.

sourceString: At the very least they can keep you informed about the local situation and notify you about recently introduced travel requirements and restrictions.
targetString: Yoo baay'ee xinnaate waa'ee haala naannoo akka odeeffannoo qabaattu si gochuu danda'u akkasumas waa'ee barbaachisaawwanii fi qoqqobbiiwwan imalaa yeroo dhiyoo beeksifame si hubachisu.

sourceString: Ordinary consular services such as visa and passport processing may be suspended or restricted to urgent need, depending on the location and the consulate.
targetString: Tajaajiloonni qonsilaa dasiibaa kan akka viisaa fi adeemsota paaspoortii akka fedhii hatattamaatti yeroodhaaf dhaabachuu yookaan daangeffamuu malu, iddoo fi qonsilicha irratti hundaa'uun.

sourceString: Although some people call the disease "Wuhan pneumonia" (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺), "Wuhan disease", or "Chinese virus", the use of these terms is considered racist in China and by many people of Chinese origin.
targetString: Namoonni muraasni “Nimooniyaa Wuhaan” (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺), “Dhukkuba Wuhaan”, yookiin “Vaayrasii Chaayinaa” jechuun waamanillee, jechoota kana fayyadamuun Chaayinaa fi namoota dhalootan Chaayinaa ta'an hedduu biratti akka jibba sanyiitti ilaalama.

sourceString: It is still common to refer the disease as "Wuhan pneumonia" or "Chinese virus" in places like Hong Kong and Taiwan.
targetString: Iddoowwan akka Hoongi koongi fi Taayiwaan keessatti “niimooniyaa Wuhaan” ykn “vaayiresii Chaayinaa” jedhanii waamuun waan baratamedha.

sourceString: To be safe, use location-neutral terms when referring to the disease, such as "COVID-19", "novel coronavirus", or just "the virus" or "the pandemic".
targetString: Rakkorra fagaachuf, dhukkubicha ibsuuf jechoota iddoo irra bilisa ta'e, fakkeenyaaf, "COVID-19", “vaayrasii koronaa haaraa", yookiin "vaayrasichaa" yookiin "weeraraa" fayyadama.

sourceString: Particularly in developing countries where law enforcement are poorly trained, enforcement of curfew, lockdown or stay-at-home orders are often brutal, often using forces not proportionate against crowds.
targetString: Keessumattuu biyyoota guddina irra jiran bakka itti seera humnaan itti fe'uun gadadoon shaakalame keessatti, yeroo dabarsuu humnaan itii fe'uu, cufuu, yookiin mana turan ajaja gara-jabeessa, yeroo baay'ee tuutatti humna fayyadamuun wal hin madaalu.

sourceString: Comply with these orders, and avoid crowds in public.
targetString: Ajajaawwan kanneen waliin walii gali, akkasumas gurmuu uummataa irraa fagaadhu.

sourceString: As a result of the coronavirus pandemic, xenophobia has risen in many countries, primarily but not exclusively targeting people perceived to be Chinese.
targetString: Sababa babal'ina vaayrasii koronaatiif, jibbi qomoo biyyoota heddu keessatti olka'e jira, keessattu garuu namoota chaayinaa ta'an irratti kan xiyyeeffateedha.

sourceString: There has been a worldwide spike in racist incidents targeting people of East Asian origin, including in major cities such as New York, London and San Francisco.
targetString: Miidhaan sanyummaa namoota Baha Eeshiyaa irratti xiyyeeffate, magaalota gurguddoo akka Niw Yoorki, Landanii fi Saan Firaansiskoo dabalatee addunyaa maratti jalqabee jira.

sourceString: In Hong Kong, Sinophobia, which was already high to begin with, has intensified as a result of the pandemic, with the result that many shops and restaurants are now denying service to mainland Chinese customers and banning Mandarin speakers from their premises (with the exception of Taiwanese).
targetString: Hoong Koong keessatti, jibbiinsi uummata Chaayinaa, inni duruma dagaagee ture, sababa babal'ina dhibee kanaatif sadarkaa olaana irra gahe, sababa kanaaf manni nyaataa fi suuqiiwwan hedduun maamiltoota Chaayinaatif tajaajila kennuu didaa jiru akkasumas dubbattoota afaan Mandarin (Taaywanootan ala kan ta'an) of keessa baasaa jiru.

sourceString: Levels of xenophobia have also risen in East Asia, with some restaurants and other businesses in Japan and China refusing service to foreign customers.
targetString: Sadarkaaleen jibba qomoo baha Eeshiyaa keessatti olka'e jira, manni nyaata muraasni fi iddoon daldalaa biroo Jaappanii fi Chaayinaa keessatti maamiltoota biyya alagaatiif tajaajila kennuu didaa jiru.

sourceString: In China, there have been incidents of foreigners being refused rooms by hotel staff, and foreign residents, particularly black people, being kicked out of their apartments on short notice by their landlords.
targetString: Chaayinaa keessatti, miidhaawwan lammiileen biyyoota alaa kutaa ciisichaa argachuu hojjettoota hoteelaan dhorkamuu, fi jiraattonni lammiilee biyyoota alaa addatti namoonni gurraachi, kireessitootaan yeroo gabaabaa keessatti appaartaamaa isaanii keessaa baafamuun mullachaa jira.

sourceString: Sources for further information on the coronavirus outbreak include:
targetString: Maddi odeeffannoo dabalataa ka'umsa vaayrasii koronaa irratti kan haammatu:

sourceString: The US government Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
targetString: Mootummaan US to'annaa fi ittisa dhukkubaatti xiyyeeffate

sourceString: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (daily updates)
targetString: Wiirtuu awurooppaa ittisaa fi to'annoo dhukkubichaaf (odeeffannoo haaraa guyyuu)

sourceString: United Kingdom government, - Foreign and Commonwealth Office advice for Travellers
targetString: Mootummaa Yuunaayitid Kiingidemii, - Waajjira gorsaa Imaltootaa Alaa fi Koomenweelzii

sourceString: An online map and dashboard from the John Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering with live updates
targetString: An online map fi dashboard John Hopkins University Center Systems Science and Engineering irraa odeeffannoo haarawaa kallattiin dabarsa.

sourceString: Partial lists of entry restrictions from IATA and The New York Times
targetString: qoqqobbiiwwan seensaa walakkaa IATA fi NIW yoork Taaymis irraa

sourceString: A variety of misinformation and conspiracy theories about the virus are being promoted online and even by some government officials, so be careful which sources you check for information.
targetString: Odeeffannoon sirrii hin taane garagaraa fi yaadonni qorannoo shiraa waa'ee vaayirasichaa sarara irra akkasumas qondaaltota mootummaa muraasaanillee beeksifamaa jiru, kanaaafuu odeeffannoof maddoota kam akka ilaaltan of-eeggadhaa.

sourceString: Ensure that all information and advice you receive has been backed by reputable doctors and scientists.
targetString: Odeeffannoo fi gorsi isin fudhattan hundi doktarootaa fi saayintistoota kabajamaniin deeggaramuu isaa mirkaneeffadhaa.

sourceString: In a crisis, it's natural to want to keep following the latest updates, but it may be better for your mental health to moderate the amount of news that you look at, and stick to reliable news sources.
targetString: Rakkoo keessatti, odeeffannoowwan haaraa hrdofuun waan ta'uu maluudha garuu fayyaa sammuukeef yoo baayina oduuwwan daawwattuu hir'isuu, akkasumas maddoota amanamoo hordofuun gaariidha.

sourceString: If you normally watch the news twice per day then stick to this schedule and do something else, rather than having the 24-hour news on continuously.
targetString: Yoo yeroo baay'ee oduu guyyaatti si'a lama ilaaltu ta'e sagantichatti qabamuun wanta biraa hojjedhaa, oduu sa'aatii 24 walitti fufiinsaan banuurra.

sourceString: b'Bat SARS-like coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1), also sometimes called SARS-like coronavirus WIV1, is a strain of Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) isolated from Chinese rufous horseshoe bats (Rhinolophus sinicus).
targetString: Koronaavaayiresiin simbira halkanii SARS-fakkaatu WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1), yeroo tokko tokkommoo koronaavaayiresii SARS WIV1 fakkaatu jedhamee inni beekamu qaccee dhukkuba sirna hargansuu hamaa-koronaavaayiresiin walqabtee (SARSr-CoV) simbirroota halkanii ruufoos hoorsishuuyii Chaayinaa (Riinoloofas sinikas) irra baafameeti.

sourceString: Like all coronaviruses, virions consist of single-stranded positive-sense RNA enclosed within an envelope.
targetString: Koroonaa vaayirasii kan fakkaatan Vaayirasiin hundi; RNA qeenxee kan itti haguugame waliin qabu.

sourceString: The discovery confirms that bats are the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Argannichi simbirroonni halkanii baattoo uumamaa SARS-CoV ta'uu mirkaneessa.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis shows the possibility of direct transmission of SARS from bats to humans without the intermediary Chinese civets, as previously believed.
targetString: Xiinxalli faayiloojenetikii carraa kallattiin daddarbuu SARS simbirroota halkanii irraa baattoo dabarsituu xirinyii Chaayinaa malee gara ilmaan namootaatti agarsiisa, akkuma duraan amaname.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 drug development is the research process to develop a preventative vaccine or therapeutic prescription drug that would alleviate the severity of 2019-20 coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
targetString: Adeemsa qorannoo keessatti argamni qoricha b'COVID-19 talaalli ittisaa yookiin ajaja wal'aansa argachuuf rakkina 2019-20 dhukkuba vaayrasii koronaa (COVID-19) kan olkaasudha.

sourceString: The International Clinical Trials Registry Platform of the WHO recorded 536 clinical studies to develop post-infection therapies for COVID-19 infections, with numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections under clinical research to be repurposed.
targetString: Caasaan galmee Yaalii kilinikaala Idil-addunyaa WHO'n qorannoo 536 wal'aansa dhibee COVID-19 dhukkubaan dura oomishuuf galmeesse, kampaawondoota farra vaayrasii heddu dhukkuboota biroo wal'aanuf oolan ammaas akka faayidaa irra ooluf qorannoo kilinikaalaa jala jiru.

sourceString: In March, the WHO initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" in 10 countries, enrolling thousands of people infected with COVID-19 to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
