targetString: Bitootessa keessa, WHO'n biyyoota 10 keessatti "SOLIDARITY Trial" jalqabsiise, bu'aa wal'aansaa kompaawundoota farra vaayirasii jiran afur bu'a qabeessummaa ol'aanaa waliin tilmaamuuf namoota kumaatamaan lakkaa'aman kan COVID-19'n hubaman galmeessaa jira.

sourceString: A dynamic, systematic review was established in April 2020 to track the progress of registered clinical trials for COVID-19 vaccine and therapeutic drug candidates.Vaccine and drug development is a multistep process, typically requiring more than five years to assure safety and efficacy of the new compound.
targetString: Keeddeebiin humna qabu, sirnaawaa ta'e Ebla 2020 tti wanta yaaliiwwan kilinikaawaa talaallii COVID-19'f fi kaadhimamtoota qorichaa damee wal'aansaa dhukkuba fayyisuu irratti xiyyeeffataniif galmaa'an irra jiran faana dhahuuf hundaa'e. Talaalliifi qoricha dagaagsuun adeemsa sadarkaa hedduu qabu, baratamaan nageenyummaafi bu'a qabeessummaa kompaawundii haaraa mirkaneessuuf waggoota shanii ol barbaada.

sourceString: Drug development is the process of bringing a new infectious disease vaccine or therapeutic drug to the market once a lead compound has been identified through the process of drug discovery.
targetString: Oomishni qorichaa adeemsa talaalli dhukkuba dhibee haaraa akkasumas qoricha wal'aansaa gabaatti ni fida altokko kompaawoondiin adeemsa qoricha argachuu keessatti erga adda ba'e.

sourceString: It includes laboratory research on microorganisms and animals, filing for regulatory status, such as via the FDA, for an investigational new drug to initiate clinical trials on humans, and may include the step of obtaining regulatory approval with a new drug application to market the drug.
targetString: Innis kan dabalatu qo'annoo laaboraatoorii orgaanizimoota ijaan hin mullannee fi bineeldotaa, galmeessa haala to'annoo, kan akka karaa FDA, yaaliin dawaalee haaraa qoratamaa jiranii namootarratti akka taasifamuuf kakaasuuf, fi gabaarra oolmaa dawaa haaraaf adeemsa beekamtii to'annoo argachuus dabalachuu mala.

sourceString: Development of a COVID-19 vaccine or therapeutic antiviral drug begins with matching a chemical concept to the potential prophylactic mechanism of the future vaccine or antiviral activity in vivo.
targetString: Argamni talaalli COVID-19 yookiin qorichi wal'aansa farra vaayrasii hubannoo keemikalaa waliin wal simuun talaalli yookiin gocha farra vaayralii qaaman alaa gara fuulduratti sirna pirofalaaktikii ta'uu danda'a.

sourceString: New chemical entities (NCEs, also known as new molecular entities or NMEs) are compounds that emerge from the process of drug discovery to specify a vaccine or antiviral candidate.
targetString: Qabiyyeewwan keemikalaa haaraa(NCEs, akkasumas qabiyyeewwan molukilaraa haaraa jedhamuun kan beekaman yookiin NMEs) kompaawoondoota adeemsa argama qoricha talaalli fi kadhima farra vaayrasii adda baasuu irraa kan argamu.

sourceString: These have promising activity against a biological target related to COVID-19 disease.
targetString: Kunimmoo dhibee COVID-19 n walqabatee taargeetii baayoloojikaalaa irratti gocha abdachiisaa qaba.

sourceString: At the beginning of vaccine or drug development, little is known about the safety, toxicity, pharmacokinetics, and metabolism of the NCE in humans.
targetString: Jalqaba oomisha dawaa fi talaalliitti waayee nagummaa, summaa'ummaa, akkaataa qorichi qaama keessatti itti hojjetuu fi meetaaboolizimii NCE nama keessattii waan baayyee muraasatu beekama.

sourceString: It is the function and obligation of drug development to assess all of these parameters prior to human clinical trials to prove safety and efficacy.
targetString: Nagummaa fi bu'a-qabeessummaa mirkaneessuuf madaalliin murteessitoota kanaa wallaansa yaalii namaa irratti gochuun gahee hojii fi dirqama oomisha dawaati.

sourceString: A further major objective of drug development is to recommend the dose and schedule for the first use in a human clinical trial ("first-in-human" [FIH] or First Human Dose [FHD], previously also known as "first-in-man" [FIM]).
targetString: Kaayyoon dabalataa guddaan misooma qorichaa hammamtaa fi sagantaa yaalii namaa kilinikaa jalqabaa (FIN-jalqaba yaalii nama keessatti ykn FHD- hamma jalqaba namaa, yeroowwan darban keessattis FIM jedhamee beekama.)

sourceString: In addition, drug development must establish the physicochemical properties of the NCE: its chemical makeup, stability, and solubility.
targetString: Dabalataan, dagaagfamni qorichaa amala fiizikookeemikaalaa NCE hundeessuu qaba: qabiyyee keemikaalaa isaa, tasgabbaa'inaa fi bulbulamummaa.

sourceString: Manufacturers must optimize the process they use to make the chemical so they can scale up from a medicinal chemist producing milligrams, to manufacturing on the kilogram and ton scale.
targetString: Warshaleen keemikaalaa akka isaan oomisha isaanii miligiraamarraa gara kiloogiraamaan oomishuutti guddisuudhaaf gargaruuf adeemsa oomisha isaanii fooyyessun irraa eeggama.

sourceString: They further examine the product for suitability to package as capsules, tablets, aerosol, intramuscular injectable, subcutaneous injectable, or intravenous formulations.
targetString: Oomishichi bifa kamiin yoo saamsame akka mijatuuf kaapsuloota, taableetota, eeyiroosoolii, maashaarra kan waraanamu, gogaarra kan waraanamu, ykn hiddarra akka waraanamuuf gadi fageenyaan ni madaalama

sourceString: Together, these processes are known in preclinical and clinical development as chemistry, manufacturing, and control (CMC).Many aspects of drug development focus on satisfying the regulatory requirements of drug licensing authorities.
targetString: Walitti adeemsonni kun oomisha mallattoon duraa fi mallattoon boodaa keessatti keemistirii, manufaakcheringii, fi To'annoo (CMC) jedhamee beekama. Malli oomisha dawaa hedduun ulaagaalee to'annoo aanga'oota eyyema dawaa kennanii guutuu irratti kan xiyyeeffatedha.

sourceString: These generally constitute tests designed to determine the major toxicities of a novel compound prior to first use in humans.
targetString: Kunniin walumaagalatti ilmaan namaa keessatti jalqaba hojiirra ooluun dura wantoota summaa'oo ijoo kompaawundii novel murteessuuf qorannoowwan saxaxamani.

sourceString: The Canadian government announced CA$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian universities, with plans to establish a "vaccine bank" of new vaccines for implementation if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Mootummaan Kaanaadaa doolaara kaanaadaa miiliyoona 275 wal'aansa ittisa COVID-19 irratti pirojektiiwwan qorannoo 96'f gargaarsa gochuuf beeksiseera, kaadhimamtoota talaallii baay'ee Yunivarsiitiiwwan Kaanaadaa dabalatee, karoora "baankii talaallii" talaalliiwwan haaraa yoo jalqabbiin koroonaa kan biraa uumameef hojiitti hiikuuf hundeessuu waliin.

sourceString: Clinical trial programs involve three, multiple-year stages toward product approval, and a fourth, post-approval stage for ongoing safety monitoring of the vaccine or drug therapy:
targetString: Sagantaleen Yaalii kilinikaa sadarkaa fudhatama oomisha irra gahuuf sadarkaalee waggaa heddu, sadii of keessatti qabata, erga fudhatama argate boodas mijaa'inni talaalli yookiin qorichi wal'aansaa to'annoon ni godhama.

sourceString: Phase I trials, usually in healthy volunteers, determine safety and dosing.
targetString: Yaaliiwwan Kutaa I ffaa, yeroo baay'ee tola ooltota fayyaa ta'an keessatti, nageenyummaa fi hamma fudhannaa to'atu.

sourceString: Phase II trials are used to establish an initial reading of efficacy and further explore safety in small numbers of people having the disease targeted by the NCE.
targetString: Yaaliin sadarkaa II dubbisa jalqabaa gahumsaa fi yaada bal'aa of eggannoo namoota lakkoofsan xinnoo ta'an irratti dhukkuba NCE 'dhaan galchuuf fayyada.

sourceString: Phase III trials are large, pivotal trials to determine safety and efficacy in sufficiently large numbers of people with the COVID-19 infection.
targetString: Yaaliiwwan marsaa III, yaaliiwwan utubduu gurguddaa namoota lakkoofsaan hedduu COVID-19 n hubamaniirratti ga'umsaan nageenyummaa fi bu'a qabeessummaa isaa murteessa.

sourceString: If safety and efficacy are adequately proved, clinical testing may stop at this step and the NCE advances to the new drug application (NDA) stage to begin marketing.
targetString: Yoo nageenyummaa fi bu'a qabeessummaan haala quubsaan mirkanaa'e, qorannoon kilinikaawaa sadarkaa kanatti dhaabbachuu mala akkasumas NCE'n gara fayyadaminsa qorichaa haaraa sadarkaa (NDA) tti gurgurtaa jalqabuuf guddata.

sourceString: Phase IV trials are post-approval trials that may be a condition attached by the FDA, also called post-market surveillance studies.
targetString: Yaaliiwwan marsaa IV yaaliiwwan mirkaneessa boodaa ta'ee kan haalota FDA n eyyemamaniif ta'uu kan danda'uu fi qorannoo duuka bu'iinsaa gabaa boodaas ni jedhama.

sourceString: In addition to the tests required to move a novel vaccine or antiviral drug into the clinic for the first time, manufacturers must ensure that any long-term or chronic toxicities are well-defined, including effects on systems not previously monitored (fertility, reproduction, immune system, among others).
targetString: Yaaliiwwan barbaachisan Dabalatee talaalli haaraa yookiin qoricha farra vaayrasii gara kilinikii yeroo jalqabaaf geessun, oomishtoonni summaa'ina yeroo dheeraa yookiin dhukkubbii hamaan haalan ibsamuu isaa, dhiibbaawwan sirnoota ammaa hin to'atamne dabalate (da'umsa, walhormaata, sirna ittis qaama, kanneen biroo) dhugoomsu qabu.

sourceString: In the United States, this process is called a "new drug application" or NDA.
targetString: Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keessatti, adeemsi kun “hojiirra oolmaa dawaa haaraa” ykn NDA jedhama.

sourceString: A clinical trial design in progress may be modified as an "adaptive design" if accumulating data in the trial provide early insights about positive or negative efficacy of the treatment.
targetString: Yoo yaalii kanarratti daataa walitti qabuun waayee ga'umsa poosetivaa ykn negetiivaa wallaansa kanaarratti dafee agarsiistuu kan kennu ta'e, diizaayiniin yaalii adeemsarra jiru akka “diizaayinii baratamaa” tti fooyya'uu danda'a.

sourceString: The global Solidarity and European Discovery trials of hospitalized people with severe COVID-19 infection apply adaptive design to rapidly alter trial parameters as results from the four experimental therapeutic strategies emerge.
targetString: Gamtaan addunyaawaa fi Argannoowwan yaalii Awurooppaa namoota hubamuu COVID-19 hammaataan qabamanii saxaxa madaquu danda'u ulaagaalee yaalii yeroo yeroon jijjiiruuf mul'achuu tarsiimoowwan yaaliiwwan damee wal'aansaa dhukkuba fayyisuu irratti xiyyeeffatanii afurii akka bu'aatti fayyadamuun.

sourceString: Adaptive designs within ongoing Phase II-III clinical trials on candidate therapeutics may shorten trial durations and use fewer subjects, possibly expediting decisions for early termination or success, and coordinating design changes for a specific trial across its international locations.
targetString: Danaawwan madaquu danda'an sadarkaa II-III mudachaa jiru yaaliiwwan kilinikaa kaadhimamaa teeraapiyuutiksiin yeroo yaalii gabaabsuu, xumuruuf ykn milkaa'uuf murtoo ariitii fudhatamuu danda'uu fi jijjiirraa danaa yaalii bakka hundaatti waliin hojjechuu.

sourceString: Most novel drug candidates (NCEs) fail during drug development, either because they have unacceptable toxicity or because they simply do not prove efficacy on the targeted disease, as shown in Phase II-III clinical trials.
targetString: Kaadhimamtoonni qoricha nooveel baay'een (NCEs) yeroo dagaagfama qorichaatti hin milkaa'an, tarii isaan summaa'uu fudhatama hin qabne qabu yookaan sababa isaan salphaamatti dhukkuba irratti xiyyeeffatameef bu'a qabeessummaa hin agarsiifneef, akka yaalii kilinikaawaa Kutaa II-III tti.

sourceString: The high failure rates associated with pharmaceutical development are referred to as an "attrition rate", requiring decisions during the early stages of drug development to "kill" projects early to avoid costly failures.
targetString: Sadarkaan Kuufatii guddaa dagaagina qorichaa waliin walqabate “sadarkaa mukulaa'uu”, murtii dagaagina qooricha jalqaba “ajjeesuf” kuufaatii gatii kafalchisu hambisuuf gargara.

sourceString: One 2010 study assessed both capitalized and out-of-pocket costs for bringing a single new drug to market as about US$1.8 billion and $870 million, respectively.
targetString: Qorannoon 2010 tokko qoricha baaqqee gara gabaatti fiduuf gatii kaappitalaa fi gaatii kiisii lachuu gara doolaara US biiliyoona 1.8 fi doolara miiliyoona 870 tti tilmaameera, duraaduubaan.

sourceString: A median cost estimate of 2015-16 trials for development of 10 anti-cancer drugs was $648 million.
targetString: Tilmaammiin baasii giddu galeessaan bara 2015-16 yaalii qorannoo 10 kan dawaa farra kaanserii miliyoona $648 ture.

sourceString: In a 2016 review of 106 drug candidates assessed through clinical trials, the total capital expenditure for a manufacturer having a drug approved through successful Phase III trials was $2.6 billion (in 2013 dollars), an amount increasing at an annual rate of 8.5%.
targetString: Gamaggama 2016 keessakaadhimamtootni dawaa 106 kara yaaliiwwan kilinikaa tilmaamamaniiru, baasiin waliigalaa qaama dawaa oomishuu karaawwan yaalii III mirkanaa'e biliyoona $2.6 (doolaara 2013 keessaa), hammamtaan galii kanaas waggaatti 8.5% dabalaa jira.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating repurposed drugs already approved to treat malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine phosphate.
targetString: Yaaliiwwan torba qoricha kanaan dura dhukkuba busaa wal'aanuuf itti fayyadaman, qorannoowwan afur haaydirooksiikiloorookwaayin yookiin fikiloorookwaayin dabalate, sakkata'aa turan.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with 9 Phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: Qorichoonni bu'aa irradeebii qorannoo Chaayinootaa heddumminaan of keessatti qabata, yaalii dhibee sadarkaa III 9 remdesiver irratti biyyoota hedduu keessatti dhuma Ebla irratti ibsuuf.

sourceString: Led by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation with partners investing US$125 million and coordinating with the World Health Organization, the COVID-19 Therapeutics Accelerator began in March, facilitating drug development researchers to rapidly identify, assess, develop, and scale up potential treatments.
targetString: Dhaabbata Bill fi Melinda Gates'n shariikota doolaara US miiliyoona 125 baasan waliin fi Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaa waliin qindaa'uun hoogganama, Damee wal'aansaa dhukkuba fayyisuu irratti xiyyeeffatan kan COVID-19 kan Saffisiisan Bitootessa keessa jalqaban, qorattoonni daawaa dagaagsan dafanii adda akka baasaniif, xiinxalaniif, dagaagsaniif, fi wal'aansota humna qaban akka ol kaasaniif haala mijeessuun.

sourceString: The COVID-19 Clinical Research Coalition formed to coordinate and expedite results from international clinical trials on the most promising post-infection treatments.
targetString: Gamtaan Qorannoo kilinikaalaa COVID-19 bu'aa qindaa'e fi saffisa ta'e yaaliiwwan kilinikaala idil-addunyaa irraa abdi wal'aansa dhukkuba booda baay'ee irratti uume.

sourceString: In early 2020, numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections were being repurposed or developed in new clinical research efforts to alleviate the illness of COVID-19.
targetString: Jalqaba 2020 tti, dhukkubaan hubamuu kan biroo yaaluuf kompaawundooti farra dhukkuboota vaayirasiin dhufanii baay'een kaayyoo haaraaf madaqfamanii yookaan carraaqqiiwwan qorannoo kilinikaawaa haaraa keessatti dhibee COVID-19 gad hir'isuuf dagaagfamanii turan.

sourceString: For an already-approved drug (such as hydroxychloroquine for malaria), Phase III-IV trials determine in hundreds to thousands of COVID-19-infected people the possible extended use of an already-approved drug for treating COVID-19 infection.
targetString: Qoricha dursee mirkanaa'eef (kan akka hydroxychloroquine busaatiif), yaaliiwwan Kutaa III-IV namoota dhibbaa hanga kitilaa COVID-19'n qaban keessatti fayyadama qoricha dursee mirkanaa'ee dheerachuu danda'u dhukkubaan faalamuu COVID-19 wal'aanuuf murteessu.

sourceString: As of early April 2020, 103 candidate therapeutics were in preclinical or a stage of Phase I-IV development, with trial results for 29 drug candidates expected during April.
targetString: Akka jalqaba Ebla 2020 tti, kaadhimamtoonni damee wal'aansaa dhukkuba fayyisuu irratti xiyyeeffatan 103 dursa kilinikaawaa yookaan sadarkaa dagaaginaa Kutaa I-IV keessa turan, kaadhimamtoota daawaa 29'f bu'aawwan yaalii yeroo Eblaa eegamu waliin.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization (WHO) launched the coordinated "Solidarity trial" in 10 countries to rapidly assess in thousands of COVID-19 infected people the potential efficacy of existing antiviral and anti-inflammatory agents not yet evaluated specifically for COVID-19 illness.
targetString: Bitootessa keessa, Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) n namoota COVID-19 n hubaman kumaatama saffisaan madaaluuf “Duula yaalii” qindaa'e biyyoota 10 keessatti jalqabsiiseera. Dandeettiin bu'a-qabeessummaa farra vaayiresii fi wantoota farra dhaqna caccabsaa arma dura jiranii dhukkubbii COVID-19 f. ammallee addatti hin madaalamne

sourceString: Do any of the drugs reduce mortality?
targetString: Qorichi hamma du'a hir'isu jira?

sourceString: Do any of the drugs reduce the time a patient is hospitalized?
targetString: Qorichi yeroo turtii dhukkubsatan mana yaalaa turu hir'isu jiraa?

sourceString: Do the treatments affect the need for people with COVID-19-induced pneumonia to be ventilated or maintained in intensive care?
targetString: Wal'aansonni fedhii namoota michii sombaa COVID-19'n dhufe waliinii qilleensa haaraa hayyamuuf yookaan kunuunsa ol'aana keessa turuu irratti dhiibbaa ni geessisuu?

sourceString: Could such drugs be used to minimize the illness of COVID-19 infection in healthcare staff and people at high risk of developing severe illness?Enrolling people with COVID-19 infection is simplified by using data entries, including informed consent, on a WHO website.
targetString: Qorichi kun dhukkubbiin dhibee COVID-19 akka hir'atu gochuuf hojjettoota fayyaa fi namoota rakkoo cimaa dhukkubaa keessaa galan fayyaduu ni danda'a? Namoota COVID-19 qaban hirmaachisuuf daataa, gorsa barbaachisaa dabalatee, fuula inteerneetii WHO irratti gochuun ni salphata.

sourceString: After the trial staff determines the drugs available at the hospital, the WHO website randomizes the hospitalized subject to one of the trial drugs or to the hospital standard of care for treating COVID-19.
targetString: Erga hojjettoonni yaalii dawaawwan hospitaala keessa jiran murteessanii, marsariitiin WHO nama hospitaala gale gara dawaawwan yaalii tokkootti yookaan COVID-19 wal'aanuuf kunuunsa waaltawaa hospitaalaatti ramada.

sourceString: The trial physician records and submits follow-up information about the subject status and treatment, completing data input via the WHO Solidarity website.
targetString: Galmeewwan hakiimota yaalii fi odeeffannoon waayee hordoffii haala yaalamaa fi wallaansisaa, galtee daataa fixuun hundi karaa marsariitii Duulaa WHO ti.

sourceString: A global safety monitoring board of WHO physicians examine interim results to assist decisions on safety and effectiveness of the trial drugs, and alter the trial design or recommend an effective therapy.
targetString: Boordiin eegumsa nageenyummaa addunyaa hakiimota WHO murtiiwwan nageenyummaa fi dandeettii dawaalee yaaliirra jiraniif deeggarsa gochuuf, fi diizaayinii yaalii jijjiiruuf ykn wallaansa bu'a-qabeessa gorsuudhaaf bu'aawwan yeroo yaalii ni qoratu.

sourceString: A similar web-based study to Solidarity, called "Discovery", was initiated in March across seven countries by INSERM (Paris, France).During March, funding for the Solidarity trial reached US$108 million from 203,000 individuals, organizations and governments, with 45 countries involved in financing or trial management.
targetString: Qo'annoon walfakkaataa toora marsariitii Gamtaatti, "Discovery" jedhamu irratti hundaa'e, Bitootessa keessa biyyoota torbaan INSERM'n jalqabame (Faransaay, Paaris). Yeroo Bitootessaatti, namoota 203,000, dhaabbilee fi mootummoota irraa gargaarsi yaalii gamtaadhaaf doolaara miiliyoona 108 gaheera, biyyoonni 45 faayinaansii yookaan to'annaa yaalii keessatti hirmaachuun.

sourceString: Numerous candidate drugs under study as "supportive" treatments to relieve discomfort during illness, such as NSAIDs or bronchodilators, are not included in the table below.
targetString: Qorannoo jelatti dawaawwan kaadhimamtoonni baay'een akka ‘'gargaartuu''tti yaalii obsiistuu yeroo dhukkubaaf, kanneen akka NSAIDs ykn biroonkoolidaatorii, gabatee armaan gadii keessatti hin hammatamne.

sourceString: Others in early-stage Phase II trials or numerous treatment candidates in Phase I trials, are also excluded.
targetString: Kanneen biroo sadarkaa jalqabaa yaaliiwwan sadarkaa II keessa jiran yookiin wal'aansi kaadhimamtoota yaaliiwwan sadarkaa I hedduunis, hin hammatamne.

sourceString: Drug candidates in Phase I-II trials have a low rate of success (under 12%) to pass through all trial phases to gain eventual approval.
targetString: Kaadhimamtoonni qorichaa yaaliiwwan Kutaa I-II dhuma irratti mirkana argachuuf kutaawwan yaalii hunda keessa darbuuf saffisa milkaa'inaa gadi aanaa (12% gadi) qabu.

sourceString: Hydroxychloroquine is more commonly available than chloroquine in the United States.
targetString: Haayidroogzaayilkiloorookiniin Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keessatti kiloorookinii caalaatti baayyinaan argama.

sourceString: Although several countries use chloroquine or hydroxychloroquine for treatment of persons hospitalized with COVID-19, as of March 2020 the drug has not been formally approved through clinical trials in the United States.
targetString: Biyyoonni baayyeen namoota COVID-19 n hospitaala jiran wallaanuuf kiloorookinii ykn haayidiroogzaayikilookinii fayyadamanis, hamma Bitootessa 2020 tti dawaan kun Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keessatti sirnaan karaa wallaansa yaaliitiin hin mirkanoofne.

sourceString: Chloroquine has been recommended by Chinese, South Korean and Italian health authorities for the treatment of COVID-19, although these agencies and the US CDC noted contraindications for people with heart disease or diabetes.
targetString: Chloroquine wal'aansa COVID-19'f angaawota fayyaa Chaayinootaan, Kooriyaa Kibbaa fi Xaaliyaaniin eerameera, ejensiiwwan kunniinii fi CDC'n US namoota dhibee onnee yookaan dhibee sukkaaraa qabaniif akka hin fudhanne yoo dhorkanis.

sourceString: Both drugs have extensive interactions with prescription drugs, affecting the therapeutic dose and disease mitigation.
targetString: Dawaaleen lamaan dawaalee ajajoota ogeessaan kennaman waliin hariiroo cimaa kan qaban, hamma qorichaa wallaansaaf kennamuu fi miidhaa dhukkubaa irratti dhiibbaa kan qabaatanidha.

sourceString: Some people have allergic reactions to these drugs.On 12 April, a preliminary clinical trial conducted at a hospital in Brazil was stopped when several people given high doses of chloroquine for COVID-19 infection developed irregular heart rates, causing 11 deaths.
targetString: Namoonni muraasni dawaalee kanaaf deebii ariifataa qabu. Eebla gaafa 12, wallaansi yaalaa marsaa duraa hospitaala Biraazil keessatti geggeeffamaa ture yemmuu namoonni hedduun dhibee COVID-19 f kiloorookinii doozii guddaa fudhatanii rukuttaa onnee hin malle godhachuun, du'aatii 11f sababa ta'e dhaabsifamee ture.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show that favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Yaaliiwwan wallaansaa Chaayinaa Wuhaanii fi Sheenjiyeen faavipiraaviriin “Ifatti dandeettii-qabeessa” akka ta'e agarsiisuu isaa ibsaniiru.

sourceString: Of 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoota sheenzyen keessaa 35 giddugaleessaan guyyaa 4 keessatti qoratamanii negatiiva ta'aniiru, turtiin dhukkubbi dhukkubsattoota 45 kan isa hin fudhannee ammo guyyaa 11 ture.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Qu'annoo Wuhaan keessatti dhukkubsattoota michii sombaa qaban 240 irratti gaggeeffameen walakkaan favipiravir walakkaan immoo umifenovir tu kennameef.

sourceString: The term "preclinical research" is defined by laboratory studies in vitro and in vivo, indicating a beginning stage for development of a vaccine, antiviral or monoclonal antibody therapy, such as experiments to determine effective doses and toxicity, before a candidate compound is advanced for safety and efficacy evaluation in humans.
targetString: Jechi “qorannoo kilinikala duraa” qo'annaa laboraatoorii qaama keessaa fi qaama alaa tin, sadarkaa jalqaba guddina talaalli agarsiisuun, farra vaayraasii yookiin wal'aansa farra qaama alagaa monokiloonii, kan akka yaalii hammantaa qorichaa bu'a qabeessa ta'e fi summaa'ina isaa, kompaawoondiin kaadhimamaa of eggannoo fi gahumsa qorannoo namoota irratti osoo hin taasisin dura ibsama.

sourceString: Some antibiotics may be repurposed as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: Antibayootikii Muraasni akka wal'aansa COVID-19 tti ooluu danda'uu malu.

sourceString: In March 2020, the main protease of the SARS-CoV-2 virus was identified as a target for post-infection drugs.
targetString: Bitootessa 2020 tti, pirooteesiin ijoo vaayirasii SARS-CoV-2 qorichoota dhukkubaan faalamuu boodaatiif akka maniitti adda baafameera.

sourceString: This enzyme is essential to the host cell to reproduce the ribonucleic acid of the virus.
targetString: Inzaayimiin kun raayibooniwuklik asiidii vaayiresichaa baayyisuuf seelii baattootiif barbaachisaadha.

sourceString: To find the enzyme, scientists used the genome published by Chinese researchers in January 2020 to isolate the main protease.
targetString: Iinzaayimicha argachuudhaaf saayintistoonni kuusaa sanyii qorattoota Chaayinaatiin Amajjii 2020 maxxanfame pirooteesii haadhoo irraa adda baasuuf fayyadamaniiru.

sourceString: As a potential combination therapy, they are used together in two Phase III arms of the 2020 global Solidarity project on COVID-19.
targetString: Akka kuusaa humnaa qondomina wal'aansatti, isaanis sadarkaa III lamaan waliin hirreewwan 2020 pirojektii walta'aa COVID-19 irratti faayidarra oola.

sourceString: A preliminary study in China of combined lopinavir and ritonavir found no effect in people hospitalized for COVID-19.
targetString: Qorannaan marsaa duraa makaa looppiinaavaayerii fi ritoonaavaayerii namoota COVID-19 n hospitaala jiran irratti Chaayinaatti godhame irratti dhiibbaansaa hin mullanne.

sourceString: It is unclear yet whether conditions arising during pregnancy including diabetes, cardiac failure, hypercoagulability or hypertension might represent additional risk factors for pregnant people as they do for nonpregnant people.From the limited data available, vertical transmission during the third trimester probably does not occur, or only occurs very rarely.
targetString: Yeroo ulfummaa dhibee sukkaaraa, hojii isaa sirriitti hojjechuu dhaabuu onnee, hammaa ol kantaruu dhiigaa yookaan dhiibbaa dhiigaa dabalatee haalonni mul'atan dhiibbaawwan balaa dabalataa akkuma namoota ulfa hin taaneef bakka bu'an namoota ulfaaf bakka bu'uu maluun ammallee ifa miti. Deetaa murtaa'e argamu irraa, yeroo ji'oota gara dhumaa sadanitti daddarbuun dhukkubaa haadha irraa gara mucaatti tarii hin uumamu, yookaan baay'ee darbee darbee uumama.

sourceString: There is no data yet on early pregnancy.
targetString: Ulfa ta'uun duraaf ammayyuu deetaan hin jiru.

sourceString: Little evidence exists to permit any solid conclusions about the nature of COVID-19 infection in pregnancy.
targetString: Waayee uumama dhibee COVID-19 wayita ulfaa irratti gudunfaa qabatamaarra akka gahamu hayyamuuf ragaa baayyee muraasatu jira.

sourceString: A case series of 43 women from New York who tested positive for COVID-19 showed similar patterns to non-pregnant adults: 86% had mild disease, 9.3% had severe disease and 4.7% developed critical disease.
targetString: Dhimmi koronaa ulfaataan dubartoota 43 Niwyoork irratti COVID-19'n qabaman dubartoota ulfa hin taaneen haala walfakkaatu agrasiisa:86% dhukkubbii giddu galeessa, 9.3% dhukkubbii hamaa fi 4.7 dhukkubbii ulfaataa keessa jiru.

sourceString: Fetal distress was reported in two.
targetString: Ukkaamamuun daa'imaa lama keessatti ture kan gabaafame.

sourceString: None of the women developed severe COVID-19 pneumonia or died.
targetString: Dubartoota keessa tokkollee niimooniyaa COVID-19 hamaa hin godhanne ykn hin duune.

sourceString: All of them had live birth pregnancies and no severe neonatal asphyxia was observed.
targetString: Hundumti isaanii daa'ima fayyaa da'an akkasumas ukkaamamuun daa'imaa cimaan hin argamne.

sourceString: The samples of breast milk, amniotic fluid, cord blood and neonatal throat swab were tested for SARS-CoV-2, and all results were negative.In another study on 15 pregnant women, majority of the patients presented with fever and cough, while laboratory tests yielded lymphocytopenia in 12 patients.
targetString: Eddattoowwan aannan harmaa, bishaan gubbee, dhiiga hidda handhuuraa fi qoonqoo ijoollee keessaa eeddattoo waan akka jirbiin fuudhamu SARS-CoV-2'f qoratamaniiru, akkasumas bu'aaleen hunduu negatiiviidha. Qu'annoo biraa dubartoota ulfaa 15 irratti godhameen, harki caalaan dhukkubsattootaa ho'ina qaamaa fi qufaa agarsiisani,qorannoowwan laaboraatoorii ammoo dhukkubsattoota 12 keessatti lymphocytopenia agarsiisan.

sourceString: Computed tomography findings of these patients were consistent with previous reports of non-pregnant patients, consisting of ground-glass opacities at early stage.
targetString: Argamni Kompiyuuted Toomogiraafii dhukkunsattoota kanneeni gabaasa kanaan dura dhukkubsatoota ulfa hin taane waliin walfakkaata, sadarkaa dura irratti fuullee lafaa ifa hin dabarsiine of keessa qaba.

sourceString: Follow-up images after delivery showed no progression of pneumonia.Media reports indicate that over 100 women with COVID-19 might have delivered, and in March 2020, no maternal deaths were reported.
targetString: Suuraaawwan da'uumsa booda guddinni nimooniyaa mul'achuu dhabuu isaa hordofi. Gabaasni miidiyaa dubartoonni 100 ol COVID-19 qaban da'anii jiraachu akka malan agarsiisa, akkasumas Bitootessa 2020, duuti haadhooli ronahoomtu hin gabaafamne.

sourceString: Their guidelines thus advise that any pregnant person admitted to hospital with a COVID-19 infection should receive at least 10 days of prophylactic low-molecular-weight heparin after being discharged from the hospital.
targetString: Qajeelfamni isaanii kanaaf kan gorsu dubarri ulfi COVID-19'n hubamuun hospitaala ciiste kamiyyuu prophylactic hanga molakiyuulaa gadi aanaa guyyaa 10'f fudhachuu qabdi heparin'n(kan kantaruu dhiigaa dhowwu) ammoo erga hospitaalichaa baatee booda.

sourceString: There are no data yet concerning the implications of COVID-19 infections for labour.
targetString: Amma kanaan duraatti dhiibbaa COVID-19 ciniinsuu irraan ga'u daataan agarsiisu hin jiru.

sourceString: One infant girl born to a mother with COVID-19 had elevated IgM levels two hours after birth, suggesting that she had been infected in utero and supporting the possibility of vertical transmission in some cases.
targetString: Daa'imni durbaa haadha COVID-19 qabdurraa dhalatte tokko, gadameessa keessatti hubamuushee bifa mullisuun fi haalota murtaa'an keessatti haadharraa gara daa'imaatti carraan darbuu akka jiru bifa deeggaruun, dhalattee saatii lama booda gulaantaalee IgM darbitee turte.

sourceString: A small study involving 6 confirmed COVID-19 mothers showed no indication of SARS-COV-19 in their newborns' throats or serum but antibodies were present in neonatal blood sera samples, including IgM in two of the infants.
targetString: Qorannoo xiqqoon haadhooliii 6 COVID-19 mirkaana'e hammaate qoonqoo yookiin hancuufa daa'imma isaanii reefu dhalatan irratti SARS-COV-19 hin agarsiisu garuu farri qaama alagaa saamuda dhiiga daa'imaa keessaa fudhatamen, IgM dabalatee daa'imman lama keessatti ni argama.

sourceString: This is not usually passed from mother to fetus so further research is required to know whether the virus crossed the placenta or whether placentas of women in the study were damaged or abnormal.
targetString: Kana jechuun, haadha irraa gara daa'ima garaa keessa jiruutti darba jechuu miti. Vaayirasiin kun hidda handhuuraa keessa darba yookiin immoo hidda handuuraa hubame keessa darba kan jedhuuf qorannoo gadi fagoo barbaachisa.

sourceString: Since COVID-19 shows similarities to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, it is likely that their effect on pregnancy are similar.
targetString: Sababa COVID-19 SARS-CoV fi MERS-CoV'n walfakkaatuun, miidhaan isaan ulfa irratti qabanis walfakkaachuu mala.

sourceString: Four of seven had first trimester miscarriage, two of five had fetal growth restriction in the second trimester, and four of five had preterm birth.
targetString: Torba keessaa afur baasuu daa'ima ji'a sadii, shan keessaa lama ittisa guddina fiitesii turtii ulfaa lammataa keessatti, akkasumas, shan keessaa afur immoo dhalachuun dura qabu.

sourceString: None of the newborns were infected with SARS-CoV.
targetString: Daa'imoonni haaraa dhalatan kamuu SARS-CoV'n hin hubamne.

sourceString: A report of ten cases of MERS- CoV infection in pregnancy in Saudi Arabia showed that the clinical presentation is variable, from mild to severe infection.
targetString: Gabaasni dhimmoota MERS-Cov kudhan ulfa Saawud Arabiyaa keessa jiran keessaa, miidhaa giddu galeessaa hanga ciimatti ibsi kilinikaalaa akka jiru agarsise.

sourceString: The outcome was favorable in a majority of the cases, but the infant death rate was 27%.A recent review suggested that COVID-19 appeared to be less lethal to mothers and infants than SARS and MERS but that there may be an increased risk of preterm birth after 28 weeks' gestation.
targetString: Bu'aan Namoota walumaagalatti dhukuba kanaan qabamanii gaarii ture, haata'u malee baay'inni daa'imman lubbuun isaanii darbe 27%. Akkuma qorannoon yeroo dhiyootti godhame agarsiisu dhibeen COVID-19 dhibeewwan SARS fi MERS irraa humni haadhoolii fi daa'imman ajjeesuu isaa gadi bu'aadha jedhama. Haata'u malee dhibee ulfa yeroo malee torbaan 28 booda sababa dhalatuuf ta'uu mala.

sourceString: The World Health Organization and  Centers for Disease Control and Prevention of the United States advises pregnant women to do the same things as the general public to avoid infection, such as covering cough, avoid interacting with sick people, cleaning hands with soap and water or sanitizer.
targetString: Dhaabbatni Fayyaa Addunyaa fi Giddu-galli To'annaa fi Ittisa Dhibee Yuunayitid Isteetsi dubartoonni ulfaas dhukkuba kanarraa ofeeguuf akkuma hawaasa maraa kanneen akka yeroo qufa'an haguuggachuu, namoota dhukkubsatan waliin tuttuqaa qabaachuu dhiisuu, harka saamunaa fi bishaaniin ykn saanitaayizeriin qulqulleeffachuu akka qaban gorsu.

sourceString: A survey conducted in Shanghai among pregnant women in different trimesters of pregnancy identified a strong demand for online access to health information and services.
targetString: Qu'annaan dubartoota ulfaa ji'oota sadan yeroo garaagaraa gidduutti shaangaayi keessatti gaggeeffame fedhii cimaa argannoo odeeffannoo fayyaa fi tajaajiiloota sarara irraatiif adda baaseera.

sourceString: People expecting their first baby were more willing to have online consultation and guidance than who had previously given birth.The RCOG and RCM recommend that in-person appointments be deferred by 7 days after the start of symptoms of COVID-19 or 14 days if another person in the household has symptoms.
targetString: Namoonni dhalachuu daa'ima isaanii jalqabaa eegaa turan namoota kana dura daa'ima godhatanii beekan irra tajaajila gorsaafi qajeelchaa sarara irraa argachuuf fedhaa turan. RCOG fi RCM beellamni qaamaa jalqabuu mallattoolee COVID-19 booda guyyoota 7'n gargar ta'uu akka qabu yookaan yoo namni biraan maatii keessaa mallattoolee qabu jira ta'e guyyoota 14'n ta'uu akka qabu eeru.

sourceString: Fever subsequently developed in three asymptomatic patients.
targetString: Bowwoon dhukkubbii dhukkubsaatoota waliitti aanan sadii irratti ni mul'ata.

sourceString: One patient who had tested negative subsequently became symptomatic postpartum and tested positive three days after the initial negative test.
targetString: Dhukkubsataan qoratamee negatiiva ta'e tokko boodarra gara mallattoo poostipaartamii agarsiisuu fiqorannoo dutraarraa guyyaa sadii boodammoo poosetiivii ta'e.

sourceString: The doctors conducting the screening recommended that in order to reduce infection and allocate PPE, due to high numbers of patients presenting as asymptomatic, universal screening of pregnant patients should be conducted.
targetString: Dookteroonni sakatta'iinsa gochaa jiran hubamuu xinneessuu fi PPE qoqqooduuf,waan dhukkubsattootni lakkoofsaan baayyeen mallattoo agarsiisaa hin jirreef, sakatta'iinsi waliigalaa dhukkubsattoota ulfaaf godhamuu akka qabu gorsaniiru.

sourceString: They also suggest that people with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 should have continuous electronic fetal monitoring.
targetString: Akkasumas isaan namoonni COVID-19 waliin shakkaman yookaan mirkanaa'an meeshaa humna elektirikiin hojjetuun sochiin daa'imaa garaa keessatti walitti fufiiinsaan akka to'atamuu qabu yaada dhiyeessu.

sourceString: The use of birthing pools is not recommended for suspected or confirmed cases of COVID-19 due to the risk of infection via faeces.
targetString: Itti fayyadamni oobbatii dhalootaa sababa boobbaa irratti rakkoo uumuf dhimmoota COVID-19 shakkameef yookiin mirkanaa'ef hin eeramu.

sourceString: In the UK, official recommendations state that precautionary separation of a mother and a healthy baby should not be undertaken lightly and that they should be kept together in the postpartum period where neonatal care is not required.Literature from China recommended separation of infected mothers from babies for 14 days.
targetString: UK keessatti gorsi mootummaa of eeggannoodhaan haadhaa fi daa'ima fayyaalessa gargar baasuun salphaatti ilaalamuun kan hin qabnee fi iddoo kunuunsi addaa barbaachifnetti wayita da'umsaan booda walfaana tursiifamuun gaariidha. Barreeffamni Chaayinaarraa gargar ba'iinsa haadholii hubamoo fi daa'immanii guyyoota 14 f gorseera.

sourceString: In the US there is also the recommendation that newborns and mothers should be temporarily separated until transmission-based precautions are discontinued, and that where this is not possible the newborn should be kept 2 metres away from the mother.
targetString: US keessa daa'imoonni reefuu dhalatanii fi haadholiin hamma daddarbiinsi dhibee addaan citutti adda ba'anii turuu akka qaban yaadi jedhus jira, kunimmoo daa'imman reefuu dhalatan meetira 2 haadharraa fagaachuu waan hin dandeenyeef ta'uu hin danda'u.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 surveillance involves monitoring the spread of the coronavirus disease in order to establish the patterns of disease progression.
targetString: To'annan b'COVID-19 babal'ina dhukkuba vaayrasii koronaa to'achun paatarnii guddina vaayrasii hundeessuu of keessatti qabata.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends active surveillance, with focus of case finding, testing and contact tracing in all transmission scenarios.
targetString: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) n hordoffii jala bu'iinsaanii dammaqaa, ta'iiwwan barbaaduu, sakatta'uu fi haalota daddarbiinsaa hundaan faana dha'umsa quunnamuu irratte xiyyeeffate ni gorsa.

sourceString: COVID-19 surveillance is expected to monitor epidemiological trends, rapidly detect new cases, and based on this information, provide epidemiological information to conduct risk assessment and guide disease preparedness.
targetString: Xiyyeeffannaan to'chuun COVID-19 adeemsa qu'annoo saayinsii babal'inaafi to'annoo dhukkubaa akka to'atu eegama, saffisaan dhimmoota haaraa adda baasa, akkasumas odeeffannoo kana irratti hundaa'uun, odeeffannoo qu'annoo saayinsii babal'inaafi to'annoo dhukkubaa qorannoo balaa gaggeessuuf fi qophaa'ummaa dhukkubaa dhiyeessa.

sourceString: Syndromic surveillance is done based on the symptoms of an individual that corresponds to COVID-19.
targetString: To'annaan mallatoolee mallattoowwan namoota dhuunfaa COVID- 19 ilaalatu irratti hundaa'un gaggeeffama.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the WHO recommends the following case definitions:
targetString: Akka Bitootessa 2020 tti, WHO'n hiikawwan dhimma armaan gadii kana eera:

sourceString: Probable case : "A suspect case for whom testing for the COVID-19 virus is inconclusive" OR "a suspect case for whom testing could not be performed for any reason".
targetString: Ta'ii mudachuu malu : “Ta'ii shakkii kan qorannaan COVID-19'saa gudunfamuu hin dandeenyee” YKN “ Ta'ii shakkii kan sababa kamiinillee qorannaan godhamuu hin dandeenyee.”

sourceString: Confirmed case: "A person with laboratory confirmation of COVID-19 infection, irrespective of clinical signs and symptoms".
targetString: Dhimma mirkanaa'e: “Namni dhibee COVID-19 laboraatorii keessatti mirkanaa'e, mallattoolee kilinikaa fi dhukkubii osoo hin ta'in”.

sourceString: Direct physical contact with a probable or confirmed case;
targetString: Tuqaatii qaamaa kallattin namoota shakkamanii fi dhukkubaan qabamuun isaanii beekame waliin;

sourceString: Direct care for a patient with probable or confirmed COVID-19 disease without using proper personal protective equipment;
targetString: Utuum ittistuu dhbee ykn golgituuwwan qaamaa hin fayyadamiin eeggannoo kallattii dhukkubsataa COVID-19n shakkameefi qabamuunsaa mirkanaa'ee;

sourceString: Other situations as indicated by local risk assessments".WHO recommends reporting of probable and confirmed cases of COVID-19 infection within 48 hours of identification.
targetString: Haalonni kan biraan akka tilmaammiiwwan balaa naannootiin agarsiifamaniitti”. WHO'n dhimmooti COVID-19'n hubamuu ta'uu danda'anii fi mirkanaa'an erga adda ba'anii sa'aatii 48 gidduutti akka gabaafaman eera.

sourceString: The countries should report on a case-by-case basis as far as possible, but in case of limitation in resources, aggregate weekly reporting is also possible.
targetString: Biyyoonni hamma danda'ametti akkuma inni mul'atetti gabaasuutu irra jiraata, garuu hanqina meeshaaleetiin walitti qabaan kan torbee gabaasuunis in danda'ama.

sourceString: Some organizations have created crowdsourced apps for syndromic surveillance, where people can report their symptoms to help researchers map areas with concentration of COVID-19 symptoms.
targetString: Namoonni karaa mallattoo isaanii himatanii fi qorattoonni baayy'ina mallattoo COVID-19 akka beekaniif kan gargaaru dhaabbattoonni hedduun appilikeeshinoota hedduu kalaqanii hojiirra oolchaniiru.

sourceString: Virological surveillance is done by using molecular tests for COVID-19.
targetString: To'annoon vaayiroojikaalaa COVID-19'f qorannoowwan molakiyuulaa fayyadamuun hojjetama.

sourceString: WHO has published resources for laboratories on how to perform testing for COVID-19.
targetString: WHO'n barruuwwan akkamitti qorannoon laboraatoorii COVID-19 akka taasifamuu maxxanseera.

sourceString: In the European Union, laboratory confirmed cases of COVID-19 are reported within 24 hours of identification.
targetString: Gamtaa Awurooppaatti, ta'iileen COVID-19 laaboraatooriin mirkanaa'an erga adda ba'ee saatii 24 keessatti gabaafamu.

sourceString: At least 24 countries have established digital surveillance of their citizens.
targetString: Yoo xinnaate biyyoonni 24 to'aannaa dijitaalaa lammiilee isaanitiif hundeessaniiru.

sourceString: The digital surveillance technologies include apps, location data and electronic tags.
targetString: Teeknoolojiin to'annaa dijitaalaa, appiiwwan, daataa iddoo fi mallattoowwan elektiroonikii of keessatti qabata.

sourceString: The Center For Disease Control and Prevention in USA tracks the travel information of individuals using airline passenger data.
targetString: Wiirtuun dhukkuba to'achuu fi ittisuu USA keessatti daataa waa'ee namootaa karaa qilleensa irraa adeemsisuun fayyadama.

sourceString: In Hong Kong, authorities are requiring a bracelet and an app for all travellers.
targetString: Hoong Koong keessatti, angaawoonni imaltootaaf saldaaqaa fi fayyadama barbaadaa jiru.

sourceString: A GPS app is used to track the locations of individuals in South Korea to ensure against quarantine breach, sending alerts to the user and to authorities if people leave designated areas.
targetString: Fayyadami GPS iddoowwan namootaa Kooriyaa Kibbaa keessatti faana dhahuuf seera qofaatti baafamuu diiguu isaanii mirkaneessuuf fayyadamamaa jira, yoo namoonni iddoowwan ramadaman gadhisan yaadachiiftuu fayyadamaattiifi angaawotatti erguun.

sourceString: In Singapore, individuals have to report their locations with photographic proof.
targetString: Singaapoor keessatti, namoonni dhuunfaa iddoo isaanii mirkaneessa suuraan gabaasuu qabu.

sourceString: Thailand is using an app and SIM cards for all travelers to enforce their quarantine.
targetString: Taayilaandi imaltoonni akka adda ofbaasan dirqamsiisuuf aappii fi kaardiiwwan SIM fayyadamaa jirti.

sourceString: Human rights organizations have criticized some of these measures, asking the governments not to use the pandemic as a cover to introduce invasive digital surveillance.
targetString: Dhaabbanni mirga dhala namaa madaaltota kanneen muraasasaanii ceepha'eera, mootummaas akka weerara dhibee kanaa to'annoo kanaan ahkka hin da'anne gaafataa jira.

sourceString: b'Coronaviruses are a group of related viruses that cause diseases in mammals and birds.
targetString: Vaayirasoonni koroonaa b' garee vaayirasootaa dhibeewwan hoosiftootaafi simbirroota keessatti geessisanidha.

sourceString: In humans, coronaviruses cause respiratory tract infections that can range from mild to lethal.
targetString: Ilma namaa keessatti, vaayirasoonni koroonaa hubamuu qaamoota hargansuu kan salphaa hanga du'aatti geessuu danda'u geessisu.

sourceString: Mild illnesses include some cases of the common cold (which has other possible causes, predominantly rhinoviruses), while more lethal varieties can cause SARS, MERS, and COVID-19.
targetString: Gosoonni balaafamoon SARS, MERS, fi COVID-19 f sababa kan ta'an yommuu ta'u, dhukkubbiileen giddu-galeessaa mallattoolee utaalloo dabalata. (sababoota biroo kan qabaachuus malu, irra caalmaan immoo riinoovaayiresii).

sourceString: Symptoms in other species vary: in chickens, they cause an upper respiratory tract disease, while in cows and pigs they cause diarrhea.
targetString: Mallattooleen sanyiiwwan kan biroo keessatti garaagara: lukkuuwwan keessatti, dhibee hargansuu qaama gara olii geessisu, loowwaniifi booyyota keessatti immoo garaa kaasaa geessisu.

sourceString: There are yet to be vaccines or antiviral drugs to prevent or treat human coronavirus infections.
targetString: Talaallonni yookaan qorichoonni farra dhukkuboota vaayirasiin dhufanii vaayirasii koroonaan hubamuu ilma namaa ittisan yookaan wal'aanan ammallee jiru.

sourceString: Coronaviruses constitute the subfamily Orthocoronavirinae, in the family Coronaviridae, order Nidovirales, and realm Riboviria.
targetString: Vaayirasoonni koroonaa damee maatii Orthocoronavirinae of-keessatti qabatu, maatii Coronaviridae keessatti, tartiiba Nidovirales, fi mootummaa Riboviria.

sourceString: They are enveloped viruses with a positive-sense single-stranded RNA genome and a nucleocapsid of helical symmetry.
targetString: Isaan vaayirasoota jenoomii kajila RNA baaqqee positivii fi nucleocapsid boca ispiriingii kan danaan walqixxee waliin haguugamani.

sourceString: The genome size of coronaviruses ranges from approximately 26 to 32 kilobases, one of the largest among RNA viruses.
targetString: Hangi sanyii koronaavaayiresii tilmaamaan kiiloobeezii 26 hanga 32 yoo ta'u, vaayiresoota RNA warra gurguddoo keessaa isa tokkodha.

sourceString: They have characteristic club-shaped spikes that project from their surface, which in electron micrographs create an image reminiscent of the solar corona from which their name derives.
targetString: Isaanis boca tuttuqaa qaama isaanii irraa ka'un haagugaman, innis fakkii elektron maaykiroogiraafii fakkii ifa aduu koronaa nama yaadachisu kan maqaan isaanii irraa argamee uumun adda ba'u.

sourceString: Coronaviruses were first discovered in the 1930s when an acute respiratory infection of domesticated chickens was shown to be caused by infectious bronchitis virus (IBV).
targetString: Koronaavaayiresoonni jalqaba kan argaman 1930'mmoota keessa yeroo dhukkubni sirna hargansuu hamaan lukkuulee manaa vaayiresii ujummoo qilleensaa hubuun dhufuunsaa (IBV) mul'atetti ture.

sourceString: In the 1940s, two more animal coronaviruses, mouse hepatitis virus (MHV) and transmissible gastroenteritis virus (TGEV), were isolated.Human coronaviruses were discovered in the 1960s.
targetString: 1940 moota keesa, koronaavaayiresoonni bineeldotaa dabalataa lama, vaayiresii tiruu illeettii (MHV) vaayiresii daddarbaa gaastirooyinteeritisii (TGEV), adda baafamanii turan. Koronaavaayiresoonni namaa immoo 1960 moota keessa adda baafamani.

sourceString: The earliest ones studied were from human patients with the common cold, which were later named human coronavirus 229E and human coronavirus OC43.
targetString: Gara duraa warri qorataman namoota utaalloo dhukkubsatanirraa kan ta'e, boodarra koronaavaayiresii namaa 229E fi koronaavaayiresii namaa OC43 jedhuun moggaafamaniiru.

sourceString: They were first imaged by Scottish virologist June Almeida at St. Thomas Hospital in London.
targetString: Isaan jalqaba vaayirooloojistii biyya iskootlaand June Almeida tiin Hospitaala St.Thomas tti London keessatti suura kaafaman.

sourceString: Other human coronaviruses have since been identified, including SARS-CoV in 2003, HCoV NL63 in 2004, HKU1 in 2005, MERS-CoV in 2012, and SARS-CoV-2 in 2019.
targetString: Amma ammaatti gosoota biro koroonaa vaayirasiikan adda ba'e kan akka SARS-CoV bara 2003, HCoV NL63 bara 2004, HKU1 bara 2005, MERS-CoV bara 2012, and SARS-CoV-2 bara 2019.

sourceString: Most of these have involved serious respiratory tract infections.
targetString: Kanneen keessaa garri caalaan dhukkuboota hamoo ujummoota sirna hargansuu kan hammatanidha.

sourceString: The name was first used in 1968 by an informal group of virologists in the journal Nature to designate the new family of viruses.
targetString: Maqichi jalqaba bara 1968 garee qorattoota vaayrasitiitin barruu uummama maatii vaayrasii haara hojjechuu kan jedhu irratti itti fayyadamame.

sourceString: The name refers to the characteristic appearance of virions (the infective form of the virus) by electron microscopy, which have a fringe of large, bulbous surface projections creating an image reminiscent of a crown or of a solar corona.
targetString: Maqichi bifa amalaa viiriyonii (gosa vaayirasii faalamaa) maayikirooskoppii elektiroonii bakka bu'a, kunis gama guddaa kan qabu, hojii danaa balbii suuraa hojii ykn soolaarii koroonaa uuma.

sourceString: This morphology is created by the viral spike peplomers, which are proteins on the surface of the virus.
targetString: Caasan qaama isaa tutuqaaa vaayralii pepilomeersi olka'an kan pirootinii qaama vaayrasii kan ta'e irraa kan ijaaramedha.

sourceString: Coronaviruses are large pleomorphic spherical particles with bulbous surface projections.
targetString: Vaayirasiin koroonaa qaamota piluumoorfoolikii naannawaa guddaa agarsiisa qaama balbii fakkaatu wajjin guddaadha.

sourceString: The envelope of the virus in electron micrographs appears as a distinct pair of electron dense shells.The viral envelope consists of a lipid bilayer where the membrane (M), envelope (E) and spike (S) structural proteins are anchored.
targetString: Invilooppiin vaayiresii maayikiroograaphii elektiroonii keessatti akka sheelota elektiroonii walitti gobbataniitti mullata. Invilooppiin vaayiresii baqqaana coomaa lama kan pirootiinonni ijaarsaa membireeniin (M), invilooppiin (E) fi ispaayikii (S) ittiin utubaman qaba.

sourceString: The lipid bilayer envelope, membrane proteins, and nucleocapsid protect the virus when it is outside the host cell.
targetString: Hunguuggiin liipidii baqqanaa lamaa, meembiireeniin pirootinii, akkasumas nuukulookapsidiin vaayrasii seelii keessummeesituu ta'een ala yeroo jiru ittisu.

sourceString: Coronaviruses contain a positive-sense, single-stranded RNA genome.
targetString: Vaayrasiin koronaa miira pozitivii, jiinomee RNA kirrii qeenxee qaba.

sourceString: The genome size for coronaviruses ranges from 26.4 to 31.7 kilobases.
targetString: Hammamtaan jenoomii vaayirasii koroonaa kiiloobeezii 26.4 hanga 31.7 ta'a.

sourceString: The genome size is one of the largest among RNA viruses.
targetString: Hammi jiinoomee vaayrasiiwwan RNA keessaa isa guddaadha.

sourceString: The open reading frames 1a and 1b, which occupy the first two-thirds of the genome, encode the replicase/transcriptase polyprotein.
targetString: Katabbiin banaa giinoomii lama-sadaffaa 1a fi 1b irraa, pirootiinii baay'ee bakka akka buusu ykn daddabasutti qabatame.

sourceString: The replicase/transcriptase polyprotein self cleaves to form nonstructural proteins.The later reading frames encode the four major structural proteins: spike, envelope, membrane, and nucleocapsid.
targetString: Rippilikees/pooliipirootiiniin tiraaniskiriiptesii pirootiinii miti-ijaarsaa uumuudhaaf ofdiiga. Fireemonni gara dhumaarraa immoo odeeffannoo hidda sanyii pirootiinota ijaarsaa ijoo arfanii: ispaayikii, invilooppii, membireenii fi niwukilookaapsiidii kan olkaa'udha.

sourceString: Interspersed between these reading frames are the reading frames for the accessory proteins.
targetString: Bittimfamuun dubbifama godayyaa kanneen gidduu dubbifama godayyaa iddaannoo pirootiiniiti.

sourceString: The number of accessory proteins and their function is unique depending on the specific coronavirus.
targetString: Lakkoofsi iddaannoo pirotiiniiwwanii fi hojiin isaanii vaayrasiii koronaa murtaa'e irratti hundaa'un isa addaati.

sourceString: Infection begins when the viral spike (S) glycoprotein attaches to its complementary host cell receptor.
targetString: Dhukkubbiin kan eegalu yoo tuqaa olkaa'an vaayrasii gilaaykopirootinii (S) fudhattuu seelii keessummeesituu walfakkaatatti maxxanuudha.

sourceString: After attachment, a protease of the host cell cleaves and activates the receptor-attached spike protein.
targetString: Erga maxxane booda, pirootesiin seelii keessummeesituu pirootinii olkaa'e fudhattuu offitti maxxanse jabeessu akkasumas kakaasu.

sourceString: Depending on the host cell protease available, cleavage and activation allows the virus to enter the host cell by endocytosis or direct fusion of the viral envelop with the host membrane.On entry into the host cell, the virus particle is uncoated, and its genome enters the cell cytoplasm.
targetString: Argama seelii keessummeesituu pirootesii irratti hundaa'un, jabeessuu fi kakasuun vaayrasiin gara seelii keessummeesituu akka indoosaaytosisin yookiin kallattiidhan memberenii keessummeesituu akka seenu heeyama. Gara seelii yoo seenuu, qaamni vaayrasi kan hin haguugamne waan ta'eef gara saaytopilaasizimii ni seeana.

sourceString: The host ribosome translates the initial overlapping open reading frame of the virus genome and forms a long polyprotein.
targetString: Raaybosomii keessummeesituun walqaxxamura jalqaba gara fireemii banaatti hiikun jiinomee vaayrasii dubbisa akkasumas poolipirootinii dheeraa uuma.

sourceString: The polyprotein has its own proteases which cleave the polyprotein into multiple nonstructural proteins.
targetString: Pooliipirootiiniin pirooteesii mataasaa kan pooliipirootiinicha gara pirootiinii miti-ijaarsaa hedduutti diiguu danda'u qaba.

sourceString: A number of the nonstructural proteins coalesce to form a multi-protein replicase-transcriptase complex (RTC).
targetString: Pirootiinonni mit-ijaarsaa lakkoofsaan hedduun makaa rippilikees-tiraaniskiriiptesii abbaa pirootiinaa hedduu (RTC) uumuuf walitti ni makamu

sourceString: The main replicase-transcriptase protein is the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp).
targetString: Baay'istuu- garagalchituun pirootinii maxxantuu RNA ti RNA-polymerease(RdRP) keessaa bu'uura.

sourceString: It is directly involved in the replication and transcription of RNA from an RNA strand.
targetString: Inni kallattiidhaan garagalchaafi kajila RNA irraa garagalcha tartiiba jiinii DNA keessatti hirmaata.

sourceString: The other nonstructural proteins in the complex assist in the replication and transcription process.
targetString: Pirootinoonni caasaa hin qabne walxaxaa sana keessaa adeemsa garalchaa fi jijjiirama sadarkaa tokko irraa gara kan birootiif gargaaru.

sourceString: The exoribonuclease nonstructural protein, for instance, provides extra fidelity to replication by providing a proofreading function which the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase lacks.One of the main functions of the complex is to replicate the viral genome.
targetString: Egzoorayboonuukilaasin pirootinii hin qindoofne,fakkeenyaaf, dandeetti dabalataa akka of baay'isuuf hojii maxxantuu RNA irra deebi'ee ilaalun poolimeereisii RNA hanqate kennaaf. Hojii walaxaa keessaa guddaan tokko ginoomee vaayraalii baay'isuudha.

sourceString: RdRp directly mediates the synthesis of negative-sense genomic RNA from the positive-sense genomic RNA.
targetString: RsRp'n kallattiin walitti dabalama miira negatiivaa fi jeenoomii RNA, geenoomii miiraa RNA poosetiivii irraa giddu galeeffata

sourceString: This is followed by the replication of positive-sense genomic RNA from the negative-sense genomic RNA.
targetString: Kun miira negatiivii jenomikii RNA irraa garagalcha miira positiivii jenomikii RNA'n hordofama.

sourceString: The other important function of the complex is to transcribe the viral genome.
targetString: Faayidaan mallattoolee kanaa inni biraan sanyii vaayiresichaa daddabarsuufi.

sourceString: RdRp directly mediates the synthesis of negative-sense subgenomic RNA molecules from the positive-sense genomic RNA.
targetString: RdRp'n kallattiin oomisha keemikaalaa uumamaa miirri negatiivii damee jenomikii molakiyuulii RNA miira posetiivii jenomikii RNA irraa walii akka galan godha.

sourceString: This is followed by the transcription of these negative-sense subgenomic RNA molecules to their corresponding positive-sense mRNAs.
targetString: Kunis katabbiiwwan molikiwuulii negatiivaa jiinii miiraa RNAgara miira poozetiivii mRNAs malu kanneeniitiin hordofama.

sourceString: The replicated positive-sense genomic RNA becomes the genome of the progeny viruses.
targetString: Miirri poozitivii jiinomikii RNA dachaa jiinoomee vaayrasiiwwan addaa ta'a.

sourceString: The mRNAs are gene transcripts of the last third of the virus genome after the initial overlapping reading frame.
targetString: mRNA'oonni galagalcha hidda sanyii kuusaa sanyii vaayiresii sadaffaa dhumaa walirra-oolmaa fireemii dubbisaa isa jalqabaa boodaati.

sourceString: These mRNAs are translated by the host's ribosomes into the structural proteins and a number of accessory proteins.
targetString: mRNA'oonni kunneen raayiboozoomota baattootiin gara pirootiinii ijaarsaa fi pirootiinota gargaartuu heduutti hiikamu.

sourceString: RNA translation occurs inside the endoplasmic reticulum.
targetString: Hiikkaan RNA kaninni rawwatu retikulamii indooplaasmawaa keessattidha.

sourceString: The viral structural proteins S, E, and M move along the secretory pathway into the Golgi intermediate compartment.
targetString: Pirootiinonni ijaarsaa vaayiresii S,E, fi M n karaa balfiirra ba'uun gara kutaalee qoqqoodamoo gidduu Goljiitti deema.

sourceString: There, the M proteins direct most protein-protein interactions required for assembly of viruses following its binding to the nucleocapsid.
targetString: Pirootiiniin M pirotiinii kallattii walitti dhufeeny pirootiinii- pirootiinii baay'een walitti dabalamuu vaayirasiiwwan gara nuukilookaapsiidiitti qabatuu hordofu.

sourceString: Progeny viruses are then released from the host cell by exocytosis through secretory vesicles.
targetString: Sanyiin vaayiresootaa kanaan booda seelii baattoo keessaa mala egzoosaayitoosisiitiin karaa vesiloota sekreeteriitiin gadi dhiifama.

sourceString: The interaction of the coronavirus spike protein with its complement host cell receptor is central in determining the tissue tropism, infectivity, and species range of the virus.
targetString: walitti dhufeenyi vaayirasii koronaa ispaayik pirootinii fi kompilimantii seelii baattuu fi simattuu isaa tishuu tiroopisimii, miidhaa fi hamma gosa vaayirasichaa ibsuuf yaada ijoodha.

sourceString: The SARS coronavirus, for example, infects human cells by attaching to the angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) receptor.
targetString: Vaayrasiin koronaa SARS, fakkkeenyaaf, inzaayimii antijonestik-konverting riiseptaarii 2(ACE2) jedhamutti maxxane seelii nama miidha.

sourceString: The scientific name for coronavirus is Orthocoronavirinae or Coronavirinae.
targetString: Maqaan saayinsawaaa vaayirasii koroonaa Orthocoronavirinae yookaan Coronavirinae dha.

sourceString: Coronaviruses belong to the family of Coronaviridae, order Nidovirales, and realm Riboviria.
targetString: Koronaavaayiresoonni maatii Koronaavaayiriidee, tarree Niidoovaayirelsi, fi riyaalmi ttidha kan isaan ramadaman.

sourceString: Genus Betacoronavirus; type species: Murine coronavirus
targetString: Garee Vaayrasii koronaa beettaa; gosa qaacheewwan: vaayrasii koronaa Muraayinii

sourceString: Species: Betacoronavirus 1 (Bovine Coronavirus, Human coronavirus OC43), Human coronavirus HKU1, Murine coronavirus, Pipistrellus bat coronavirus HKU5, Rousettus bat coronavirus HKU9, Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2), Tylonycteris bat coronavirus HKU4, Middle East respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus, Hedgehog coronavirus 1 (EriCoV)
targetString: Sanyii: Beettaakoronaavaayiresii 1(koronaavaayireesii Loowwanii, koronaavaayiresii Namaa OC43), koronaavaayiresii Namaa HKU1, koronaavaayiresii Fooliyoo, koronaavaayiresii simbira halkanii Pipistireelisii HKU5, koronaavaayiresii simbira halkanii Roositusii HKU9, koronaavaayiresii baayyee hamaa sirna hargansuu hubu (SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2), koronaavaayiresii simbira halkanii Taayiloonaayisiterisii HKU4, koronaavaayiresii Giddu-gala Bahaa sirna hargansuu hubu 1 (EriCoV)

sourceString: Species: Beluga whale coronavirus SW1, Infectious bronchitis virus
targetString: Sanyii: koronaavaayiresii Beeluugaa Weelii SW1, vaayiresii dhibe geessisaa ujummoo qilleensaa.

sourceString: The most recent common ancestor (MRCA) of all coronaviruses is estimated to have existed as recently as 8000 BCE, although some models place the common ancestor as far back as 55 million years or more, implying long term coevolution with bat and avian species.
targetString: Moodeloonni muraasni horteen waliinii isaanii waggoota miiliyoona 55 ykn isaa olitti nu deebisuun, adeemsa jijjirama tirannaa waliinii simbira halkanii fi sanyiiwwan aviyaanii haa tuqaniyyuu malee, horteen waliinii koronaavaayiresoota hundaa inni dhiyoon (MRCA) dhiyeenya kana Dh.K.D. 8000 argamuunsaa tilmaamameera.

sourceString: The most recent common ancestor of the alphacoronavirus line has been placed at about 2400 BCE, the betacoronavirus line at 3300 BCE, the gammacoronavirus line at 2800 BCE, and the deltacoronavirus line at about 3000 BCE.
targetString: Sararri abuduroo yeroo baay'ee dhiyoo vaayirasii koroonaa alfaa beekamaan naannoo 2400 DH.K.D tti kaa'ame, sararri vaayirasii koroonaa beettaan 3300 DH.K.D tti, sararri vaayirasii koroonaa gaammaa 2800 DH.K.D tti, fi sararri vaayirasii koroonaa deeltaa naannoo 3000 DH.K.D tti.

sourceString: The large number of host bat and avian species, and their global range, has enabled extensive evolution and dissemination of coronaviruses.Many human coronavirus have their origin in bats.
targetString: Lakkoofsi baay'ee simbira halkanii baattuu taatee fi sanyiiwwan aviyaan, akkasumas hangi addunyaawaa isaanii, jijjiirama tirannaa bal'aa fi tamsa'ina vaayirasii koroonaa dandeessisaniiru. Vaayirasiin koroonaa ilma namaa baay'een simbiroota halkanii keessatti madda isaanii qabu.

sourceString: More recently, alpaca coronavirus and human coronavirus 229E diverged sometime before 1960.
targetString: Caalatti kan yeroo dhiyoo, vaayrasii koronaa alpakaa fi vaayrasiin koronaa dhala namaa 229E yeroo tokko bara 1960 gargar ba'an.

sourceString: MERS-CoV emerged in humans from bats through the intermediate host of camels.
targetString: MERS-CoV ilmaan namaa keessatti simbirroota halkanii irraa gaalota akka dabarsoo giddu galeessaatti fayyadamuun mul'atan.

sourceString: MERS-CoV, although related to several bat coronavirus species, appears to have diverged from these several centuries ago.
targetString: MERS-cov, Qaachee Vaayrasii koronaa simbira halkanii heddu waliin walitti dhiyaatu illee, jaarraawwan darbanitti isaan kanneen irraa adda ta'e mul'ate.

sourceString: The most closely related bat coronavirus and SARS-CoV diverged in 1986.
targetString: Vaayrasiiwwan koronaa simbira halkanii fi SARS-CoV sirritti walitti dhiyaatan bara 1986 gargar ba'an.

sourceString: A possible path of evolution, of SARS coronavirus and keen bat coronaviruses, suggests that SARS related coronaviruses coevolved in bats for a long time.
targetString: Akkaataa SARS koroonaa vaayirasii ittiin uumamuu danda'u, koroonaa vaayirasii simbira halkanii cimaa, SARS fi koroonaa vaayirasiin simbira halkanii keessatti walitti dhufeenya yeroo dheeraa qabu.

sourceString: In the 1790s, equine coronavirus diverged from the bovine coronavirus after a cross-species jump.
targetString: Bara 1790 keessa vaayirasii koroonaa bovaayinii irraa vaayirasiin koroonaa kutte duudaar sanyiin daddarbe.

sourceString: Later in the 1890s, human coronavirus OC43 diverged from bovine coronavirus after another cross-species spillover event.
targetString: 1890'moota booda vaaayirasiin koroonaa ilma namaa OC43 vaayirasii koroonaa bovine irraa taatee sanyiiwwan cross spillover kan biraa booda kallattii biraa irra qajeele.

sourceString: It is speculated that the flu pandemic of 1890 may have been caused by this spillover event, and not by the influenza virus, because of the related timing, neurological symptoms, and unknown causative agent of the pandemic.
targetString: Caamsaa 1890 infiluweenzaan biyyoota hunda keessatti argamu hubamuu spillover Kanaan akka ta'utu tilmaamama, akkasumas vaayirasii infiluweenzaan akka hin taane, sababa yeroo walqabataan, mallattoolee kan narviin, fi dabarsituu dhukkuba biyyoota hunda keessatti argamanii hin beekamneen.

sourceString: Human coronavirus OC43 besides causing respiratory infections is also suspected of playing a role in neurological diseases.
targetString: koronaan namaa OC43 dhukkubbii sirna hargaansu fiduu cinaatti dhukkuba sirna narvii fiduu irratti gahe akka taphatu ni shakkama.

sourceString: In the 1950s, the human coronavirus OC43 began to diverge into its present genotypes.
targetString: 1950'mmoota keessa koronaavaayiresiin namaa OC43 n giinootaayippiisaa ammaa kanatti jijjiiramuu jalqabe.

sourceString: Phylogentically, mouse hepatitis virus (Murine coronavirus), which infects the mouse's liver and the central nervous system, is related to  human coronavirus OC43 and bovine coronavirus.
targetString: Fiilojeenitikaaliidhaan, vaayrasiin tiruu hantuuta(Muurayin koronaa vaayras), tiruu fi sirna giddu gala narvii hantuuta kan miidhu, vaayrasii koronaa namaa OC43 fi vaayrasii koronaa abba sangaatti dhiyaata.

sourceString: Human coronavirus HKU1, like the aforementioned viruses, also has its origins in rodents.
targetString: Koronaavaayiresiin Namaa HKU1, akkuma vaayiresoota dura ibsamanii, ka'umsasaa gosaata hantuutaa kan godhatedha.

sourceString: Coronaviruses vary significantly in risk factor.
targetString: Vaayirasiin koroonaa balaa dhaqqabsiiisuu danda'uun warren kaanirraa adda.

sourceString: Some can kill more than 30% of those infected, such as MERS-CoV, and some are relatively harmless, such as the common cold.
targetString: Muraasni warri akka MERS-CoV kanneen hubaman keessaa 30% dhaa ol ajjeesuu kan danda'anii, fi muraasni warri akka utaalloo immoo birqabaan miidha-maleeyyiidha.

sourceString: Coronaviruses can cause colds with major symptoms, such as fever, and a sore throat from swollen adenoids.
targetString: Vaayrasiin koronaa qufaa mallattolee gurgurddaa ta'an, kan akka bowwoo, akkasumas hoqsisuu qoonqoo adenooyid liqimsuutu irraa kaase fidu danda'a.

sourceString: Coronaviruses can cause pneumonia (either direct viral pneumonia or secondary bacterial pneumonia) and bronchitis (either direct viral bronchitis or secondary bacterial bronchitis).
targetString: Koronaavaayiresoonni niimooniyaa ( niimooniyaa vaayiresii kallatti ykn niimooniyaa baakteriyaa lammaffaa) fi dhibee ujummoo qilleensaa ( dhibee ujuommoo qilleensaa vaayiresii kallattii ykn dhibee ujuommoo qilleensaa baakteriyaa lammaffaa ) kaasuu ni danda'u.

sourceString: The human coronavirus discovered in 2003, SARS-CoV, which causes severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS), has a unique pathogenesis because it causes both upper and lower respiratory tract infections.Six species of human coronaviruses are known, with one species subdivided into two different strains, making seven strains of human coronaviruses altogether.
targetString: Koronaavaayiresiin namaa 2003 tti argame, SARS-CoV, dhibee hamaa sirna hargansuu hubu (SARS) f sababa ta'e, dhibeewwan ujummoolee hargansuu olii fi gadii lamaan sababa waan ta'uuf ka'umsaa fi guddina adda ta'e qaba. Sanyiiwwan koronaavaayiresii namaa beekamoo ja'atu beekama, keessaa sanyiin inni tokko immoo qaccee lamatti qoodamuun, iddoo tokkotti koronaavaayiresii namaa qaccee torba taasisa.

sourceString: Four of these coronaviruses continually circulate in the human population and produce the generally mild symptoms of the common cold in adults and children worldwide: -OC43, -HKU1, HCoV-229E, -NL63.
targetString: Vaayrasiiwwan koronaa Afran kunniin uummata Ardiiwwanii irra naanna'un akkasumas walumaagalatti akka addunyaa guutuutti mallattoolee uttalloo giddu galeessa gaa'essota fi ijjoollee keessatti mul'isu: -OC43, -HKU1, HCoV-229E, -NL63.

sourceString: Coronaviruses cause about 15% of commons colds.
targetString: Vaayirasoonni koroonaa gara 15% qufaa geessisu.

sourceString: The majority of colds are caused by rhinoviruses.
targetString: Irra caalan utaalloo vaayrasii raaynootiin dhufa.

sourceString: The four mild coronaviruses have a seasonal incidence occurring in the winter months in temperate climates.
targetString: Vaayirasoonni koroonaa sasalphoon afran taatee tibbaa ji'oota gannaa fi haalota qilleensaa giddu galeessa keessa uumaman qabu.

sourceString: There is no preference towards a particular season in tropical climates.
targetString: Turtiiwwan gara naannawaa qilleensa gammoojjiif fedhiin hin jiru.

sourceString: Four human coronaviruses produce symptoms that are generally mild:
targetString: Vaayirasiin koroonaa kan namaa afur walumaa galatti mallattoo saslphaa fidu.

sourceString: The virus was officially named the SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV).
targetString: Vaayirasichi seera qabeessummaadhaan SARS koroonaa vaayiras (SARS-CoV) jedhamuun moggaafame.

sourceString: More than 8,000 people were infected, about ten percent of whom died.
targetString: Uummanni 8,000 caalu dibichaan qabameera, isaan keessaas garri dhibbantaan kudhan ta'an du'aniiru.

sourceString: In September 2012, a new type of coronavirus was identified, initially called Novel Coronavirus 2012, and now officially named Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).
targetString: Fulbaana 2012 keessa gosti koronaavaayiresii haaraan adda baafamuudhaan, jalqaba Noovel Koronaavaayiresii 2012 kan jedhamee, fi amma immoo dhukkuba sirna hargansuu Giddugala Bahaa (MERS-CoV) jedhamuun mogga'eera.

sourceString: The World Health Organization issued a global alert soon after.
targetString: Dhaabbatni fayyaa addunyaa sana booda dhaamsa dammaqsituu walii gala dabarse.

sourceString: The WHO update on 28 September 2012 said the virus did not seem to pass easily from person to person.
targetString: Haareffamni WHO Fulbaana gaafa 28, 2012 akka jedhutti, vaayiresichi namarraa namatti salphaatti kan darbu hin fakkaanne ture.

sourceString: However, on 12 May 2013, a case of human-to-human transmission in France was confirmed by the French Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.
targetString: Haa ta'u malee, caamsaa 12,2013, dhimmi nama namatti daddarbuun isaa Faransaay keessatti Ministeera dhimmaa Hawaasa fi Fayyaa Faransaayootatin mirkaana'e.

sourceString: In addition, cases of human-to-human transmission were reported by the Ministry of Health in Tunisia.
targetString: Dabalataan, ta'iileen namarra-namatti daddarbuu Miniisteera Fayyaa Tuuniiziyaatiin gabaafamee ture.

sourceString: Two confirmed cases involved people who seemed to have caught the disease from their late father, who became ill after a visit to Qatar and Saudi Arabia.
targetString: Dhimmooonni lamaan mirkana'an namoota abbaa isaanii, Kaatari fi Saawud Arabiyaa daawwatee erga deebi'ee booda dhukkubsate irraa kan qabaman fakkaata.

sourceString: Despite this, it appears the virus had trouble spreading from human to human, as most individuals who are infected do not transmit the virus.
targetString: Kananarraan kan hafe, waan garri caalaan namoota hubamanii vaayiresicha hin daddabarsineef vaayiresichi namarra namatti faffaca'uuf rakkachaa ture.

sourceString: The final name for the virus is Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).
targetString: Maqaan dhumaa vaayirasichaa Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) dha.

sourceString: The only U.S. cases (both survived) were recorded in May 2014.In May 2015, an outbreak of MERS-CoV occurred in the Republic of Korea, when a man who had traveled to the Middle East, visited four hospitals in the Seoul area to treat his illness.
targetString: Dhimmooti qofaan U.S. (lachuu kan du'arraa hafan) Caamsaa 2014 tti galmaa'an. Caamsaa 2015 tti, jalqabbiin MERS-Cov Rippabliika Kooriyaatti uumame, gaafa namichi gara biyyoota gidduugala bahaatti imale, dhukkuba isaa wal'aannachuuf hospitaalota afur kan naannoo Seoul tti argaman daawwate.

sourceString: This caused one of the largest outbreaks of MERS-CoV outside the Middle East.
targetString: Kun biyyoota gidduugala bahaan alatti jalqabbii MERS-Cov isa guddaa uume.

sourceString: As of December 2019, 2,468 cases of MERS-CoV infection had been confirmed by laboratory tests, 851 of which were fatal, a mortality rate of approximately 34.5%.
targetString: Muddee 2019, ta'iileen dhukkuba MERS-CoV 2,468 ta'an yaaliiwwan laaboraatooriin mirkanaa'e keessaa 851 du'a kan ta'e tilmaamaan hammi du'aa 34.5% ture.

sourceString: In December 2019, a pneumonia outbreak was reported in Wuhan, China.
targetString: Mudde 2019 keessa, jalqabbiin michii sombaa Chaayinaa, Wuhaan keessatti gabaafame.

sourceString: On 31 December 2019, the outbreak was traced to a novel strain of coronavirus, which was given the interim name 2019-nCoV by the World Health Organization (WHO), later renamed SARS-CoV-2 by the International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses.
targetString: Mudde 31, 2019 tti, jalqabbiin vaayirasii koroonaa novel strain tti firoome, kan maqaa yeroo 2019-nCoV Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaan kennameen, sana booda Koree Addunyaawaa Taksoonomii Vaayirasootaa irrattiin (International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses) SARS-CoV-2 jedhamee irra deebiin moggaafame.

sourceString: Some researchers have suggested the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market may not be the original source of viral transmission to humans.As of 17 April 2020, there have been at least 153,822 confirmed deaths and more than 2,240,191 confirmed cases in the coronavirus pneumonia pandemic.
targetString: Qorattoonni muraasi Qurxummiin Galaanaa Gabaa Gurgurtaa Jimlaa Huanan madda jalqabaa dhukkuboota vaayirasiin namatti daddarbanii ta'uu dhiisuu akka malan yaada dhiyeessan. Akka Ebla 17 2020 tti, yoo xinnaate du'a mirkanaa'e 153,822 fi 2,240,191 ol dhimmoota mirkanaa'an michii sombaa vaayirasii koroonaa keessatti kan biyyoota hunda keessatti argamu.

sourceString: The Wuhan strain has been identified as a new strain of Betacoronavirus from group 2B with approximately 70% genetic similarity to the SARS-CoV.
targetString: Rakkoon Wuuhaan rakkoo haaraa vaayraasii koronaa beettaa garee 2B irraa tilmaaman 70% jiinii SARS-CoV waliin walfakkatu adda baaseera.

sourceString: The virus has a 96% similarity to a bat coronavirus, so it is widely suspected to originate from bats as well.
targetString: Vaayirasichi vaayirasii koroonaa kan simbira halkanii waliin walfakkeenya 96% qaba, kanaafuu akkasuma simbiroota halkanii irraa eegaluun isaa bal'inaan shakkama.

sourceString: The pandemic has resulted in travel restrictions and nationwide lockdowns in several countries.
targetString: Weerarichi qoqqobbii imalaa fi ugguramuun guutummaa saba biyyoota hedduu keessatti akka dhufu taasise.

sourceString: Coronaviruses have been recognized as causing pathological conditions in veterinary medicine since the 1930s.
targetString: Vaayrasin koronaa wal'aansa bineeldoota keessatti haalota dhukkubaa akka fiduu erga bara 1930moota keessa beekame.

sourceString: Except for avian infectious bronchitis, the major related diseases have mainly an intestinal location.
targetString: avian infectious bronchitis malee, dhibeewwan ijoon walqabatan caalaatti iddoo mar'ummaanii qabu.

sourceString: Coronaviruses primarily infect the upper respiratory and gastrointestinal tract of mammals and birds.
targetString: Koronaavaayiresoonni gara jalqabaatti qaamolee hargansuu gara olii fi ujummoo gaastirooyintestaayinii hoosiftootaa fi simbirroolee hubu.

sourceString: They also cause a range of diseases in farm animals and domesticated pets, some of which can be serious and are a threat to the farming industry.
targetString: Akkasumas dhukkuboota gara bineeldoota qonnaa fi manaa irratiifis sababa ta'u, muraasni industrii qonnaa kan sirriitti miidhuu danda'aniidha.

sourceString: In chickens, the infectious bronchitis virus (IBV), a coronavirus, targets not only the respiratory tract but also the urogenital tract.
targetString: Lukkuulee keessatti, Feline coronavirus (FCoV)'n, vaayirasiin koroonaa, sirna hargansuu qofa hin xiyyeeffatu yuurinariis ni xiyyeeffata.

sourceString: The virus can spread to different organs throughout the chicken.
targetString: Vaayiresichi lukkuu keessa qaamota garaagaratti faffaca'uu danda'a.

sourceString: Economically significant coronaviruses of farm animals include porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus, TGE) and bovine coronavirus, which both result in diarrhea in young animals.
targetString: Koronaavaayiresoonni bineeldota qonnaa dhiibbaa diinagdee guddaa qaban kaninni dabalatu koronaavaayiresii booyyeewwanii (koronaavaayiresii mar'immaanii daddarbuu danda'u, TGE) fi koronaavaayiresii loowwanii, lamaanuu bineeldota xoxobbeerratti garaa kaasaa kaasuu danda'u.
