sourceString: Feline coronavirus: two forms, feline enteric coronavirus is a pathogen of minor clinical significance, but spontaneous mutation of this virus can result in feline infectious peritonitis (FIP), a disease associated with high mortality.
targetString: Vaayirasii koroonaa feline: bifoota lama, vaayirasiin koroonaa feline enteric wanta dhukkuba fidu kan barbaachisummaa kilinikaawaa gadi aanaa qabu, garuu jijjiiramni battalaa vaayirasii kanaa feline infectious peritonitis (FIP) geessisuu danda'a, dhukkuba du'a ol'aanaa waliin walqabate.

sourceString: Similarly, there are two types of coronavirus that infect ferrets: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes a gastrointestinal syndrome known as epizootic catarrhal enteritis (ECE), and a more lethal systemic version of the virus (like FIP in cats) known as ferret systemic coronavirus (FSC).
targetString: Haaluma walfakkaatun, vaayrasiin koronaa illeettii miidhan gosa lamatu jiru. korana vaayrasiin illeettii dhukkubbii garaa keessaa epizootic catarrhal enteritis (ECE) jedhamuun beekamu, akkasumas caalaatti ajeesaa ta'e gosa vaayrasii(kan akka FIP adurreewwan keessaa) ferret systemic coronavirus (FSC) jedhamun beekkamuudha.

sourceString: There are two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV), one that causes mild gastrointestinal disease and one that has been found to cause respiratory disease.
targetString: Kaanayin koronaa vaayrasii (CCOV) gosa lamatu jiru, inni tokko dhukkuba garaachaa giddu galeessa kan fiduu fi isaa dhukkuba sirna hargaansuu fiduudha.

sourceString: Mouse hepatitis virus (MHV) is a coronavirus that causes an epidemic murine illness with high mortality, especially among colonies of laboratory mice.
targetString: Vaayrasiin tiruu hantuutaa (MHV) vaayrasii koronaa dhukkubbii Muurayin du'a guddaatiif sababa ta'a, keessattu hantutoota laboraatoorii koolonii keessaa.

sourceString: Sialodacryoadenitis virus (SDAV) is highly infectious coronavirus of laboratory rats, which can be transmitted between individuals by direct contact and indirectly by aerosol.
targetString: Sialodacryoadenitis virus (SDAV) kan jedhamu vaayirasii koroonaa hantuutaa warra laaboraatorii keessatti argamanii yoo ta'u baayyee dhukkuba fida. Akkaataan tatamsa'ina isaatiis kallattiin yeroo namoonni wal tuqaniif walitti qufa'an daddarba.

sourceString: Some strains of MHV cause a progressive demyelinating encephalitis in mice which has been used as a murine model for multiple sclerosis.
targetString: Dhiphinni MHV muraasni hantutoota keessatti suuta dhukkuba dadhabuu yaada sammuu kan akka fakkeenya gogiinsa qaamaa baay'eetti faayida irra oolaa ture jira.

sourceString: Significant research efforts have been focused on elucidating the viral pathogenesis of these animal coronaviruses, especially by virologists interested in veterinary and zoonotic diseases.
targetString: Carraaqqiiwwan qorannoo lakkoofsaan guddaa ta'an karaa dhukkuboota vaayirasiin dhufan bineelda vaayirasii koroonaa kanneenii ittiin dagaagan ibsuu irratti xiyyeeffatan, keessattuu vaayirooloojistoota dhukkuboota beeyladaa fi jarmootaan dhufan irratti fedhii qabaniin.

sourceString: Porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus of pigs, TGEV).
targetString: Vaayirasii koroonaa porcine (vaayirasii koroonaa booyyotaa gastroenteritis daddarbuu danda'u, TGEV).

sourceString: Bovine coronavirus (BCV), responsible for severe profuse enteritis in of young calves.
targetString: Bovine coronavirus (BCV), dhukkubaan hubamuu mar'ummaanii jabaataa kan dhukkubbii qabu hammaan guddaa ta'e kan jabbiiwwan dargaggoo keessaatiif sababa.

sourceString: Feline coronavirus (FCoV) causes mild enteritis in cats as well as severe Feline infectious peritonitis (other variants of the same virus).
targetString: Feline coronavirus (FCoV)'n dhukkuba tiruu salphaa adurree akkasumas vaayirasii bifa wal fakkaataa baay'ee jabaaf sababa ta'a.

sourceString: the two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV) (one causing enteritis, the other found in respiratory diseases).
targetString: Gosoonni coronaavaayiresii saree lamaan (CCoV) (tokko dhangala'uu mar'ummaaniif sababa kan ta'u, inni biraan dhukkuboota sirna hargansuu keessatti argama.)

sourceString: Turkey coronavirus (TCV) causes enteritis in turkeys.
targetString: Vaayrasiin koronaa Turkii(TCV) turkii keessatti dhukkubbii mar'imaaniif sababa ta'e.

sourceString: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes epizootic catarrhal enteritis in ferrets.
targetString: Vaayirasiin koroonaa gosa bineensaa illeettii fi hantuuta adamsituu enteric bineensicha keessatti catarrhal enteritis geessisa.

sourceString: Ferret systemic coronavirus causes FIP-like systemic syndrome in ferrets.
targetString: Vaayirasiin koroonaa ferret systematic mallattoowwan akka FIP'f ferret keessatti sababa ta'a.

sourceString: Rabbit enteric coronavirus causes acute gastrointestinal disease and diarrhea in young European rabbits.
targetString: Illeettiin vaayirasii koroonaa seensisuun dhibee gastrointestinal fi garaa kaasaa illeettiiwwan awurooppaaf sababa ta'e.

sourceString: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PED or PEDV), has emerged around the world.
targetString: Vaayirasiin garaa-kaasaa dhukkuba battlatti bakka murtaa'aa ga'ee namoota hunda dhukkubsachiisu porcine (PED or PECV), akka addunyaatti mul'ateera.
